xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex61062023-09-26-095619" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">bla ma snar thang pa brgyad par byon pa</rs> zhes <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">btsun pa ze'u chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> la gnang ste <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">daM pas bsngags pa snar thang gyi dben <abbr>gnas</abbr></rs><abbr>su</abbr> bris shis [shing ?] phyag dpe la btugs (=gtugs?) ste dag par <abbr>byas so</abbr>||<anchor xml:id="a1"/></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex2701_2024-09-1114-33-12" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="90a4"/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4659">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3711">mngon par <abbr>rtoGS</abbr> pa'i rgyan 'grel pa</rs> bcas pa'i rnaM bshad laM gyi rim pa snang ba</rs> zhes bya ba 'di <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">thams cad mkhyen pa 2 pa graGS pa rgya mtsho</rs>'i<anchor xml:id="a2"/> <lb n="90a5"/> zhabs gdul [=rdul] spyi bos len cing lung riGS kyi chos la <abbr>blo gros</abbr> cung zhig rgyas pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3927">lum bu ba bsod naMs dpal</rs> gyis <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5658">'tshal gung thang gi gtsug lag khang chen po</rs>r <anchor xml:id="a3"/> sbyar ba ni re shig rdzogs s+ho ||</seg>
source: 1_027_01_bSod nams dpal_ sher phyin rnam bshad lam gyi rim pa snang ba.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19092024-09-2415-23-12" status="unreviewed"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (8a4-8) (p. 609:4-8)]"/>
           <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4612">sdom tshig gsal byed don gsal</rs> 'di | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6859">blo gsal don grub bkra shis</rs> kyis bskul nas | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4608">shakya'i dge slong shes <lb n="8a5"/>rab 'bum</rs> gyis sbyar ba'o || </seg>
source: 1_019_09_Shes rab bum_dul ba sdom tshig bsdus don gsal byed me long.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19092024-09-2415-26-29" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6042">sangs brgyas bzang po</rs>'i slab bya go bder bris pa pa nyin</seg>
source: 1_019_09_Shes rab bum_dul ba sdom tshig bsdus don gsal byed me long.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex52062023-10-251" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[1a5–1b1]"/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4918">dbu ma rgyan gyi bsdus don</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s bkod do ||||</seg>
source: 2_052_06_C_bCom ldan Ral gri_dbu ma rgyan bsdus don_gsung bum.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50142023-09-0816-07-29" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">bla ma snar thang pa brgyad pa byon pa</rs> des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458"> btsun pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> la gnang ste yi ger bris pa'o || zhus dag par <abbr>byas so</abbr> || 
         <milestone unit="section" n="[Post-colophon 2nd annotations (nya_5b5, p. 304), in smaller script]"/>
            <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">daM pas bsngags pa'i gnas mchog snar thang</rs> du bris shing <abbr>zhus so</abbr> || ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1211-22-49" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">slob dpon klu grub</rs> kyi dongs pa 'grel pa la mi mthun pa du ma yod pa yin te | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">slob dpon legs ldan 'byed</rs> lasogs pas slob dpon gyi thugs dngos pa rgyud du bkrel la || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">slob dpon zla ba grags pa</rs> lasogs pas thal du bkrel <lb n="1.3"/> lo ||
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">slob dpon klu grub</rs> kyis 'thal 'gyur du <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">zla ba grags pa</rs> la bkral la | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">zla grags</rs> kyi thugs dgongs <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">dge bshes lo tsa ba</rs>s <!--TODO =Nag tsho--> bkrel bas <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:"><!--TODO =Nagarjuna-->slob dpon</rs> gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis la don rnams pa drug ste |</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1215-05-46"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed person" ref="db:">jo bo</rs>s kyang | <quote source="db:" n="7ab"><!--Satyadvayāvatāra, v.7ab: ma mthong ba nyid de mthong bar / / shin tu zab pa’i mdo las gsungs /.-->ma mthong bar nyid de mthong par || shin rta zab pa'i mdo las gsungs</quote> zhes bshad do ||</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1211-29-45" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">dge bshes</rs> kyi zhal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis don dam pa'i ngo bo bstan pa yin gsung |</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1211-29-47" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas bden pa gnyis ga'i ngo bo ston pa gsung</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1214-29-53" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas dbang po gsal ba ste rab rib lasogs pas dbang po nyams par ma byas shing yul ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzin pa dang | de yang 'jig rten rnams kyis bden par byed pa de yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid <lb n="4.10"/>du shes par bya ste || de skad du yang <rs type="work">'jug pa</rs> las |<quote source="db:" n="6.25">gnod pa myed pa'i dbang po drug rnams kyis ||
            bzung pa gang zhig 'jig rten gyis rtogs ste ||
            'jig rten nyid las bden </quote>
            zhes bshad pas de'i steng du 'jig rten bas bden par byed pa de yang dag kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin no gsung ||</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1211-39-51" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">dge bshes</rs> kyi zhal nas yul can shes pa la yang dag log pa ni yod pa kun rdzob myed gsung ba la | de'i rgyu mshan ni 'di yin no bya ba ni mi gsung skad do ||</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1211-39-52" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas shes bya yul la yod na yul can shes pa la yang kun rdzob yod pa <lb n="11.7"/> yin te rgyu mtshan la khyad par myed pa'i phyir dang | gzhan yang | <quote source="db:" n="6.28a">gti mug rang bzhin sgrib phyir kun rdzob ste</quote> zhes pa lasogs pa shes pa'i steng du kun rdzob kyi sgra'i don bshad pa byas nas | yul can shes pa'i steng na yang dag dang log pa yod la kun rdzob myed zer ba ni 'thad pa ma yin no gsung ||</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1214-45-12" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">dge bshes pa</rs>'i rang dga' ma yin te <rs type="work">'jug pa</rs> las /
         <quote source="db:" n="6.28">gti mug rang bzhin srib phyir kun rdzob ste | <lb n="12.2"/>
         des gang bcos ma bden pa (for bar) snang de ni |kun rdzob bden zhes thub pas de gsung te |
         bcos mar gyur pa'i dngos ni kun rdzob tsam du'o</quote> zhes bshad do //</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1211-40-52" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas nyon mongs pa can gyi ma rig pas 'khrul pa byas pa'i yul dang yul can thams cad yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin la | nyon mongs pa can gyi ma rig pa las gzhan nyon mongs pa can ma <lb n="12.3"/> yin pa'i ma rig pa de rab rib dang dmyigs ser lasogs pas 'khrul pa byas pa'i yul dang yul can thams cad ni | log pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin te zhes spyi thod du bstan kyang chog gsung ngo ||</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1214-43-55" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">jo bo</rs>'i zhal nas kyang | <quote source="db:" n="SDA 4cd"><!--Satyadvayāvatāra, v. 4cd (Ejima 1983, p. 362): / cir yang ma grub chos nyid de / / gnyis dang gsum sog ga la ’gyur / / 4 / /.-->ci yang ma grub chos nyid la / gnyis dang gsum rtsogs ga la yod</quote> zhes bshad pa yin no ||</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1214-43-52" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">dge bshes lo tsa ba</rs>'i zhal nas mtshan gzhi dang mtshan <lb n="12.9"/> nyid dngos po la yod pa bzhin du mtshon bya ba lang bya ba de yang bda'i rgyu mtshan mi 'dra ba myed pa dgag pa bya ba de rngos po la yod pa bzhed la /</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1211-43-52" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">slang pha ba</rs>s <!--TODO =khyung--> mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid rngos po la yod kyi mtshon bya ni rngos po la myed ste brtags par bzhed pa yin no ||</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1212-06-26" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">dge bshes</rs> kyi chos can mthun snang myed pa'i rigs pa gdu gdu ba ni chos can bya ba shes par 'dod pas khyad par du byas pa yin ba la rgol ba dngos por smra ba lasogs pa chos can snang ba rten 'brel 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang rang bzhin myed par shes par 'dod pa yod kyang | dbu ma bas snang ba rten 'brel 'di brdzun pa sgyu ma lta bu dang <lb n="8.9"/> rang bzhin myed par rtogs zin pas shes 'dod myed pas chos can mthun snang myed do ||</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1212-10-26" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">rang rgyud pa</rs> na re chos can snang ba rten 'brel 'di tshad mas grub kyang don dam du thal ba'i nyes pa myed ste | tha snyad pa'i tshad mas grub kyang chos can kyang snang ba rten 'brel 'di cig dang du <lb n="9.2"/> bral lasogs pa rigs pa'i shes pa'i yul du ma grub pa'i phyir ro zer na |</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1212-15-57" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">rngog</rs> gi zhal nas thun mong spyi'i mtshan <lb n="9.8"/> nyid myed pa yin gsung | <abbr><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">slang ba</rs>'i</abbr> zhal nas thun mong spyi'i mtshan nyid ni | tshul ci rigs su khas blangs pa yin gsung |</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1212-15-59" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">sngon gyi bshad pa po rnams</rs> kyi zhal nas khyab pa dngos po la gnas shing phyogs chos khas blangs su 'dug pa de yin no zer ba la |
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">rngog</rs> gi zhal nas sgrub pa'i thal 'gyur bya ba bzlog pa rang rgyud dang 'brel ba yin <lb n="9.9"/> pa la | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">sngon gyi bshad pa po rnams</rs> kyi de bzlog pa dang ma 'brel bas <?oxy_comment_start comment="[bold face in source document]"?>bsgrub pa'i thabs 'gyur<?oxy_comment_end?> gyi mtshan nyid ni khyab pa dngos po la gnas pa phyogs chos khas blangs su 'dug pa skabs su bab pa'i dam bca la tshad ma'i bsal ba byung ba la bzhed do ||</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1212-18-59" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">slang pa ba</rs>'i zhal nas <?oxy_comment_start comment="[bold face in source document]"?>sgrub pa'i thal 'gyur <?oxy_comment_end?>gyi mtshan nyid ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">sngon gyi bshad pa mkhan po rnams</rs> kyi des chog pa yin te | bsgrub pa'i thal <lb n="9.10"/><?oxy_comment_start comment="[bold face in source document]"?> gyur <?oxy_comment_end?>du 'dug pa tsam gyis bzlog pa rang rgyud 'phen pa'i nges pa myed ste | bzlog pa dang 'brel bya ba de bzlog pa 'phen pa'i nus pa yod byas pa yin myi|gyi nus pa yod pa tsam gyis bzlog pa 'phen pa'i * myed pa ste | dper na sa bon skya bo la my gu skyed ming nus pa yod kyang nus pa yod pa tsam gyis ci'i kyang mas kyang my gu skyed pa'i nges pa myed pa bzhin no gsung |
         gnyis pa <?oxy_comment_start comment="[bold face in source document]"?>sun 'byin pa'i thal <?oxy_comment_end?><lb n="10.1"/> <?oxy_comment_start comment="[bold face in source document]"?>'gyur <?oxy_comment_end?>gyi mtshan nyid ni khyab pa dngos la gnas rung mi gnas rung phyogs khas blangs su 'dug pa yin no zer ro ||</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1212-20-59" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">pa tshab</rs> kyi zhal nas bsgrub pa'i thabs thal 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid ni gtan tshigs kyi tshul gsum rgol bas zhe bas 'dod pa yin la | sun 'byin pa'i thal 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid thal 'gyur de'i gtan tshigs khas blangs sam khas blangs kyi mthar thug pa yin no gsung ||</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1212-26-07" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">kha cig</rs> na re khyed thal 'gyur ba la yongs cos sgrub pa'i dam bca myed pas de sgrub par byed pas gtan tshigs lasogs pa tshad mas grub pa mi dgos pa bden khongs su gzhug gi | rnam dpyad dgag pa'i dam bca yod dam myed | yod na de sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshgis brjod dgos la | de ni de 'gal ba rjod pa'i thal 'gyur lasogs <lb n="13.8"/> pa brjod pa dgos pa ci yod zhe na zer ro ||</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1215-00-57" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">jo bo</rs>s gsungs pa bzhin du ye shes phyed chad bya ba yin te shes bya cir yang ma grub pa la ye shes kyis ci <lb n="16.8"/> yang mi rtog pa ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni yod la | ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba dang bcas pa ni myed pa yin no bya ba gsung |</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64012023-05-1212-29-57" status="unreviewed"><lb n="16.10"/> bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par bzhag pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">slob dpon</rs> gyi gsung tshod bris pa ||</seg>
source: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex21032024-09-0412-46-26" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4627">bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par bshad pa</rs>| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3729">slob dpon klu sgrub</rs> kyi lugs su <lb n="55a6"/> sbyar ba || × rdzogs s+hyo||</seg>
source: 1_021_03 rNal 'byor pa Shes rab rdo rje_bden gnyis kyi rnam par bshad pa.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex21032024-09-0412-46-27" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">bdag</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3913">shag kya'i dge slong prad nya badz+ra</rs></note><note><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3829">dge ba'i bshes pu to ba</rs>'i slob ma <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3913">rnal 'byor pa shes rab rdo rje</rs>s mdzad pa yin no</note> gis <note type="gloss">ti ka</note> de bsdebs <note type="gloss">ba las byung ba'i</note> dge ba gang <note type="gloss">zhig</note> thob <note type="gloss">pa</note> des ||
         phyin chad skyes bu <note type="gloss">bdag gzhan gyi don dang tshig don gyi rtogs pa</note> don <note type="gloss">du</note> gnyer <note type="gloss">bar</note> 'dod pa yis ||<lb n="55a7"/>bden pa gnyis ston <note type="gloss">pa'i</note>tshig dang <note type="gloss">des bstan pa'i</note> don rtogs <note type="gloss">par gyur</note> nas ||<note type="gloss">thabs dang shes rab du su 'jug pa ||
                     </note> dbu ma'i lam gyis nges <note type="gloss">pa ste gdon mi za bar</note> par <note type="gloss">chos kyi</note> sku thob <note type="gloss">par</note> shog <note type="gloss">1</note>|| dge'o ||</seg>
source: 1_021_03 rNal 'byor pa Shes rab rdo rje_bden gnyis kyi rnam par bshad pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex2022023-10-13-110745" status="unreviewed"><note type="gloss"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4453">‹sher snying gi rgya cher 'grel›</rs></note><anchor xml:id="a1"/>‹La¶ 588›<anchor xml:id="a2"/></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex20220240828_1" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4189">dags po</rs><!--Probably for dwags po lha rje=sGam po pa, but could also be dags po dbang rgyal db:3792--> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4294">khyung po</rs><!--uncertain whether Khyung po is khyung po grags se--> ni <quote xml:id="d2e1608">gha te gha te</quote> zhes pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid yin la | <quote xml:id="d2e1611">pa ra gha te</quote> zhes pa ni mtshan ma <abbr>med</abbr> pa yin la | <quote xml:id="d2e1617">pa ra sang gha te</quote> zhes pa ni rmon pa myed pa yin no zer ro ||
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3827">'brom</rs> ltar na <quote xml:id="d2e1624">tad yā tha</quote> zhes pa ni 'di lta ste bya ba yin la | <quote xml:id="d2e1627">gha te gha te</quote> bya ba ni song 1 song 1 bya ba yin pas tshogs laM sbyor laM du song 1 bya ba yin la || <quote xml:id="d2e1630">pa ra gha te </quote>zhes bya ba ni <lb n="6a5"/> pha rol du song 1 bya ba yin pas mthong laM du song 1 bya ba yin la | <quote xml:id="d2e1636">pa ra gha te</quote> zhes bya ba ni yang dag par song 1 bya ba yin pas | sgoMs laM du song 1 bya ba yin la | <quote xml:id="d2e1640">bho te swo ha </quote>zhes bya ba ni byang chub zhi bar song 1 bya ba yin pas mi slob pa'i laM du song 1 bya ba yin zer te legs so ||
         </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex2022023-10-13-111939" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4453"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3694">'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa'i mdo'</rs> rgya cher 'grel pa</rs> | <note type="gloss">gsang phu ba ar zer ro?<!--This note is by another hand than the glosses to the text--></note> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3816">shag kya'i dge slong byang chub ye shes</rs> kyis sbyar ba'o |||| rdzogs s+hyo ||||<!--an illegible note is placed in the space between "sbyar ba'o" and "|| rdzogs s+hyo", staring with "ni 'tshogs"; it might belong to the above lines rather than the colophon--></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex46022023-09-19-102726" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4780">rigs pa dang mi rigs pa'i de kho na nyid <abbr>rnam par</abbr> 'byed pa <abbr>legs</abbr> par bshad pa'i gter mdzod ¦ blo gsal gyi yid la dga' ba  gter ba</rs> zes bya ba 'di ni ; <rs tpye="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5356"><rs type="place">gangs ri</rs>'i <lb n="46a11"/> khrod kyi <abbr>rigs</abbr> pa smra ba rnaMs kyi gtsug rgyan daM par gyur pa ¦ rigs pa smra ba'i btsun pa sangs rgyas bzang po</rs> ¦ sbrang rtsi 'dzin pa'i dkar phyogs la ¦ mkhas grub du ma nye bar rten pa'i dben gnas ¦ <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5667">broM pa rgyang  gi gtsug lag <abbr>bkhang</abbr> <abbr>chen por</abbr></rs> nye bar sbyar ba'o ||</seg>
source: 2_046_02_sangs rgyas bzang po_legs bshad gter mdzod_etext.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5032023-05-0309-22-52" status="reviewed"><pb n="1a"/><lb n="1a1"/> phyi <lb n="1a2"/>la <lb n="1a3"/>142<lb n="1a4"/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4476">yuM bar ma nyi khri'i rnaM bshad</rs></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5032023-05-0309-24-52" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba chen po</rs>'i gsung sgros las | dam pa'i bshes gnyen chos la mnga' ba rnams gyis lung dang rigs pa'i tshul ji ltar phye ba'i bshad sbyar mang po la brten nas | de dag gi lam gyi ra ba las ma 'das par | blo dman pa 'ga' tsam rjes su gzung bas 'gro ba drang ba'i sa <lb n="1b6"/> bon gdab pa dang | <rs type="deity">thub pa</rs>'i bstan pa rin po ce spel ba la gces spras gyi dad pas rang gi brjed byang tsam du rnam par bshad pa dgod par bya'o |¦|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-43-46" status="unreviewed"><note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3712">bzang po</rs> nyid kyi</note> mchod brjod du <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3706">mngon rtogs</rs> nyid kyi de bkod pa ni <quote source="db:3706" n="D3786, 1b2">nyan thos</quote> zhes bya ba lasogs pa ste |<note type="gloss">rnam dpyad rigs pa las bshad thabs lnga gsungs pa las</note> ngag 'di'i dgos pa'i don brgyad <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5552">shang ka ra nan ta</rs>s <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5832"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5831">gtan tshigs thigs pa</rs>'i tI ka</rs>nas bshad yod <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">nga</rs>s <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5616">kha che</rs> nas 'ongs pa'i skyes chos yin te gsung ba</note>dang | spyi don<note type="gloss">nyan rang phyogs gcig tu byas pa'i</note> 'phags pa'i gang zag gsum gyi dgos pa sgrub cing de gsum nyid <note type="gloss">'khor dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid</note> skyed pa'i yon tan gnyis kyis bstod pa dang | de la phyag bya ba ste | gnyis dang | <note type="gloss">gang zag gang gis gdams ngag gi 'bras bu gang bsgrub pa zhes bshad nas</note>de dag so so'i tshig rnam par <choice><reg>phye bas</reg><orig>°e bas</orig></choice> <lb n="1b8"/> rgyal bar bshad pa ni gzhan du blta'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-1"><note type="gloss">gang zag gsum po de dag gang las byung zhe na yon tan gnyis bshad do || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsa</rs>'i zhal nas go mi chen po gsung skad nas mkhyen pa gsum gi dbye ba la sogs pa <choice><reg>rnaMs</reg><orig>°s</orig></choice> 'dir 'chad phyis 'og du skabs su bab gsung nas lus phung 'chad zhes</note>nyan pa po skal ldan spyan drang ba ni <quote>rgyal sras gang dag</quote> nas te | ‹rgyal sras gang dag khyad par gyi gzhi'o || skye bo nas khyad par te gzhan don phyir yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'o || dgra dang skal bas ma pham ma rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyi gdung mtshan ldan gdung 'tshob pas sras brjod pa bzhin 'tshob pa'i sras las nyan thos kyi dbang gis skye ba'i skye ba po yin pas skye bo ma lus ma smid pa smin pa mi 'dun pa 'dun pa ma grol ba grol bar gsum las tha ma bzung ba bsgral phyir ro || byang chub ni byang chub chen po'o |›  'gro ba mtha' dag drang ba'i ched du byang chub dam pa don du gnyer <note type="gloss">ba dor na sems bskyed</note> pa'i blo ldan rnams <note type="gloss">gang yin pa zhes bsnyegs o || 
         slob dpon la ma ltos par mthong lam du</note>dang | rang nyid byang chub gyi sgo mngon par rtogs nas <note type="gloss">rang rgyal 'phags par 'gyur ba gang dag sangs rgyas pas dman nyan thos pas mchog pas de dag dang mnyam med</note>slar <note type="gloss">'o na gtan du ba'i zhe na mthar thug gtan du ba med pas</note>yang thun mong ma yin pa'i lam de nyid mthar 'phyin par (byed) pa 'am | rang gi byang chub thob nas slar yang lam dam par 'jug par byed pa rang rgyal rnams <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas 'di gsungs la 'jug mod kyi dnogs la gsungs nas gang yin ces</note> dang | <note type="gloss">thub pas gsungs pa'i rjes su 'jug gi rang gi shes rab kyi</note>mi slob pa dang slob pa'i lam <lb n="1b9"/> kyis 'bras bu nyon mong pa dang phug sdug bsngal gnon cing 'dor bas 'gro gnyan thos rnams te | lam gsum (la) gnas pa rigs can gsum po yum nyan pa lasogs pa'i skal ldan de dag <abbr>thams cad</abbr> (chos) gyi sbyin pa la rtse gcig pa'i spro bas 'du bar spyan drang ba'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-47-09" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas skad kyi byings shed yin nam paN+Di ta kun la rjes su ma byung gsung ste spyir bkas bcas la bya ba min yang 'di bsnyil lam bkas bcad las 'jig _rten _pa'i _legs _ldan _du brjod pa las khyad par du byed pa'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-48-00" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas dgra bcom pa'i bshad pa tshar phyin pa'o zhes gsung zhes bden zla dang bdud dgra bcom pa yang sbyar pas so|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-35"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA</rs> ba'i zhal nas phu su rna gang ba|_gang ga ti 'gro ba la len pa ste gang zhing 'gro ba lan zhes 'ong ba'o zhes len _pa'o|_|gcig ni _grangs _snga mar _chud _pa _las _so|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-18-52"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">sngon gyi slob dpon</rs> gyis bshad pa gang zil gyis mnan na tshangs pa dang lha dang bdud dam mu stegs dang mi rnams zil gyis mnan _par _sbyar ro|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-19-32"><rs type="work">'grel pa</rs>r lus rnam bzhag 'chad pa na skabs dang 'brel ba'i dri ba ni shes rab kyi (D3787, 15b7) nas te | mdo'i don spyir ji ltar blta bar bya ba dris pa'o || 'di'i lan du <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">rje btsun</rs> gyi lus rnam bzhag nyid 'god pa ni <quote xml:id="d2e551">bshad pa</quote> zhes 'brel ba brtsams nas <quote xml:id="d2e554">shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni </quote>zhes bya ba nas <quote xml:id="d2e557">yang dag brjod ces bya ba yin no</quote>'i bar ro ||(D3787, 16a1–16b2)</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-20-27"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">rje btsun</rs> kyis bka' snga ma'i tha snyad la brten nas bstan pa 'di la 'jug pa'i rgyur nyan thos zhugs gnas bdun dang rang rgyal ba'i ming du btags par zad pas mtshan nyid ni gzhan kho na'o|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-36"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA ba chen po</rs>'i zhal nas sgro ltar glo bur du btags pa'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-342"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA chen po</rs>'i gcig la nas la la ni ngo bo nyid kyis|_la la ni yul gyis|_la la ni gang zag gis de gnyis 'phangs pa'i sgo nas te|_dngos su brjod pa dang don gyis bstan pa dang rgyud nas rtogs pa'i don gsum dang gnyis dang re re ci rigs par bstan par blta'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-21-32"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">rje btsun</rs> gyi rtsa ba'i sgras zin pa ste yul gyi dmigs gzhi dang chos rnam gnyis dang 'bras bu la nus pa rgyu dang nye bar yongs rton pa'i khyad par bzhi'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-343"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786"> chos kyi </rs>[- 81 -]    bgos skal la spyod pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos la dbang sgyur bas so|_|zang zing gi bgos skal la spyod pa ni sred pa spangs pas so|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-345"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA chen po</rs>'i zhal nas de ci ltar 'khrul lam 'di dag dang _mi 'dra ba'i dgag sgrub bzhi dang bral bas mtshon pa ste|_na T+The te a na Ne te na bi T+Te te zhes bzhi mdo la shin tu gsal lo|_|'thad pas gnas pa'i don bsdu ba ni de ltar na ming de zhes so|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-22-23"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon 'phags pa</rs>s kyang res 'ga' 'gres kyi dum bu mang po sdud pa ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">rje btsun</rs> gyi man ngag gi bstan bcos 'di'i rtsa ba'i mdo gang yin pa rnam par dag pa de gtan la phebs par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan du go bar bya'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-4"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3712">bzang po</rs>'i lugs de <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA ba</rs>s lags pa'i dgongs pa 'chad pa dang ma mthun no|_|phal _pa _ste sa bdun pa man chad do|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-392"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">sngon gyi lo tsA</rs> bas sgom pa rnam par sgom par bsgyur ba ni don ma rtogs pa'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-23-52"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> 'chad do|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2608-01-30"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">sngon gyi slob dpon</rs> gyi man ngag bshad pa med par kun gyi khungs mthun par gsungs par snang ngo*|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-40"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA ba chen po</rs>'i zhal nas ni sgra'i gnas brgyad las tha ma bod pa skye shing zhes bya ba lta bu ma gtogs pa bdun las brtsams pa ste|_'jig rten dang 'das pa'i byed pa po dang |_las su bya ba dang byed thabs dang |_ched du bya ba dang |_'byung khungs dang 'brel ba can dang |_dbang du _bya ba'am gnas gzhi brjod pa la ltos nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug tshan gnyis dang |_ci rigs par 'brel pa_7[- 166 -]  bar blta'o|_|yang na 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa dang sbyar ba la ma ltos par 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid kyi sgra don du blta ste sla'o|_|skabs bsdu ba ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nas so|_|lam gyi rang bzhin ni shA ri'i bus nas te rtogs pa ni 'bras bu thob pa'o|_|sum cu rtsa bdun ni mtshon pa ste de la sogs pa'o|_|sbyong byed drug gi nang nas gtso bor yang yum nyid bsgrub pa la lnga las dri ba ni shA ri'i bus zhes so|_|lan bstan pa ni rab 'byor gyis nas te skyes bu'i rtsal ni lam de dag gis 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i nus pa'i rgyu'o|_|'thad pa'i sgo nas rgyas par bshad pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam ni don dam shes pa'o|_|skyed pa nyid kyi don ni yongs su 'dzin cing yang dag par 'dzin pa ni|_sgrub cing brtan par byed pa dang |_mthar thug par rdzogs par byed pas so|_|bsgrub _lan de nyid 'thad pas pa ni tshe dang lnga pa shA ri'i bu sngon gyi dang por sangs rgyas bkod pa nas _so|_|de la slob _sbyong byed gtso bo pa'i che ba ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi nas te gnas pa dang yid la byed pa ni 'dir rnam grangs so|_|'di dang ma bral ba ni gzhan don 'ba' zhig la gzhol ba dang ngo*|_|de la klan ka spang ba la gnyis las yid la byed pa sgra ji lta bar bzung ba'i klan ka dgod pa ni smras pa nas te yid la byed pa zhes bya ba sems kyi 'jug pa mngon zhen la bsams nas te sel ba la zhugs pa nyid byang chub sems dpar rigs par ston pa'o|_|'di sel ba'i lan la bdun las sgra ji bzhin par bzung na rang la'ang nyes pa mtshungs par 'gyur ba ni rab 'byor gyis nas te|_yang dag legs so zhes pa ma 'brel bar 'gyur bas 'di ltar blta ste ci'ang yid la mi byed pa yid la byed pa'i don yin pas mngon zhen la byas na ha cang thal bar brtsad pa legs pa'o|_|pa'i tshig tu brjod pas don nyid du bzung ba ni yid la byed pa de kho nar ci'ang yid la mi byed pa sgyu ma lta bu'i yid la byed pa yin pa las|_sgra ji bzhin pa mngon zhen nyid du btags pas so|_|klan kar 'gyur ba ni skabs gzhan du rang gis khas blangs pa la'ang sgra ji bzhin par bzung ba'i nyes pa 'byung bas so|_|ci'ang yid la mi byed pa nyid yid la byed par bsam pa ston pa'i lan rnal ma bsgrub pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te|_nges 'byed bzhi dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam ste gnas skabs lngar|_sems dang chos thams cad bkag pas yid la byed pa de kho nar bkag pa ston pas|_med pa dang stong pa dang rang bzhin med pa dang*|_dben pa dang mngon par 'tshang mi rgya ba lnga gsungs pa'o|_|skabs bsdu ba ni tshe [- 167 -]      img. 198   bya bas so|_|rgyal ba'i yum bar ma le'u brgyad pa'i<rs type="work">'grel</rs> pa rnam par bshad pa las skabs dang po'o||_||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-393"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA ba</rs> gsungs|_'bu mang du srin po byung zer tsa na li shi mang po byung ba dang |_der 'brum nag byung de nas tshong pas gang du khyer bar byung zhes sems _can _gyis _byas _pa'o|_|'tshe ba ni de ma yin pas byas pa'o|_|tha ma gnyis kyi rnam pa bshad pa las 'gog pa'i ni yid la byed [- 171 -] nas te|_yid la byed pa de rnams ni byang chub kyi sems mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa can no|_|bdag med pa ni 'gog pa'i rnam _grangs so|_|dben pa ni gya nom pa'o|_|stong pa nyid la sogs _pa ni nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa'o|_|mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ni ngo bo'o|_|des na rnam grangs mi mkhas pa'i don du kha cig ming gzhan gyis gsungs pa ste 'dra ba la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis so|_|'di rnams   <rs type="work">Tik+ka</rs> las ni mi rtag pa ni ma byung ba las byung zhing byung nas med par 'gyur ba'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2608-06-36"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">sngon gyi slob dpon</rs> bstan pa la gces par 'dzin pa nyid ston pa dang |_ston pa'i bka' drin rjes su skyong ba dang |_yon tan dam pa dang ldan pa dag gi phyogs su lhung ba yang rigs pas na yum bsgrub pa la tshul bzhin du zhugs pa dag la|_chos kyi srung ma ye shes kyi spyan mnga' ba mthu dang ldan pa rnams kyis|_ston pa'i spyan snga nyid du 'di ltar thugs dam bzhes nas dus thams cad du mgon mdzad par ni the tshom mi za'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2608-07-45"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">slob dpon bdag nyid chen po</rs>s mdo dang sbyar nas mthong lam gyi ngo bo bcu drug dang |_phan yon bcu drug ste|_tshan gnyis su bshad pa ni gzhung ji lta ba'i bshad pa de gzhan du blta'o|_|
         'dir ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3806">kho bo</rs>s <rs type="work">'grel</rs> pa mdzad pa'i ltar rjes la 'thob pa'i phan yon bcu drug gis ye shes _kyi dbye ba rnams mtshon par byed pas bshad pa'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-41"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas de bzhin du zhes blta _gsung rgyu mtshan du byed na'ang bsdu ba'o|_|des na mchod rten dang 'dra bsnyad pa 'dra bas zer ba lta ba'am mchod rten nyid du yum gyis byin gyis brlabs shing 'di zhib tu <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3712">bzang po</rs>s lugs gnyis bshad pa bzhin no ba dang 'dra ba ni bu ba dang 'dra ba'o zhes bsgos par blta'o||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-42"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas sha ri ra zhes bya ba ring bsrel dang sku gzugs kyi thun mong gi ming yin pas sku zhes bya ba nyid du blta'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-46-39"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA</rs> gsungs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nas te 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub pas so|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-43"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA</rs> 'di la nas yang zhes bya ba'i don du blta'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-47-39"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas gnyis su med pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad med pa'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-88"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">sngon gyi lo tsA</rs>s 'di ltar bsgyur yang a te na ta bi shud d+ha zhes _bya ba la|_a te ni mtha'o|_|an ta ni 'das pa'o|_|bi shud d+ha ni rnam par dag pa'o zhes bshad pas|_de la mtha' ni zhes gsungs te mtha' gnyis las 'das pa'i rnam par dag pa'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-49-39"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">slob dpon lo tsA ba chen po</rs>'i zhal snga nas kyis rnam pa brgya bdun cu rtsa gsum 'di gsum du 'dus par gsungs pa'ang legs par gnas pa ste gzhi dang lam gyi rnam pa ni bcu drug pa nyid yin la|_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yang tshul 'dis 'di dag tu bsdu bar 'thad pa shin tu gsal bas so|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-41-39"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas dper na shing la me shor ba na me nyid bsad kyang sol dum du song ba mi ldog pa lta bu'o|_|de lta bu'i tshul ni 'gro bar bya ba ma yin [- 240 -] pa'i sar 'gro ba'o|_|ngag gi ca co yang de bzhin du blta'o|_|sems la byas pa dang smras nas ring du lon pa brjed pa dang |_srid zhi la blang dor gyi yul tha dad du 'dzin pa dang |_mnyam bzhag las ldang ba na gzhan du g.yeng ba dang |_skal ldan gyi don bya ba'i dus las yol ba'i btang snyoms su lus pa'ang mi mnga'o|_|thob pas bsdus pa drug ni dbang po lnga'i gnas 'dun pa dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid brtson 'grus la sogs pa bzhi 'bras bu rnam grol dang bcas pa las ma thob pa'i nyams pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas so|_|'phrin las kyi bsdus pa gsum ni sku gsung thugs la ye shes kyis ma bzung ba lung ma bstan gyi 'phrin las gtan mi mnga' ba'o|_|ye shes kyis bsdus pa gsum ni dus gsum gyi shes bya mtha' dag ngang gis ma lus par mkhyen pas te|_bstsal ba tsam ni mngon du phyogs pa'am bzhed pa tsam yin gyi 'bad rtsol la ni gtan mi ltos so|_|mtshan nyid kyi don ni de kho nar thams cad stong pa nyid do|_|gzhan gyi rkyen las ma byung ba ni so so rang rig pas gnas gyur mthar thug mngon du mdzad pa yon tan rab mchog dam pa thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa'o|_|de ltar mkhyen pa gsum po'i rnam pa de rnams kyi so so'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba dang don bsdus pa dag ni  <rs type="work">'grel</rs> par shin tu gsal bas <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3806">kho bo</rs>s ma bris te yi ge'i don cung zad tsam phye bar zad do|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-05-39"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA chen po</rs>s dang po rtogs dka' ba gyur ba las mdo dang <rs type="work">'grel</rs> par bltas shing go mi chen po la dris pas gsungs pa shin tu legs pa ste gzhan ni gzhung las kyang don gyi thugs la dri ba'i rna chung gsungs zhes blta ba'i spyod yul la mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba'i don ni ko shi ka 'di la nas te|_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rnam pa ma lus pa spros pa bdag gnyis dang yod med la sogs pa'i zhi bar sgom pa'i sbyor ba'o|_|</seg>
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-99"/>
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-77"/>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2608-11-36"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">sngon gyi slob dpon</rs> srid pa dang lta ba'i kun 'dzin bcad pa'o|_|zhen bya'am bzung bya ma grub pa de nyid yul gyis gsal bar mdzad pa ni rab 'byor gyis zhes zhus pa bzung bya'am zhen bya'am zhen bya yul grub bam slar dris pa dang ma grub pa khas len pa'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-66"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA chen po</rs>'i yang na sbyor ba ni dang por zhen pa'o|_|rjes su sbyor ba ni phyi nas shin du zhen pa'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2516-45-33"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA chen po</rs>s nyid kyi dpe la bcug zhes shA ri'i bus smras pa 'on te sad nas zhes te rmi lam nyid kyi la yang sbyor ba dang rjes la sogs pa ci rigs pa'i las kyi lam yod pas so|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-11-18"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA chen po</rs>'i zhal nas 'di ni mi bzang ste de lta na rnam pa 'ga' dang 'ga' la _sa dman po'i gnas skabs dang por slob pa'i sbyor ba dag kyang mkhyen pa gsum gyi phyogs su 'gyur zhing |_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pas thams cad kyi yul rtogs pas de'ang sbyor ba'i phyogs su 'gyur bas so|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-11-57"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas 'di nyid gzhan la ma ltos par rnam par 'jog nus pa'i khyad par du gsal te|_mtshan nyid de'i sbyor ba dang zhes bya ba dang |_yul ni rnam pa gsum po rgyu|_|sbyor ba bzhi'i bdag nyid dang |_|zhes _rje _btsun _gyis _gsungs _pa _ji lta ba'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-12-24"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas b+he _ra _ba _ma _hA_b+he _ra _ba _zhes bya ba _'jigs _sgrog _dang 'jigs _sgrog _chen _po _zhes _bya _ba'i _don _to|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-12-56"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA ba chen po</rs>'i zhal nas sbyor ba la mi 'khrul ba'i chos sbyor ba las gzhan rtags su bstan pa'o ||
         </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2608-13-34"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">slob dpon bdag nyid chen po</rs>'i bshad par rtog pa rnams yum gyi sbyor ba las ldog pa dman pa dgu'i yul can du gsungs pa ni dpyad par bya ba'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2608-14-14"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">slob dpon bdag nyid chen po</rs>s ni mdo las rtog pa 'di dgu'i gnyen po dgu yul gyis gsungs pas yul de dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid dgu dang ldan pa'i gang zag btags yod la bsam pa [- 364 -]    rtog pa 'phangs pa bstan bcos 'dir bsdus pas kun mkhyen gsum gyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba dang |_zhi lam nas gnyis su med pa'i bar la kun rmongs zhes bya ba'ang gnyen po'i yul de dag las ldog pa'i gang zag gi mtshan nyid kho na la yul can rmongs pa'am mi shes pa'am sgrib par btags pa'o|_|yul can ni de la rtog pa dgu po nyid do zhes gsungs mod kyi nyid kyi   <rs type="work">'grel</rs> pa 'di'i gzhung ji lta ba dang sbyar na ni sgrib pa dang kun rmongs don gcig pas gnyen po'i yul de rnams mi shes pa nyid rtog pa'am 'di rnams mi shes pa'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-13-17"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA chen po</rs>'i zhal nas dper na shing la me shor ba na me bsad kyang des byas pa'i sol dum la sogs pa'i rnam 'gyur mi ldog pa bzhin no|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-13-48"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA chen po</rs>'i zhal nas gzhan dbang btags pa dang bcas pa btags pa thams cad kyi stong pa med gzhi gzhan dbang rten 'byung sgyu ma la nus so|_|dang dngos po med pa rtogs par bya ba'i gzhi nyid la _rigs so|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-14-11"><rs type="person" ana="">slob dpon bzang po</rs>'i zhabs kyis dmigs _ pa la sogs pa 'di dag ting nge 'dzin de yir bshad pa'ang _<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas mi rigs pa med de rnam mkhyen dang de lta bu'i rgyu mthar thug gsum dmigs pa gcig la sogs pa la 'jug yin pas so zhes gsungs na rigs _par blta'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-14-36"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA chen po</rs>'i zhal nas b+ha ba dang b+hi b+ha ba zhes pa'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">sngon gyi lo tsA</rs>s dgag par ma go bar rnam par bsgyur ba de dgag pa ste mi sgom pa'am 'jig pa'o zhes sgom pa rnam par 'jig cing sgom pa dmigs su med pa nyid yul sgom par bstan pa ste|_de lta nu'i log rtog bkag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa la yid ches pa brtan pa kho na ting nge 'dzin 'di skye bas rgyu yin no|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2608-14-15"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">slob dpon bdag nyid chen po</rs>s ni zhus pa dang lan spyir gsungs pa gnyis su 'grigs so zhes gsungs pas|_de'i bshad pa ltar na lan spyir bstan la gnyis las sbyor ba nus pa [388-]  smin pa'i yum nyid kyis zin pas 'jug pa'i tshul ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nas so|_|de las skad cig re re la rtogs pa 'thob pa ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen po nas so|_|so so'i mtshan nyid bshad pa la bzhi las rnam smin ma yin pa'i gnas skabs kyi skad cig pa mdor bstan pa ni skad cig ma gcig gis zhes dbye ba sngon du bar nas sbyin pa la sogs zhes rtsa ba bzhi'o|_|'di rnam par dbye ba'i mdo la gsum las|_skad cig la kun mngon par rtogs pa'i don bstan pa ni gsol ba nas zhus pa dang lan gyis de gnyis kyi 'du shes ni yod med dang blang dor la sogs pa'i mtshan mar 'dzin pa thams cad do|_|rgyas par bshad pa ni gsol ba nas de nyid kyi mtshan nyid zhus nas gnyis 'dzin gyi mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan yum la 'bad rtsol dang sa bdun pa yin pa'i bcas par 'jug sbyor ba gsum ga mthar thug cing pa las sbyin pa la sogs pa re re mdun du byas pa nyid kyis tshul khrims la sogs pa rigs mthun pa dang rgyu 'bras su rjes su 'brel ba byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i chos ma lus pa mngon du byas shing bsgom par 'gyur ba ste|_sngar ni go cha sum cu rtsa drug la sogs pa re res drug drug bsdus par bshad kyang ldog pa'i cha btags par zad pa 'dir ni ldog cha btags pa la mi ltos kyi goms pa mthu smin pa'i chos nyid kyis bzo ba'i 'khor lo las cig car 'gul ba ltar thams cad mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ba'o|_|rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen po de gang gi tshe nas ni zag pa med pa byed pa po la sogs pa la bdag gi mtshan mar mi 'dzin pa dang |_dngos po dang bral bas nas ni dmigs pa med pas byed pa po la sogs pa la chos kyi mtshan mar mi zhen pa'i khyad par gsal bar mdzad pa'o|_|tshul khrims la sogs pa'ang de kho na ltar sbyar te rtsa ba re re nyid kyis der bzhi'o|_|des na rnam par smin pa'i gnas skabs kyi skad cig ma ni sa brgyad pa nas thob pa ste mdor bstan pa ni rnam par smin pa'i zhes don brjod nas gang tshe chos dkar zhes rtsa ba bzhis gsungs pa'o|_|'di'i mdo'i ni snga ma nyid kyi rgyun shes rab rdzogs par byed pas so|_|'di la gsum las rang bzhin ni rab 'byor gyis zhes dri ba [-391 -]      img. 422   from bdr:I1KG5853     sngon du btang nas yang dag pa'am nas te|_yang dag pa chos thams cad bden par gnas pa'am yongs su grub de tshad mas ji lta bar grub pa med pas spros pa thams cad mi dmigs pa nyid spros pa med pa'i dbyings mthong bar bsnyad pa'o|_|de nyid bye brag tu bshad pa gzugs kyi nas so|_|byed pa'i khyad par la bzhi las rang don gnyis kyi mngon zhen thams cad sel ba ni de shes rab kyi nas te gang gis na stong pa nyid bco brgyad kyis gang na rang bzhin med pa rtogs pas sel bas so|_|mngon zhen bsal ba'i rjes la yon tan thams cad bsgrub pa ni de dngos po med pa'i nas so|_|gzhan don gnyis la mngon shes lnga pos bsgrub pa ni de byang chub sems dpa' nas te mngon shes kyi rgyu dang ngo bo dang byed pa gsum mo|_|rdzu 'phrul gyis bsgrub pa ni de rdzu 'phrul gyi nas te 'jig rten thams cad du rgyu zhing longs spyod dpag tu med pa la sogs pa zhing yongs su dag pa gang mthong ba de lta bu bsgrubs pas 'gro ba tshim par byed la|_de'ang chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba med pa rtogs pas yongs 'dzin thams cad dang bral bar rang dbang du longs spyod pa la bkod nas gang 'tsham pa'i chos bstan pas yongs su 'dren pa'o|_|skabs gyi don bsdu ba ni rab 'byor de ltar nas te|_yang rab 'byor de ltar na nas ni snga ma dang gnyis ka'i don bsdu bar sbyar ro|_|cig car du skye ba dang 'gag pa gnyis ni 'bras bu dang rgyu'am dag pa dang ma dag pa gnyis dang sbyar ro|_|mtshan nyid med pa'i khyad par can ni sa dgu pa'i ste sa de la sems can smin pa'i spyod pa sbyin pa la sogs pa rmi lam lta bu la gnas nas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par skad cig la rtogs pa'i mthu thob pas so|_|'di la mdor bstan pa ni mtshan nyid med pa'i zhes don brjod nas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i zhes rtsa ba bzhi'o|_|'di rnam par dbye ba la drug las de rdzogs par byed pa'i don bzhag pa ni dang po'o|_|de la lnga las zhus pa ni de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis nas te mtshan nyid med la pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs pa dang |_chos rnams kyi rang bzhin tha dad pa dang |_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par chos thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i rnam dbye mi rung bar bsams pa'o|_|lan bstan pa ni de skad ces nas te de kho nar mtshan nyid med pa nyid kyis tha snyad sgyu ma la sogs pa lta bu la de thams cad 'thad pa'o|_|bshad pa ni de 'di ltar nas so|_|bsgrub pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te bden pa'i rang bzhin med bzhin du snang bar zad pas so|_|bsdu ba ni rab 'byor rnam grangs nas so|_|pha rol tu phyin pa lnga rdzogs par byed pa'i tshul so sor [- 392 -]      img. 423   from bdr:I1KG5853     bsgrub pa la lnga las|_sbyin pa la bzhi'i dang po la kun slong gi ni gang de ltar shes nas zhes yang dag pa'i lta bas zin pas so|_|nus pa'i ni de sbyin pa'i nas te pha rol tu phyin pa kun sdud par nus pa'o|_|byed pa'i khyad par ni de pha rol du phyin pa drug po nas te de las lam ma lus pa rdzogs par byed pas so|_|'bras bu'i khyad par ni de 'phags pa'i chos nas te 'di la gnyis las lam de dag nus pa smin pa las rdzu 'phrul gyi sbyor bas chos dang sems can smin par byed pa'i tshul ni de dang de dag gis yongs su sdud do'i bar ro|_|rang nyid srid pa dang zhi ba la mi gnas pa'i thabs la mkhas pa thob pa'i khyad par ni de dag pa'i rtsa ba de dag dang nas so|_|skabs kyi don bsdu ba ni de ci'i phyir nas so|_|dpe'i don gang yin pa ni rmi lam ltar mtshan nyid med pa ste|_bar chad dang bcas pa dang bar chad med pa ni de la mnyam par 'jog pas lhag par spyod pa dang sbyin pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa bsgrubs pas tshogs nyams su myong ba spel mar sgom pas so||_de rtogs pa smin pa'i gnas skabs 'dir ni gnyis ka ro gcig pa yang dag par 'grub pa'o|_|de'i shes byed lung ni ji skad du nas so|_|tshul khrims la brgyad las kun slong gi khyad par ni rab 'byor gzhan yang nas te mtshan nyid med pa rtogs pas so|_|rang bzhin ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen po de'ang nas te mtshan nyid med pa la sogs pa'i khyad par bcu bzhi dang ldan pa'o|_|dbye ba ni de la gnas shing nas te rgyu las dbye ba ni brda dang chos nyid kyis thob pa'o|_|ngo bo nyid las ni ming mthun pa'i phyogs sdom pa dang gnyen po rang don dang gzhan do la dmigs pa dge ba sgrub pa dang sems can gyi don byed pa'o|_|'bras bu las ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob nas 'gro ba 'dren pa sgrub pa spyad par bya ba dang |_rang gi su po zhi ba tsam sgrub pa mi spyad par bya ba'o|_|mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa ni de tshul khrims de lta bu nas te rang don du srid pa dang zhi ba'i bde ba gang yang don du mi gnyer ba'o|_|de'i 'thad pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te mtshan nyid med pa nyid kyis thob bya thob byed la sogs pa ma grub par rtogs pas so|_|byed pa ni|_byed pa ni rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nas te rang dang gzhan gyi don mtha' dag sgrub pa'o|_|de'i mi dmigs pa'i khyad par dpes bsgrub pa la gnyis las spyir ni de 'gro ba lnga'i nas so|_khyad par du ni rab 'byor 'di lta ste nas so|_|skabs kyi don bsdu ba ni rab 'byor de lta na nas so|_|bzod pa la lnga las kun slong ni rab 'byor gzhan yang nas te snga ma lta bu nyid do|_|rang bzhin la gnyis las dbye ba ni rab 'byor gyis zhes zhus pa dang lan gyis so|_|[- 393 -]      img. 424   from bdr:I1KG5853     so so'i mtshan nyid ni de la nyams su len pa'i nas te dang po ni ngag dang lus kyis gnod pa sna tshogs byed pa la gnod sems thag sring ba dang*|_rang gi las kyi nyes par lta ba dang*|_slar brtse ba rgyas par byed pa'o|_|gnyis pa ni yang yul de dag la bdag dang chos ci'ang ma grub pas sgyu ma lta bu gsog pa ni yang du yul de dag la bdag dang chos ci yang ma grub pas sgyu ma lta bu gsog nyid du rtog pa'o|_|byed pa la gsum las bstan pa ni de bzod pa'i nas te spang ba dang ye shes 'dren pa'o|_|bshad pa ni rab 'byor gyis zhes zhus pa dang lan gyis de 'di rdzogs pa mtshan nyid pa ni sngar sa brgyad pa la dang por 'thob pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa zad pa dang |_rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la dbang sgyur ba'i khyad par can no|_|thun mong yin pa'i khyad par ni gsol pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang nas te 'di ni sa der nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam shes pa bskyed pa'i khyad par du blta'o|_|'bras bu'i khyad par la gnyis las gnas skabs kyi ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' nas te lam gyi rigs ma lus pa shes pa rdzogs pa ni sa der 'thob pas de las rang dang gzhan gyi don rgya chen po 'grub pa'o|_|'dir ni de dag pas kyang ches yongs su smin pa la blta bar bya'o|_|mthar thug ni de sems can yongs su nas so|_|skabs bsdu ba ni rab 'byor de ltar na nas so|_|brtson 'grus la bzhi las kun slong ni yang dag pa'i lta bas zin pa rab 'byor gzhan yang nas so|_|rang bzhin la gsum las dbye ba ni rab 'byor gyis nas so|_|lus kyi ni de brtson 'grus nas so|_|sems kyi'ang de sems kyi nas te dkar po'i chos mtha' dag sgrub par byed pa'o|_|'bras bu ni de la spyod cing nas te ye shes dang bag chags spangs pa dang sku dang mtshan sa kun snang ni kun tu 'od dam bzhi ni rim par 'thob par brjod kyang lhan cig ldan pa nyid du blta'o|_|'phrin las ni de dag gi rjes la 'thob pa ste|_chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang de'i ltas kyi cho 'phrul _nga de dag gis gdul bya'i bya ba mtha' dag sgrub pa'i gsum mo|_|brtson 'grus la lhur bya ba bskyed pa ni rab 'byor de ltar phan pa nas so|_|bsam gtan la drug las kun slong ni rab 'byor tshad med kyi khyad par gzhan yang nas so|_|rang bzhin ni rab 'byor gyis nas te ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms 'jug ma lus pa la dbang sgyur ba'o|_|mi rtog pa'i ni gsum las bstan pa ni ting nge 'dzin de la nas te mi dmigs shing ro mi myang ba'o|_|bsgrub pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te bsul ma grub pas so|_|mjug bsdu ba ni de ci'i phyir nas so|_|byed pa la bzhi las mdor bstan pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi nas so|_|rgyas par bshad pa ni rab 'byor gyis nas te mi dmigs pa'i lam dam pa la bslabs gnas bya ma grub par shes pa pas so||[- 394 -]      img. 425   from bdr:I1KG5853     skyon med pa nyid bsgrub pa ni gsol ba bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' nas te brjod bya rjod byed kyi chos thams cad la dmigs pa dang mi dmigs par lta ba la skyon dang skyon med par gsungs pa'o|_|de'i 'thad pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te brjod bya'i mtshan nyid gcig dang du ma la sogs par ma grub pas de la ltos pa'i rjod byed kyang ming don bcas ma grub pas so|_|rab 'byor 'di ni nas te skyon med par 'jug pa thob pa'i che ba ste rang dang gzhan gyi don khyad par can 'grub pa'o|_|skabs bsdu ba ni rab 'byor de ltar nas so|_|rab 'byor gzhan yang zhes bya ba'i ngag 'di ni 'og ma'i skabs dgod par 'grigs te 'on kyang mdo sbyor mdzad pas snga ma'i zhabs su sbyar bar zad do|_|gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can du skad cig la rtogs pa mdor bstan pa ni gnyis su med pa'i nas brtsams te rmi lam dang ni zhes rtsa ba bzhi'o|_|'di ni sa bcu pa'i gnas skabs de 'dir gnyis su 'dzin pa'i bag chags phra mo'i gnyen po thob pas so|_|de ltar na skad cig ma gcig pa'i mngon par rtogs pa 'di bzhi ni bslab pa dang sgom pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa bzhir gyur pa'i sa bzhi'i gnas skabs yin pas na|_'bras bu rnam pa 'di bzhi ni|_|sa bzhi po la yang dag rten|_|mtshan med rtsol ba dang bcas par|_|gnas pa 'bras bu dang po yin|_|de nyid mngon 'du byed med dang |_|zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam smin ma yin pa rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs su rtogs pa la sogs pa shin tu gsal bar gsungs pa'o|_|des na <rs type="person" ana="">slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bzang po</rs>'i zhabs kyis <rs type="work">'grel</rs> chen du 'di bzhi rgyu 'bras rim can du skye ba dang*|_ngo bo gcig la cig car mtshan nyid bzhir brtag pa'i tshul gnyis bkod pa las|_snga ma ni gzhung ji lta ba'i bshad pa yin la|_phyi ma ni rang dgar zad do zhes <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3806">bdag</rs> gi bla ma bdag nyid chen po</rs> gsung ngo*|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2608-14-16"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">rje btsun</rs> gyis nyon mongs pa med pa dang smon nas mkhyen pa gnyis la khyad par ji skad 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas|_lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la sogs pa thams cad kyang shin tu sbyangs shing dri ma med la 'od gsal zhing mthar thug pa'i khyad par can du blta'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2608-14-17"><rs type="person" ana="">slob dpon seng ge bzang po</rs>s <rs type="work">'grel</rs> pa dag tu ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang chos sku so sor byas nas sku bzhir bshad pa ni mtshan nyid gzhi dang mtshan nyid dam|_yon tan dang de'i rten so sor dbye ba mi 'thad pa la sogs pa'i rigs pas gnod cing |_<rs type="person" ana="">rje btsun</rs> nyid kyis chos kyi sku mtshan nyid lnga dang yon tan lnga la sogs pa gsungs pa dang |_sku gsum dag gis sangs rgyas kyi|_|sku bsdus par ni shes bya ste|_|sku gsum dag gis rang gzhan gyi|_|don 'di rten dang bcas par bstan|_|zhes sku'i grangs nges pa sgrub pa gsungs pa la sogs pa'i lung mang po dang yang 'gal la|_lus rnam par gzhag pa'i chos sku zhes bya ba'ang 'bras bu sangs rgyas [- 398 -]     kyi sa'i spyi'i mngon rtogs su gsungs kyi|_sku bzhi par bzhed pa gtan ma yin pas rtsa ba'i rjod byed du ma zhugs pa'i phyir rang dga'i bshad pa kho na ste|_des na 'dir mdo sbyor ji ltar mdzad pa ltar sku gsum nyid don ji lta bar blta'o|_| <rs type="work">'grel</rs> par spyir 'chad pa ni de lta na don dam pa chos nyid kyi sku yin pas chos zhes bya ba tha snyad pa'i sgra mi 'grigs so snyam pa la|_rkyen phyis pas zhes gsungs pa ste|ta dang tal zhes bya ba nyid kyi sgra mi mngon par byas pa'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-15-15"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA ba</rs>'i bye brag tu bstan pa gsum la'ang go sla ba'i ched du mdzad de mchan du byas kyang legs pa la zhes bstan pa gsum dang bye brag tu bshad pa gsum gyis so|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2608-14-18"><rs type="person" ana="">rje btsun</rs> des mi mthong bar byin gyis brlabs pas so|_|du ba ni sgra gsang mthon pos so|_|cho nge ni dma' ba'o|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex5032023-05-2517-15-55"><anchor xml:id="a15"/> sgrol byed gzings gyur ba || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">bla ma lo ts+tsha chen po</rs>'i gsung sgros rnaMs ||                     <milestone unit="section" n="5"/>
        ji bzhin bzung ste <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3806">rang nyid</rs> dran phyir dang || blo dman <lb n="134b5"/> 'ga' la cung zad phan 'dod pas || brjed byang 'di byas bsod naMs gang bsags des || 'gro kun rgyal yum laM gyis myur 'dren shog ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5032023-05-0309-26-52" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4476">rgyal ba'i yum bar ma le'u brgyad pa nyi khri lnga stong ba mdo' 'grel rnam par bshad pa</rs> | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">bla ma rje brtsun</rs> gyi gsung la dka' ba mang pos nan tan byas nas <lb n="134b6"/> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3806">shakya'i dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas </rs>kyis rjed byang du bkod pa rdzogs s+ho ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex27012023-09-181" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="[149a3]"/> <rs type="work">man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa bcud kyi thig le</rs> zhes bya lung dang rigs pa la rtogs pa'i snang ba rgyas par gyur cing | bslab pa gsum gyi rgyan gyis mdzes pa| rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba rnams kyi nang na smra ba'i glang po dam par gyur pa <rs type="person" ana="">slob dpon shes rab</rs> zhes bya ba dang | theg pa mchog gi sgor zhugs cing brtul zhugs kyi khur bzung nas <rs type="place" ana="copusmd:namad_reference" ref="db:5908">dben <lb n="[149a4]"/>pa'i gnas</rs> su sgrub pa'i snying por mtshan nas brjod par dka' ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="3912">slob dpon tshul khrims skyabs</rs> zhes bya ba'i zhabs kyi rdul la reg pa mang du thos pa'i <rs type="person" ana="copusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3911">dge slong gzhon nu rin chen</rs> zhes bya bas legs par sbyar ba|  rdzogs s+ho|| |bkra shis so|| ||</seg>
source: 1_021_01_ gZhon nu rin chen_mngon par rtog pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel ba bcud kyi thig le.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50022023-10-131" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4835">gzhi lam 'bras gsuM gyi rnaM gzhag </rs>
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">smon laM tshul khrims</rs> gyis mdzad pa bzhugs</seg>
source: 2_050_02 Gzhi lam 'bras gsum gyi rnam gzhag.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex50022023-09-125" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4835">shes rab kyi pha rol <lb n="69a9"/> tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa legs par bshad pa skyes bu'i don grub</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">mang du thos pa'i shakya'i dge slong smon lam tshul khrims </rs>kyis | bla ma dam pa mang pos byin gyis brlabs shing | <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">mkhas btsun gyi 'dus pa phan bde'i 'byung gnas dpal snar thang gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du <pb n="69b"/><lb n="69b1"/> ma?yongs su rdzogs s+ho || × rten 'gro ? yin_no| × <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="4836">glan ston<anchor xml:id="a3"/></rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4836">bdag</rs> gis bris |</seg>
source: 2_050_02 Gzhi lam 'bras gsum gyi rnam gzhag.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1112024-01-23-3" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3749">theg chen<anchor xml:id="a7"/> bla ma'i bstan bcos</rs> 'di bshad pas<anchor xml:id="a8"/> || bsod nams thob des sangs rgyas thams cad dang ||<lb n="40a3"/> mnyam pa'i chos nyid <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">bdag </rs>gis myur thob shog ||||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1112023-10-18" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4441"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3749">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos</rs> kyi don bsdus pa</rs> || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">smra ba'i seng ge | ngag gi dbang phyug | 'chad gra'i slob dpon | sgra sgyur gyi lo tsa ba chen po | rngog dge slong blo ldan shes rab </rs>kyis mdzad pa <lb n="40a4"/> rdzogs s+hyo ||<anchor xml:id="a10"/> he he || ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex3052023-11-241" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">slob dpon bdag nyid chen po</rs>s sbyar ba | 'di nyid kyi don bsdus ba dang | 'grel ba rung ba'i bshad sbyar gyi rjes su 'brangs te rtogs par bya'o || 'dir ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3806">kho bo</rs>s skyes bu dam pa de'i gsung gi bdud rtsi'i zer ma la gces spras byas te | <lb n="[84b1]"/> tshig gi cha ji tsam rnyed pa de brjed byang du bkod pa yin no ||<rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4464">'phags pa brgyad stong pa'i 'grel pa</rs>'i don cung zad | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3806">dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> kyi brjed byang du bkod pa yin no ||||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex3052023-11-2489" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="">bzang po</rs>s <lb n="[84b2]"/> rgyan gyi snang ba mdzad || 
         <lb n="[2]"/> des kyang mi gang la rjes 'jug gdul bya la || rgya bod 'dran<anchor xml:id="a7"/> zla bral ba'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3806">gro lung ba</rs>s || <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">rgyan gyi snang ba'i rnam bshad </rs> phul byung mdzad ||'di la ma rten 'grel chen phyogs mthong med || <lb n="[3]"/>
         don 'di mthong nas <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">mkha' spyod dbang po nga</rs>s || bka' brgya phrag mang po dang du blangs || dad ldan <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">rngor bsam bza' mi</rs> rnams dang ni || <lb n="[84b3]"/> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">dpal<anchor xml:id="a8"/> ldan bkra shis mgon </rs>gyis sbyin bdag byas || gzhan yang 'di phyir dal bab 'bad pa'i || dge 'di dang dus gsum dge pa yis || yab sras bstan pas phyogs bcur khyab bar shog ||||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50182024-09-161" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3975">kha mo ze'u zhes grags pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chu mig <lb n="1b3"/>pa chen po de</rs> .| dpal rdza ra'i sa'i char ze'u'i rgyud du 'khrungs | dgung lo bco brgyad la <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3807">dge bshes 'bre shes rab 'bar</rs> la mkhan po zhus nas rab du byon te <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3809">dge bshes khyung <lb n="1b4"/>rin chen grags</rs> la dbu tshad dang spyod phyogs brlabs shing zhar chos <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3834">rgya</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4206">stag</rs><anchor xml:id="a1"/> gnyis la gsan skad | de nas mkhan po la pha rol du phyin pa lo drug gnan te mdo 'grel dang bcas pa <lb n="1b5"/>mtha' dag par mkhyen |</seg>
source: 2_050_18_chu mig pa chen poi rnam thar.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50182023-09-20-094538" status="unreviewed"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (4a4-5, p.357)] "/>
        <lb n="[4a4]"/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3975">dge ba'i bshes gnyen chu mig pa chen po</rs>'i yon tan gzhal du med pa las | phyogs tsam mtshon pa'i phyir <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">snar thang</rs> du sdebs pa'o ||
         <milestone unit="section" n="[Post-colophon annotations (4a5, p. 357)]"/>
         <abbr>zhus so|| || ||</abbr></seg>
source: 2_050_18_chu mig pa chen poi rnam thar.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex703_12352023-06-06" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ref="db:0">bslab pa kun las btus pa’i don bsdus pa</rs> ni rnaM pa gsuM te | [1] rtsoM pa dang ‘brel pa’i don dang | [2] skabs kyi don dang | [3] mthar phyin pa’i bya ba’o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1062023-05-241645" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4433">dag yig nye mkho bsdus <choice><corr>pa</corr><sic>pe</sic></choice><note type="editorial">A vowel <mentioned>e</mentioned> was mistakenly added to <mentioned>pa</mentioned>, no deletion is visible.</note></rs> <rs type="person" ref="db:3786" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">shAkya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis mdzad pa <abbr>bzhugs so</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1062023-05-241649" status="reviewed"><pb n="1b"/><lb n="1b1"/> na mo <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">gu ru</rs> |
         <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4433">dag yig nyer mkho bsdus pa</rs> <abbr>bzhugs</abbr> zhes bya ba |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1062023-05-241653" status="reviewed"><lb n="1b2"/>dang 'di 'jug go zhes bde blag tu rtog par bya ba'i phyir <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4433">bstan bcos 'di</rs> rtsom mo <choice><reg>|</reg><orig/></choice></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1062023-05-241654" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4433">bstan bcos 'di</rs>'i sdom tshig ni | spyir bstan grangs nges tshig phrad dang | 'phul dang brten pa'i spang blang dang | dmigs gsal <lb n="1b3"/> so sor dbye ba ste || rnam pa lnga yis bsdus pa yin || zhes bya'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1062023-05-241655" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> sa mthar shes zhes zer | mi 'thad par mthong <rs type="person" ref="db:3786" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference"><choice><sic>kho ba</sic><corr>kho bo</corr></choice></rs>s 'dor |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1062023-05-241656" status="reviewed"><lb n="4a4"/>ces ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> smra |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1062023-05-24.16.57" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="4433">dag yig nye mkho bsdus pa</rs> <pb n="9a"/><lb n="9a5"/> zhes bya ba | <rs type="person" ref="db:3786" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">shAkya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis phyogs gcig tu sdebs pa'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex28022024-09-2015-39-31" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="[503:6]"/> 'grel rnams || 
            yang<anchor xml:id="a4"/> du byas ste<anchor xml:id="a5"/> legs par bshad mod na'ang; 
            <rs type="person" ana="">bdag</rs> blo byis pa'i dbang gyur 'gal 'khrul rnams || 
            <rs type="person" ana="">daM pa rnaMs</rs> kyis bzod par mdzad du gsol || 
            <rs type="person" ana="">bdag</rs> gi phan sems rgya mtsho las 'ongs pa'i || 
            sgrung 'grel<anchor xml:id="a6"/> ngo mtshar <abbr>rin chen</abbr> phreng ba 'di || 
            skye rgu'i blo yi dbul ba brtan<anchor xml:id="a7"/> bcoM nas || <rs type="person" ana="">kun mkhyen rgyal [503:6] ba</rs>'i dpal gyis 'byor gyur 1 |
            <rs type="person" ana="">bdag</rs> kyang <rs type="deity">'jam pa'i dbyangs</rs> kyis rjes bzung ste || 
            thos bsaM sgom pa'i dpal 'byor gyis phyug cing || 
            <abbr>'bras bu</abbr> sku 4'i dngos grub myur thob nas || 
            <rs type="deity">kun tu bzang po</rs>'i dpal la spyod par shog || 
         dpe<note type="gloss">'</note> legs la dag pa 'di ||<anchor xml:id="a8"/> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6857">dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa</rs>||
         <anchor xml:id="a9"/> yon tan dbang phyug gis <lb n="[503:7]"/> bsam pa bzang ba'i dgongs<anchor xml:id="a10"/> sgo nas × bzhengs pa lags || 
         MaNGgalaMb+hazhutu; shub+HaM; zhus dag| × dge|<anchor xml:id="a11"/>
      </seg>
source: 1_028_02_ dBang phyug rin chen _ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i sgrung 'grel.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19062023-07-2412-53-29" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work">dbu ma'i man ngag gi 'buM</rs> |</seg>
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19062023-07-2412-53-30" status="unreviewed"/>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19062023-07-2412-53-31" status="unreviewed"><lb n="6a8"/> gyis grub par 'byung yang <rs type="person" ana="">dge bshes ston pa</rs> gsungs pa bzhin yin | |</seg>
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19062023-07-2412-53-56" status="unreviewed"/>
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19062023-07-2412-53-22" status="unreviewed"/>
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19062023-07-2412-53-41" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="">dge bshes ston pa</rs> dang </seg>
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19062023-07-2412-58" status="unreviewed"/>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19062023-07-2412-59" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (16a5–16a7)"/>
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bdag</rs> gis brjed byang 'di bris pas || mtha' yas sems can ma lus kun || lta bas rmongs par ma gyur cing || <lb n="16a6"/>spyod pa shin tu dag 'gyur te || gol ba'i lam du mi 'gyur zhing || 'og myin gnas su 'gro bar shog || || || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bdag</rs> kyang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bla ma</rs>'i bka' drin gyis || sa rab dga' ba thob bar du || stong dang snying rje brtan pa dang ||<lb n="16a7"/>bdag dang gzhan du brje bar shog || || <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4605">bden chung gi 'bum</rs> | rdzogs s+ho | | | | rdzogs s+ho | |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex18012024-09-1009-01-21" ana="corpusmd:colophon" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4590"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3746">theg pa chen po <abbr>mdo sde'i</abbr> rgyan</rs> gyi legs bshad bstan pa'i nyi ma</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3900">lung dang rig pa smra ba'i <abbr>dge slong</abbr> 'jam rin</rs> gyis chos gra chen <lb n="160a4"/>po <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5652">bde ba can</rs> du sbyar ba 'di yongs su <abbr>rdzogs s+ho</abbr></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex47032023-10-111" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4795">sher phyin sgom don</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3977">nam_mkha' grags</rs> kyis mdzad pa</seg>
source: 2_047_03 Shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgom don rin chen spungs pa.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex47032023-09-121" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (5a5-5b2) (p. 217-218)]"/>
             <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4795">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsgom don rin chen spungs pa</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3977">shAkya'i dge slong nam mkha' grags</rs> kyis sbyar ba'o || ||
