               <lb n="5b1"/><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">dam pas bsngags pa'i gnas dpal snar thang gi dben gnas</rs> su <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3977">bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen snar thang pa bdun par byon pa</rs>'i phyag dpe las <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5788">btsun pa grags pa rgyal mtshan</rs><anchor xml:id="a1"/> <lb n="5b2"/>gyis <hi rendition="#Time">'brug gi lo ma rgyu'i zla ba'i yar tshes bcu<anchor xml:id="a2"/></hi> la bris so || bdag gzhan thams cad smin cing grol bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol || bkra shis |||||| </seg>
source: 2_047_03 Shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgom don rin chen spungs pa.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex13022024-09-1315-49-37" status="unreviewed"><lb n="N005"/>bshad pa'i don yang dag par bsdus pa'o || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">shag kya'i dge slong brtson 'grus seng ge</rs>s sbyar ba'o || rdzogs s+ho || dgyes par zhu'o || ||
				<lb n="N007"/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5880">thugs rje rgyal</rs> gyis bris <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5930">lha rje chos rin</rs> thugs</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex3032023-07-1009-21-34"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4459"><note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">rngog</rs></note><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786"> lo tsha ba chen po</rs>'i rnam thar <abbr>bzhugs so</abbr></rs> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex3032023-07-1009-26-08" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4459"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">bla ma rje btsun <lb n="24b4"/> dam pa <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4332">gsang phu</rs> lo tsha<anchor xml:id="a51"/> ba chen po</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">rngog blo ldan shes rab</rs></note> la bstod pa'i tshig le'ur<anchor xml:id="a52"/> byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa</rs> | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3806">shAkya'i<anchor xml:id="a53"/> dge slong <note type="gloss">gro lung pa chen po</note> blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> kyis sbyar ba <lb n="24b5"/> rdzogs s+ho ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex3032023-07-1009-32-56" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="24b6"/> par<anchor xml:id="a55"/> legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis rnam par sbyar ba'i gtsug lag gi tshogs mtha' yas pa kun du snang bas <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5559">gangs ri 'i khrod</rs> na gnas <lb n="24b7"/> pa'i blo'i mig<anchor xml:id="a56"/> yongs su dag pa'i skye bo rnams la kun du<anchor xml:id="a57"/> ston par mdzad pa'i <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4459"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">skad 2 smra ba chen po blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyi rnam par thar pa</rs> |<anchor xml:id="a58"/> de nyid <lb n="24b8"/> kyi sras kyi thu bo sdom brtson  <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3806">sde snod 'dzin pa chen po <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3806">gro lung pa</rs></note>blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> shes<anchor xml:id="a59"/> bya bas rnam par spel ba yod do zhes<anchor xml:id="a60"/> lung rin po che'i tshogs <lb n="25a1"/>kyis rnam par phyug pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4136"><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> dge ba'i bshes gnyen<note type="gloss"> chag </note>nyi ma</rs>'i gsung las <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5838">dge slong 'phags pa</rs>s gsal bar thos nas |<anchor xml:id="a61"/> gtam gyi skyes rmad <lb n="25a2"/> du byung ba de<anchor xml:id="a62"/> lta bu rna ba'i snod du nye bar lhung na ci ma rung snyam du bsams nas |<anchor xml:id="a63"/> ring du 'gro ba'i pho nya dag la nye bar 'gugs pa'i spying yig rnam <lb n="25a3"/> par springs pa'i don |<anchor xml:id="a64"/> <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4387">dpal rte'u ra'i gtsug lag khang</rs> na gnas pa'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams</rs> kyis bsgrubs pa 'di <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5838">bdag</rs> gi sug tu <lb n="25a4"/> thengs<anchor xml:id="a65"/> nas |<anchor xml:id="a66"/> lcags pho<anchor xml:id="a67"/> rta'i<anchor xml:id="a68"/> lo zla ba gcig pa la shin du<anchor xml:id="a69"/> dag par byas pa'o || dge'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex3032023-09-09-09-45"><milestone unit="section" n="Addition (25a5–25a8)"/>
            <milestone unit="section" n="[1]"/>
          <lb n="25a5"/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4460">gnyal gyi bri las</rs> kyi ------</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex3032023-07-1009-37-15"><milestone unit="section" n="[2]"/><anchor xml:id="a72"/>
         shar du <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">phya pa</rs>s rnam nges 'chad || lho ru <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">phyi 'u</rs>s <?oxy_comment_start comment="=rgya mching ru ba ?"?><?oxy_comment_end?> phar phyin bshad || nub tu <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">rin tshul</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="Rin chen tshul khrims" db:5954?><?oxy_comment_end?> mngon pa <note type="gloss">kun las btus</note> ston || byang du <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">yon <lb n="25a6"/> shes</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="yon tan shes rab"?><?oxy_comment_end?> 'dul ba bshad<anchor xml:id="a73"/> </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex3032023-07-1009-37-17"><milestone unit="section" n="[4]"/>
            <lb n="25a8"/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4460">gnyal gyi bri ldas</rs><anchor xml:id="a74"/> kyi'o || dge'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex10032023-07-2412-45-03" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4518">ghu ru sta ba</rs> | bod skad du | <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4518">bla ma la bstod pa</rs> |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex10032023-07-2412-45-04" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="">smra ba'i seng ge</rs>r grags || nyi zla bzhin du ma rig nyon mongs sel ||bsdu' bzhis bdag sogs 'gon med smin grol mdzad ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex10032023-07-2412-45-052" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4518"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:"><!--TODO can't find ref gzhon nu byang chub in APIS-->shag kya'i dge' slong gzhon <lb n="158a6"/> nu byang chub</rs> la bstod pa</rs> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex10032024-09-1111-36-00" status="unreviewed"><rs type="deity">bde' bar gshegs pa</rs>'i bka' rab 'byams<anchor xml:id="a4"/> dri ma med pa'i gsal byed | rmongs pa rnams kyi long khrid pa bla ma rnams kyi gsung gi rtogs pa'i myu gus (read gu'i?) rgyud brlan pa | mtshan thos pa tsam gyis 'gro ba skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi don mdzad spyod pa | dpag du med pa'i don 'byung pa'i gzhi rgyal ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo rgyas 'bring gsum rtogs pa'i shes rab thun mong ma<anchor xml:id="a5"/> yin pa dang ldan pa'i <rs type="person" ana="">bla ma</rs>s | dad pas rta la brtson 'grus<lb n="158a8"/> kyi lcag gis bskyod pa'i (read: pas?) chos brgyad spangs pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gnang ba'i dus su | gus pa dang dad pas gzhi bzung brtson 'grus dang shes rab kyis khyad par can gyi don la phyogs pa'i | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3863">shag kya'i dge slong gzhon nu byang chub</rs> kyis legs par mnyan pas | tshig dang don gyi rtogs pa phyin ci ma log pa mnyam pa med pa (read pas? |or| pa las) thob pa'i dge ba des skye bo kun yum la mos pa dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bdag</rs> nyid kyi rtogs pa brtan par 'byung par shog ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44012023-10-11" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4760">chos mngon pa mdzod kyi sbyor tik</rs>rs bzhugs s+ho || dge'o ||</seg>
source: 2_044_01 chos mngon pa mdzod kyi sbyor tig.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex44012023-09-12"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">grub pa brnyes pa</rs> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">mkhas btsun</rs> stong phrag du ma byon cing bzhugs pa'i gnas mchog <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">chos <lb n="38a4"/>grwa chen po dpal snar thang gi gtsug lag khang</rs> gi 'khris na yod pa'i <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5663">mthong smon dgu gling</rs> gi bzhi thog tu | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">mchims sku mched</rs> <anchor xml:id="a3"/>kyi zhabs kyi pad mo la spyi bos gtugs pa'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4016">shAkya'i btsun pa bsod nams <lb n="38a5"/>ye shes</rs> kyis legs par sbyar ba'o ||
            <milestone unit="section" n="Post-colophon verse"/>'dis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang | 'gro ba mang po la phan par gyur cig || 
            <milestone unit="section" n="scribe colophon"/> <lb n="38a6"/>yi ge pa ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5770">rin chen bzang po</rs>'o || dge'o || bkra shis par gyur cig |||</seg>
source: 2_044_01 chos mngon pa mdzod kyi sbyor tig.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex61122023-09-1312" status="unreviewed"><milestone unit="section" n="[Incipit (1r1-5)]"/>
         || dpa' le'u 'di' yi nang na|| || <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4895">bstan la rgyas pa rgyan gyi nyi 'od</rs> || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">rigs pa'i ral khri</rs>'i bka' hee || 
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5098">dge'dun bzang po</rs>'i dpe dge'o ||
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4070">blo gros seng ge</rs> zhes pa grigs pa'o||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex61122023-09-131" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4895">bstan pa rgyas pa rgyan gyi nyi 'od</rs> 'di | mthong bas skal ldan dga' ba bskyed pa dang | dam pa rnams kyi sku drin dran bya'i phyir | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s legs par bkod pa yin ||
         <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4895">bstan pa rgyas pa rgyan gyi nyi 'od</rs> ces bya ba | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">mang du thos pa'i dge slong bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s sbyar ba   rdzogs s+ho || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex61122023-09-13-102" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">dpa' ldan ral gri</rs>'i bka' la 'dud || zhu s+ho || dge'o|| sa mtha'i dge slong <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5098">dge 'dun bzang po</rs> <anchor xml:id="a1"/> ngas || thub bstan sgor zhugs sgo gsum chos dang bstun || bla ma'i gsung bzhin gsung rabs mang du mnyan || de don nyams blang dog chen grub par bsngo || 
         laM lta ma|| dpe 'di <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5842">slob dpon zhang</rs> gis <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5541">nyang stod</rs> nas gdan drangs nas <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4070"><abbr>blo gros seng ge</abbr></rs>s <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5697">brag dkar</rs> du <hi rendition="#Time">shing? phag ma</hi> <abbr>bris so</abbr> || 1 <abbr>zhus so</abbr> | dag go | dag go</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex2032023-07-2115-18-25" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4455"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3711">mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel pa</rs> rnaM 'byed</rs> ces bya ba</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex2032023-07-2115-18-26" status="unreviewed"><?oxy_comment_start comment="=Ajita"?><?oxy_comment_end?> mched dang <rs type="person" ana="">rnam ‹gr(o)l sde›</rs> <rs type="person" ana=""><?oxy_comment_start comment="=Ārya-Vimuktisena and Bhadanta-Vimuktisena"?><?oxy_comment_end?></rs> gnyis dang ||
           <rs type="person" ana="">seng ge</rs> ‹(<rs type="person" ana="">bzang po</rs> dang|ste ?)›
                      <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">blo ldan <quote type="gloss">shes rab</quote></rs> <quote type="gloss">dang</quote><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3809">rin chen <quote type="gloss">grags</quote></rs> <quote type="gloss">dang</quote>  <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3807"><note type="gloss">shes rab</note> 'bar</rs> || gang gi gsung gi 'od zer gyis || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3816">bdag </rs>gi blo'i mun sel ba'i || bla ma rnams la gus btud nas ||[4]don gnyer skyes bus bskul gyur bas || gzhan phan bsam pas shes rab kyi ||  pha rol phyin pa'i tshig don gyi || <lb n="33b3"/> gsal byed cung zad <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3816">bdag</rs> gis bri ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex203_2024-09-1111-40-41"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">rj[e] btsun khyug</rs> gi lugs<anchor xml:id="a5"/>| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">lo tsa ba</rs> ltar na rim pa bzhin bzlog</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex203_2024-09-1111-40-412"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">lo tsa ba</rs> ltar na dngos su yul lam gsum bstan pas yul can lam shes shugs la mtshon nas ston pa yin no zer |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex203_2024-09-1111-40-4131"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">lo tsa ba</rs>s | klu sgrub kyi rjes su 'brangs pa de'i gzhung legs par mi shes pa<anchor xml:id="a7"/></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex203_2024-09-1111-40-4132"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">sp[o]ng zho lo tsha ba</rs> na re yang de ltar yod pa yin ste de skad| <rs type="person" ana="">spong zho lo tsha ba</rs> ni</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex2032023-07-2115-18-21" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3827">'brom</rs> shes pa dang byed pa gnyis <lb n="170a3"/> ni 'bras bu'i rtags yin la | khyad par ni rang bzhin gyi rtags yin zhing | ngo bo yang mtshan nyid rtags su bzhag pa'i rang bzhin yin no ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex2032023-07-2115-18-30" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work">mngon rtogs rgyan</rs> || <rs type="deity">mgon po</rs> yis ni sbyar ba mdzad ||  de dag rnaM par 'byed pa ni || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">bla ma seng ge bzang po</rs>s <lb n="[209a6]"/> mdzad ||  de dag rnaM par 'thag<anchor xml:id="a44"/> pa ni || bla ma daM pa'i rjes 'brangs nas ||  <rs type="person" ana="">shag kya'i dge slong byang ye</rs>s byas ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex2032023-07-2115-18-314" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="">bdag </rs>gis gang thob des ||  mtha' yas <abbr>seMs can</abbr> ma lus rnaMs || shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i yang ||  tshul la rtag du 'jug par shog ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex2032023-07-2115-19-25" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="">bdag </rs>kyang tshe rabs <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du || <anchor xml:id="a45"/> tshul de nyid las ldog ma <pb n="[209a8]"/> gyur ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex2032023-07-2115-12-46" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4455"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3711"><choice><reg><!--TODO--></reg><orig>eioiiioooieie</orig></choice></rs><anchor xml:id="a46"/> rnaM par 'byed pa</rs> zhes bya ba | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3816">shag kya'i dge slong byang chub ye shes</rs> kyis sbyar pa rdzogs so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex2032024-09-1111-45-20" status="unreviewed"><anchor xml:id="a47"/>‹lnga'i pa la bzhi' las bsngo' brgya bya ba'i dngos po ni  ces pa'o || ched du bya ba ni  ces pa'o || yul ni  ces pa ste | 2 su myed pa'i ye shes so || rang gi ngo bo›</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex75032023-09-281" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5203">sdom pa nyi shu'i 'grel pa gnas drug pas mdzad pa</rs> bzhugs so ||</seg>
source: 3_075_03 sdom pa nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa gnas drug pas mdzad pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex75032023-09-282" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:??"> <!--TODO ID work in APIS-->byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba rnaM par gzhag pa sdom pa nyi shu pa</rs> <rs type="person" ana="">slob dpon can dra go mi</rs>s mdzad par <rs type="work">rgya cher 'grel pa</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4079">rgyas sras dpal_ldan gnas drug pa</rs>s <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5756">chabs gser gyi lha khang</rs> <anchor xml:id="a1"/>du sbyar ba rdzogs so||</seg>
source: 3_075_03 sdom pa nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa gnas drug pas mdzad pa.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex76012024-09-1612-18-36" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><pb n="97a"/>         
            <lb n="97a1"/>blo ldan don du gnyer ba yi || bshes gnyen rnams kyis legs par bskul ba'i mthun || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4080">shAkya'i dge slong skyabs mchog dpal bzang po</rs>s || gzhung mchog 'di yi rnam bshar 'di byas so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex76012024-09-1612-39-18" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="colophon"/>
				<rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5209"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3715">dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab</rs> ces bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa ¦ tshig don rab tu gsal ba</rs> zhes <lb n="97a3"/>bya ba | gsung rab kyi de kho na nyid thugs su chung nas ¦ 'chad brtsod brtsom pa la snang ba rab tu rgyas pa'i ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">sde snod 'dzin pa nyi ma seng ge</rs> dang | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">dpal gsang pa 'dus pa</rs> dang | mtha' bral dbu ma chen po sogs ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">'phags pa klu sgrub</rs> yab sras kyi gzhung lugs la gzhan gyis brdzi bar mi nus pa'i so**d pa dge ba can pa <lb n="97a4"/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">yong dbon po shAkya seng ge</rs> dang | lung dang rigs pa'i de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log par smra zhing || 
					chos tshul 'dis la mi phyed pa'i dad pa can | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">mdo stod pa sangs rgyas 'bum</rs><!--maybe dbus pa blo gsal db:4091--> laswo pas bskul nas | 
					<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4080">shAkya'i dge slong skyabs mchog dpal bzang po</rs>s ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3725">dpal ldan zla ba grags pa</rs>'i 'grel ba bzhin du | dbang <abbr>phyug gi</abbr> lo ¦ smin drug can gyi <lb n="97a5"/>zla ba'i dkar phyogs kyi tshes bcu gsum la sbyar ba'o || <abbr>yi ge</abbr> pa ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6844">lung dang rigs par smra ba ¦ seng ge rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis <abbr>bgyis so</abbr> || 
				'di la <abbr>brten nas</abbr> <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> kyi bstan pa rin po che phyogs dang dus dang gnas skabs <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnab par gyur cig |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5020_2024-09-1111-32-43" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="10a2"/> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3890">bla ma </rs>yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen lung dang| mngon par rtogs pa'i chos kyis thugs brgyud ltam zhing | kun gyi bla mar gyur pa'i yon tan nam mkha' ltar <lb n="10a3"/> mtha' yas pa las mos gus kyi dran pa gso ba'i phyir| phyogs tsam zhig| <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">snar thang</rs> du bsdebs pa'o||<anchor xml:id="a1"/></seg>
source: 2_050_20 zhang ston chos kyi bla ma'i rnam thar.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex8602_202409182" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="Colophon "/>
        <lb n="95a7"/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5283">rnam bshad</rs> 'di ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">tshig nyung dus gzhung gi don rgyas par rtogs par 'dod pa</rs> <abbr>dag gis</abbr> yang dang yang du bskul nas | ° brtson dam pa mkhas pa'i <abbr>mchog grub</abbr> pa mnyed pa'i skyes bu <abbr>chen po</abbr> || snyan po dra gsung phyogs bcur ‹'ba'›phrog pa | rnam par dag cing lhun gyis grub pa'i <abbr>'phrin las</abbr> kyi bskal pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi <abbr>rnam par</abbr> 'dren pa | mtshangs <!--em: mtshungs--> pa med pa | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">yang dag pa'i dge ba'i <abbr>bshes gnyen</abbr> <abbr>smon lam</abbr></rs> gyi mtshan <lb n="95a8"/>dam pa'i zhabs rdul spyi bos yang dag par len pa | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6029">shAkya'i dge slong sbas ston dpal bzang po</rs>s sbyar ba || rdzogs so || </seg>
source: 3_086_02 dpal bzang_chos mngon mdzod rnam bshad.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex8602_202409183" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><abbr>bye brag</abbr> bshad mdzod nying khu lta bu yin | mngon mdzod gzhung don bde blag rtogs bya'i phyir | rnam bshad nying khu pa'i 'od 'dra 'di | rang dang gzhan la phan phyir <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:6029">bdag</rs> gis bzhengs | dge gshegs daM chos 'di dang mi 'bral zhing | 'gro ba °°<lb n="95a9"/>° mthug <abbr>rnam mkhyen</abbr> pa la 'god par shog |
        <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">mkhan chen pa</rs>'i phyag dpe 'di |  <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5284">dbyang dpal</rs> gyi legs par bris pa 'di dge zhing <abbr>bkra shis</abbr> par 'gyur gcig | shub+haM || || </seg>
source: 3_086_02 dpal bzang_chos mngon mdzod rnam bshad.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50052023-10-131" status="unreviewed"><milestone unit="section" n="[Title Page (ba 1a1-2)]"/>
            <pb n="1a"/><lb n="1a1"/>
         <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4845"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3743">slob dpon zhi ba'i lha</rs> nas brgyud pa'i byang chub kyi seMs sbyang pa</rs> <abbr>bzhugs so</abbr> ||</seg>
source: 2_050_05 slob dpon zhi ba lha nas brgyud pa'i byang chub kyi sems sbyong ba.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex50052023-09-123" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (6b4-5)]"/>
        <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4845">lag khrid</rs> <abbr>rdzogs so</abbr> || yI thI|| 
        <lb n="6b5"/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">bla ma snar thang pa brgyad par byon pa</rs> des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458">btsun pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan </rs>la gnang ste yi ger bris pa'o ||</seg>
source: 2_050_05 slob dpon zhi ba lha nas brgyud pa'i byang chub kyi sems sbyong ba.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50052023-09-194" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="[Post-colophon annotations (6b5-6),  in smaller characters]"/>
        <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">dben gnas snar thang gtsug lag khang mchog</rs> tu || 
        <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">mnyaM med bla ma sangs rgyas skyo ston</rs> la ||
        <lb n="6b6"/> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458">btsun pa ze ston chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis || 
        dad nas zhus shing phyag dpe dngos la <abbr>bris so</abbr>||</seg>
source: 2_050_05 slob dpon zhi ba lha nas brgyud pa'i byang chub kyi sems sbyong ba.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex76082023-09-13-14-26-49" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (6b8)]"/>
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5806">lha <abbr>rigs</abbr> 'od gsal rad Na ma martsi(?/mirba?/matis)</rs> bris pa la legs po ma byung pa bzhad gad mi mdzad par zhu | shu b+haM  ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex8032023-07-1011-42-55"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4207">blo chung ngur gyur kyang mchog du rlom pa kha cig</rs> <!-- Tshad bsdus=me dig pa--> mi srid pa ni mtshon bya la ye med pa dang ma khyab pa phyogs cig la med pa dang khyab ches gzhan la'ang zhugs pa yin pas de gsum du nges te <lb n="27'b3"/> mtshan nyid yin pa la de gsum dang bral dgos pa dang de gsum dang ma bral na mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro | de gsum dang bral ba tsam gyis mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba ma nges so zhes zer ba | 
            de'i ltar na mtshan nyid kyi skyon mi srid pa dang khyab ches pa gnyis su nges te mtshan nyid yin pa la de gnyis dang bral dgos pa'i phyir dang de gnyis dang ma bral na mtshan nyid <lb n="27'b4"/>  ma yin pa'i phyir ro |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex8032023-07-1011-39-07"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786"><!--rngog lo-->blo ldan bzang po</rs>s gzung yul dang 'jug yul gang gis <lb n="41b8"/> kyang khyad par du ma byas pa'i yul bden pa dang ldan pa dang rtog pa dang bral ba mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid du 'dod do |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex8032023-07-1011-40-09"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">blo ldan bzang po</rs>s the tsom dang ldan pa'i gzhi la shes 'dod 'jug rung du brjod pa'ang phyir rgol bsgrub bya'i chos la log rtogs dang ldan pa dang yid dpyod kyi nges pa dang blo kha ma phyogs pa'i gzhi la ma khyab pa dang | bsgrub bya'i chos la log <lb n="44a9"/> rtogs med na thal ba'i rtags ma grub la log rtogs yod na rang rgyud la shes 'dod med par 'gyur bas bsgrub pa'i thal 'gyur rgyun chad par yang 'gyur ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex8032023-07-2416-41-11" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bdag cag gi bla ma <lb n="50b3"/> dag</rs> dpe la yod pa tsam la mi rtag pas khyab pa nges pa'i shugs la mnyan bya'i yod pa la 'ang mi rtag pas ma khyab pa'i dogs pa mtshan nyid nges pa'i tshul gyis chod pas rjes 'gro dang gzhi la bkag pa'i ldog pa gnyi ga bsgrub bya ma grub pa'i snga rol du nges su rung par gsung mod kyi | </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex8032023-07-2416-41-36" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bdag cag gi bla ma kha cig</rs> yod pa tsam la mi rtag pas khyab pa nges pas sgra'i yod pa la mi rtag pas khyab pa shugs la grub par smra te | </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex8032023-07-2416-42-31" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bdag cag gi bla ma dag</rs> bsgrub bya ni gnyis te | rtags kyi nus pa'i yul gyi bsgrub bya dang | skyon yon bsam pa'i bsgrub bya'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex8032023-07-1011-41-02"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">blo ldan bzang po</rs>s rlom yul gyi bsgrub bya ba lang gi brda'i <lb n="80b9"/> rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba yin la nog dang lkog shal la rlom yul gyi bsgrub byas khyab pa'ang 'dod pas spyod pa'i brda' lan cig zhugs pas nges pa yin no |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex8032023-07-1011-35-29" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4503">tshad ma yid kyi mun pa sel pa</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">blo gsal zhing rigs par smra bas rtog ge ngan pa'i gzhung 'jig pa brtul zhugs mchog la legs par gnas pa'i dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s nye bar sbyar ba ||rdzogs s.hO ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex8032023-07-1011-35-30" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="96a4"/>mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas bsod nams dpal gyis brjid || legs gsungs dgongs 'grel chos kyi rin chen mdzod || dam pa'i 'phreng mdzes dge legs gang chen mtsho' || <rs type="place" ana="corpusm:named_reference" ref="db:4362">bri'u las gtsug lag khang</rs> du <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bdag</rs> gis bris || dge zhing bkris ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1072023-02-1410-45-44" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5537"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3713"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3694">bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po</rs> rgya cher bshad pa</rs> <choice><sic>'di</sic><corr>'i</corr></choice> don bsdus pa</rs> ni rnam pa bzhi ste | ngag dang po'i don dang | mdo'i lus rnam par gzhag ba dang | yan lag rnam par dbye ba dang | yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba'o || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1072023-02-1410-46-47" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:dgos_brel"><choice><orig>b(k)od</orig><reg>bkod</reg></choice> pa'i dgos pa ni | nges pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa dang | don du 'gyur ba'i the tshom gis 'jug pa dang | gzhan gi log par rtogs pa spang ba gsum bzhag nas | gzhung mdzes par bya ba yin no || zhes <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5530">skabs gzhan</rs> <choice><orig>‹du›</orig><reg>du</reg></choice> gtan la phab pa bzhin du shes par bya'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1072023-02-1410-26-37" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><!-- "slob dpon gzhan" might be Indian or Tibetan-->
            'on kyang <quote source="db:3694">'di skad bdag gis thos pa</quote> zhes bya bas gtsor brjod pa'i don ni phyin ci ma log pa <lb n="2a7"/> dang dngos nyid du yin ba dang | rtogs pa ma yin <choice><orig> ‹par›</orig><reg>par</reg> </choice><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">slob dpon gzhan</rs> gis bshad pa bzhin blta ste | 'dir ni cung zad nor par bshad pa yin no || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1072023-02-2412-02-43" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><!--kha cig could be Indian or Tibetan-->
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha<choice><orig>ci‹g›</orig><reg>cig</reg> </choice> </rs> las las kyi bdud dang lngar gsungs ba der ni nyon mongs pa dang las gnyi gas phung po<choice><orig>lha‹g›</orig><reg>lhag</reg> </choice> ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i<choice><orig>‹ba›r</orig><reg>bar</reg> </choice> du gcod pa'i <lb n="2b2"/> phyir ro || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1072023-02-1410-31-27" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5537"> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3713"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3694">shes rab snying po</rs>'i rgya cher 'grel</rs> gi bshad pa</rs>| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsa ba slob dpon blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho ||||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex13032023-09-0715-44-14" status="reviewed"><lb n="5a2"/> ces ltar snang ba mang po yis ||
zhing 'dir ring por mi thogs <choice><reg>zhub</reg><orig>'dub/zhub (?)</orig></choice> 'gyur bas ||
skyes bu spyad ldan rnaMs kyi <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus</rs> <lb n="5a3"/> gyis ||
<note type="gloss">ga</note> gzhung 'di chos kyi snying po la spyod kyang ||
'jig rten kun gyis cir mi shes pa'i ||
<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3839">dge slong seng ge</rs>s <lb n="5a4"/> snyigs ma'i mi rnams la ||
rang gi rnaM thar gtam du bsnyad pa yin ||
bstan pa'i gzhi dang rgyas dbye' bsgrub pa la | <lb n="5a5"/>
yang dag yang dag ma yin rnam dbye' dang ||
<note type="gloss">cha</note> rang gyi kun spyod gtam pa rnaM lnga 'di ||
shag kya'i bstan la rnaM <lb n="5a6"/> dag byi dor yin ||</seg>
source: 1_013_03_D_gTsang nag pa bstan pa byi dar bya.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex13032023-07-2512-47-06" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4555">bston pa'i bstan pa la byi dor bya ba'i tshigs su gcad pa lnga bcu pa</rs> ||<lb n="5a6"/>
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">shag kya'i dge slong <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">gtsang nag pa</rs></note> brtson 'grus seng ge</rs>s sbyar ba ||   </seg>
source: 1_013_03_D_gTsang nag pa bstan pa byi dar bya.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex4022023-10-11-101631" status="unreviewed"><pb n="1a"/><lb n="1a1"/> ‹(351)› @@ || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3806">dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gro lung pa blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> kyi mdzad pa'i <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4468">lam rim</rs> 'am <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4468">bstan rim chen po</rs> bzhugs so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex4022024-09-1315-30-44" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work">bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che la 'jug pa'i rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par </rs>[118a2]<rs type="work"> bshad pa</rs> || byang phyogs kyi rgyud kha ba can gyi ljongs su byung ba || bla ma rje btsun dam pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma'i ze 'bru spyi bos len pa<anchor xml:id="a69"/> || lung dang rigs pa'i gtsug lag dam pa rnams la yongs su sbyangs pa'i ngal ba mi dman zhing mi zhan la mi nyung byas pa || <lb n="118a3"/> rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dge ba can || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3806">shAkya'i dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> zhes bya ba thub pa'i brtul zhugs la legs par gnas pas rang gi dran pa goms pa spel ba'i brjed byang tsam du nye bar sbyar ba rdzogs ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex4022024-09-1315-23-40" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4134">rje klong rdol rin po che</rs> nas phran <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4132"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4134">klong rdol</rs> drung yig</rs> la <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3806">rje gro lung pa</rs>'i <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4468">bstan rim chen po</rs> 'di'i par zhig byung na brko rogs gyis gsungs kyang || phran rang nyid sngon bsags kyis sbyin 'bras phra bas gser dngul sogs kyi mthun rkyen [118a6] 'dzoms dka' bas tshe 'dir 'grub pa'i re ba dang bral zhing ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex4022023-10-11102522" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4134">rje klong rdol bla ma</rs>'i nye gnas <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4132">drung yig dam chos yar 'phel</rs> gyi rang gi blo gros kyi mig gi dog gnas gang shes thams cad gsar du bcos nas dag par bgyis pa dang ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex4022024-09-1315-25-43" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4132"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4134">rje klong rdol bla ma</rs>'i drung yig</rs> 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad nas ngal ba chen pos lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas || bstan bcos 'di nyid la sogs pa'i rnam dkar dge ba'i phung po che chung ji snyed cig byas pa thams cad ma gyur nam [120b3] mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la || byams pa dang snying rje'i rtsa ba can gyis byang chub kyi sems rin po che myur du rgyud la skye ba'i rgyur 'gro bar gyur cig || dge ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi <abbr>dug gsum</abbr> 'phel ba'i rgyu dang [120b4] sdig pa bsags pa'i rgyu la mi 'gro bar shogs shig ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5501b2023-01-2321-59-19" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ref="db:3775" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">'brel pa brtag pa</rs> la don brgyad ste ¦</seg>
source: 2_055_01b_Ral gri_brel brtag rab byed sa bcad.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5501b2023-01-2322-00-25" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ref="db:5532" ana="corpusmd:named_reference"><rs type="work" ref="db:3775" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">'brel <!--TODO check how insertion appears online--> <choice><orig>‹pa›</orig><reg>pa</reg></choice> brtag pa</rs>'i don <abbr>legs par</abbr> bsdus pa</rs> ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">bcoM ldan ral gri</rs>s bkod pa <abbr>rdzogs</abbr> s+ho |</seg>
source: 2_055_01b_Ral gri_brel brtag rab byed sa bcad.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex3022023-10-13" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4457">sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i rnaM bshad</rs> ¶ </seg>
source: 1_003_02_Ar_sher phyin sdud tshigs rnam bshad B_etext.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex3022023-10-132" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5830">slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="=Buddhaśrījñāna"?><?oxy_comment_end?> kho na'i rjes su 'brangs nas sbyar ba'i | <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4457">shes rab gyi pha rol du <pb n="[71a1]"/> phyin pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i rnam par bshad pa |</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3816">shag kya'i dge slong byang chub ye shes</rs> kyis mdzad pa ||rdzogs s+hO ||||</seg>
source: 1_003_02_Ar_sher phyin sdud tshigs rnam bshad B_etext.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex3022023-10-13-113" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4457">shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i || rnam par bshad pa</rs> 'di sbyar gyis ||</seg>
source: 1_003_02_Ar_sher phyin sdud tshigs rnam bshad B_etext.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex23012023-09-18-101" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="188b4"/> <rs type="work"> ma rig bdun sel bde legs pa yon tan gzhi </rs>|| <note type="gloss">bya</note>s**** bgrod ba chig [=gcig] pa'i lam || zab yangs thub pas gsungs pa'i spyod pa'i cha|| || <lb n="188b5"/> dgos 'dod kun gyi dpal? 'gyur <rs type="person" ana="">'gon [=mgon] po</rs>s phye || de'i rjes 'brangs <rs type="work">rnam nges gzhung 'grel pa</rs> mdzad || de dag la brten <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3712">seng ge bzang po</rs> yis || mdo'i thun mong rgyan gyur gsal mdzad don || mig gis sgra ltar 'phags pa'i bla'i yul ||blo sman<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3918">bdag</rs> gis rtogs par nus min pas ||<rs type="person" ana="">grol sde 'gos? kyi 'grel </rs>dang <rs type="work">ti ka</rs>|| |<rs type="work">'buM phrag gnyis kyi 'grel rgyan</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3807">shes rab 'bar</rs> ||<rs type="person" ana="">ye shes tshul <lb n="188b6"/> khrims bkra shis brtson 'grus</rs><!--maybe BDR PORK1459 pa tshab dga' ba gdong pa gnas brtan ye shes tshul khrims--> dang || <rs type="person" ana="">seng ge rnam gnyis grags rdo rje</rs> dang ||<rs type="person" ana="">brtson 'grus mtha['] can</rs> rnams kyi <rs type="work">man ngag</rs> dang || gzhung don rigs pas yun du spyad pa las || log rtog brgya phrag bsal nas leg[s] bshad rnaMs| |</seg>
source: 1_023_01_Shes rab mtha' can_mngon rtogs rgyan 'grel ba.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex23012023-09-18-102" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5657">gtsang dge'i 'byung gnas pa tshab dgon pa</rs> ru ||<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3918">shes rab mtha' can dge sbyong bdag</rs> gis bsdus || 
               de zer ma 'brel stong phrag rmig rjes chu || <lb n="188b7"/>khyad par gsum ldan legs rgya mtsho bzhin || zhe sdang phrag dog khengs pa kun spongs la || tshul bzhin seMs pa'i 'ba dgyes dpyad par gyis || ma rtogs rang dga' ba'i 'dod pas nyes bshad rnaMs | yang dag thugs su chud rnaMs bzod pa mdzod || de stem la 'byung dge ba gang cha des || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3918">bdag sogs</rs> 'gro mgon sa thob gyi bar |</seg>
source: 1_023_01_Shes rab mtha' can_mngon rtogs rgyan 'grel ba.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0116-20-34" status="unreviewed"><pb edRef="inst:5593" n="1b"/><lb edRef="inst:5593" n="1b1"/><pb edRef="inst:4770" n="1b"/> <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="1b1"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4771"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5553">tshad ma sde bdun</rs> gyi don phyogs cig du bsdus pa (g)zha(n) gyi phyogs tha(ms cad) las rnam par rgyal ba [zhes bya ba] | </rs></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-39-05" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">dbu ma snang sel ba kha <abbr>cig</abbr></rs> snang ba dgag bya yin zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-08-30" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><!--person could be Indian or Tibetan-->
            yang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">dbu ma ba kha cig</rs> snang pa la bden par zhen pa'i blo dgag bya yin ste | nyes pa thams cad <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="3a4"/> <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="3a4"/> kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-50-39" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos kyi seng ge</rs> na re snang ba stong ba'i tshogs don de bsgrub <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="4a3"/> bya yin zhing | snang ldog kun rdzob kyi bden pa stong ldog don dam pa'i bden pa bden 2 ngo bo 1 pa yin no zhe na |
            snang ba dang ngo bo 1 pa'i stong nyid de <lb edRef="inst:5593" n="tshe na"/> don dam  <lb edRef="inst:5593" n="3a9"/> pa'i bden pa ma yin te | skye 'gag byed pa'i phyir te | snang ba skye 'gag byed pa'i phyir ro | gzhan yang don dam bden pa skye 'gag byed par thal |<lb edRef="inst:4770" n="4a4"/>snang pa skye 'gag byed pa'i phyir | rtags tshad ma khyab pa med na bden gnyis ngo bo gcig pa nyams so ||
            'dod na 'gag pa med pa skye med pa zhes so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-29-19" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">gangs can pa</rs> thams cad sems tsam pa gnyis ka'i lugs <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="6b9"/> 'gog pa ni | rang gzhung sems tsam du bshad pa dang 'gal lo ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-51-23" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos kyi seng ge</rs> na re rtog pa'i mtshan nyid ni don spyi 'dzin pa yin <lb edRef="inst:5593" n="7a7"/> no zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0115-54-20" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:rtog_pa"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> na re rtog pa'i mtshan nyid sgra don 'dzin pa yin zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-51-43" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos kyi seng ge</rs> na re mtshan nyid tha snyad kyi mtshan nyid ni chos 3 tshang pa yin no ||
            gsum pa gang zhe na |
            mtshan gzhi la grub pa dang | rdzas su yod pa dang | rigs mi <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="13a2"/> mthun gyi spyi dang | dngos 'gal du gnas pa yin no zhe na |
            de ltar na mtshan nyid kyi rigs mi mthun spyi dang dngos 'gal du gnas pa yin nam mtshon bya'i rigs mi mthun spyi dang dngos 'gal du gnas pa yin | 
            dang po ltar na bum pa mi rtag par mtshon pa la rgyu rkyen las skyes pa mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i tshe | mtshan nyid <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="13a3"/> skyon med du thal | chos 3 po de thang pa'i phyir ro ||
            2 pa ltar na dkar zal ba glang du mtshon pa la nog shal lasogs pa 'dus pa mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i tshe mtshan nyid skyon med ma yin par thal | mtshan nyid de mtshon bya'i rigs mi mthun gyi spyi dang dngos 'gal ma yin pa'i phyir ro || 
            ma grub na nog shal lasogs 'dus pa <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="13a4"/> de chon | ba lang gi tha snyad byar rung gi ltago pa yin par thal | ba lang gi tha snyad byar mi rung dang dngos 'gal yin pa'i phyir ro || ba lang gi tha snyad byar rung nyid bzhin no ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-48-11" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> na re rgyu rkyen las skyes pa mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad du mtshon pa la mtshon bya'i don ldog gzhi la grub mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i tshe <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="13a5"/> mtshan nyid skyon med yin zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0116-13-00" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bsdus pa smra ba</rs> la mkhas par grags pa yang khan 3 du 'khams ngan zhes lan 'debs par snang ngo ||<lb edRef="inst:4770" n="13a9"/></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0115-54-39" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge na re</rs> | mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad de mtshan nyid ma yin pas nyes pa dang po med do || chos 3 tshang pa de mtshan nyid tha snyad kyis rang ldog la brten par ma zhugs pas mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad de rigs mi mthun yin yang khyab ches par thal ba'i skyon med do || chos 3 tshang pa de mtshon ldan gyi <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="13b8"/> gzhi la zhugs pas | mtshon bya la mi srid par htla ba'i nyes pa med do || zhes zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0311-17-10" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><lb edRef="inst:4770" n="14a5"/> bya de rten kyi rigs mi mthun dang bsal bya rigs mi mthun 2 su yod pa de khong du ma chud par rang gi mtshon bya rigs mi mthun du 'thad do zhes zer ba ni shes pa bas smra ba rings pa'i gtam yin no ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0116-11-03" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3887">'jam pa'i rdo rje</rs> na re | rang ldog rdzas ma grub kyi mtshan nyid ni | chos gang zhig mtshan gzhi la ji ltar bkod pa ltar grub cing don ldog kyang par ma grub <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="14b8"/> pa'o zhe na |
            bum pa dngos po'i tha snyad ud mtshon pa la ba lang gi tha snyad mtahn nyid du bkod pa de rang ldog rzdas ma grub ma yin par thal | gzhi la grub ma tshang pa'i phyir | 'dod na rang ldog rdzas yod du thal lo || des na rang ldog rdzas ma grub kyi mtshan nyid ni chos gang zhig don ldog kyang par ma grub <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="14b9"/> pa'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0115-55-06" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge na re</rs> gzhan gyi mtshon bya mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba yod pa yin te | nog shal lasogs 'dus pa mtshon bya | ba lang gi tha nsyad dang po de ba lang gi tha snyad 2 pa'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba bzhin no | zhes zer ba ni </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-52-17" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos kyi seng ge na re</rs> byas pa'i tha snyad byas pa'i tha snyad du mtshon pa la rgyu rkyen las skyes pa mtshan nyid du bkod pa de mtshon 'dod med nas mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi la <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="16a3"/> mi srid pa yin ste | mtshan gzhi dang mtshon bya tha dad med pa'i phyir ro zhe na |
            ba lang gi tha snyad tshad mas grub pa'i tshe nog shal lasogs 'dus pa de ba lang gi tha snyad la ltos te mtshan nyid skyon myed po ma yin par thal | <lb edRef="inst:5593" n="13a5"/> mtshon 'dod med pa'i phyir ro ||
            rtags tshad ma | khyab pa med na mtshon 'dod med pa mtshan nyid kyi skyon <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="16a4"/> yin pa nyams so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-49-30" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brton 'grus seng ge</rs> na re | sems can rtsam po la ba lang gi tha snyad khyab byed du mod (read: med) par mtshon <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="16b3"/> ************* mtshon par mi nus pas mtshan nyid kyi skyon can yin no || de yang mtshon bya la ltos pa'i skyon ma yin ste mtshan nyid kyis mtshan gzhi la ma khyab pa'i skyon yin no zhe na |
            rten rtsam du yod pa de gang zhes dri'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0115-56-03" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge na re</rs> | dkar zal mtshan gzhi ba lang gi tha snyad dkar zal kho na la yod par mtshon | nog shal laosgs 'dus pa dkar zla kho na la yod pa mtshan ynid du <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="17a4"/> ************* khyab ches nas mtshan gzhi ' dkar zla las gzhan nag sgyur la khyab ches pa yin zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-46-46" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba na re</rs> mtshan nyid kyi skyon 3 du ma 'dus pa rnam bcad med pa zhes bya ba'i skyon gzhan bzhi pa yang yod do ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-47-52" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3809">rin chen grags</rs> na re [gangs pa zhe'u]<!-- (compl. Tshad bsdus p.90= mtshan nyid kyi skyon thams cad mtshon bya mtshon pa'i rgyu mtshan du mi srid par 'dus zer ro ||(cf. Tshad bsdus accepted position p. 91)--></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-51-06" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> na re mtshon bya'i tha snyadkyi mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam par bzhag bya gzhi la grub pa yin zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-51-58" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5573">bdag gi yongs su 'dzin pa</rs> na re rdzas chos ldog chos kyi mtshyd ni rim pa bzhin du rang dang rdzas 1 pa'i chos ma lus pa la khyab byed du rten pa dang | rang dang rdzas 1 pa'i chos 'ga' zhig la rten yang 'ga' <lb edRef="inst:5593" n="18b9"/> zhig la mi<lb edRef="inst:4770" n="22b3"/> rten pa yin zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-53-31" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5573">bgag gi yongs su 'dzin pa</rs> na re | 'jig myed la byas yod bkag pa lta bu'i med dgag de rtags kyi bsgrub bya yin zhing rjes dpag gi gzhal bya yin la | 'jig myed byas yin la | 'jig myed byas <lb edRef="inst:5593" n="21b3"/> yod kyis stong pa'i tshogs don ma yin dgag de yang rtags kyi <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="25b4"/>bsgrub bya dang rjes dpag gi gzhal bya yin lo ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-46-28" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba chen po de na re</rs> | ljon shing 'gror snang gi shes pa kha dog la tshad ma yin zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-49-31" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos kyi seng ge </rs>na re rang yul la ltos te rtog pa'i rdzas dang bral ba de yin zer ro || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0115-56-24" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge </rs>rtog par mtshon pa'i mtshan gzhi ma yin pa de yin no zer |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-57-56" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha <abbr>cig</abbr></rs> mthun phyogs mi mthun phyogs kyi tshyad <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="43a2"/>  ni bsgrub bya chon dang bsgrub bya'i chos kyi spyis don mthun pa dang mi mthun pa de yin no zhe na |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0115-56-43" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> na re rtags chos can gyi phyogs 1 la grub kyang phyogs 1 la ma grub pa ni sgra la <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="46b4"/> rtsol byung khyab byed du yod pas mi rtag pa khyab byed du yod par bsgrub pa lta bu'am | sgra la rtsol byung rten rtsam du yod pas mi rtag pa khyab byed du yod par bsgrub pa lta bu'o || zhes zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0211-59-11" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><lb edRef="inst:4770" n="46b7"/> phyogs chos grub pas grub pa yin te | <?oxy_comment_start comment="[bold face in source document]"?>rigs kyi bye brag<?oxy_comment_end?> snang pa dang stong pa'i tshogs don chos can bsgrub pa'i tha snyad du byar rung ste | bsgrub chos ma dor ba yin pa'i phyir zhes rtags su bkod pa'i tshe | bsgrub chos ma dor ba de stong nyid la ma grub kyang snang pa la grub pas snang stong tshogs pa la brten pa'i phyogs chos grub pa bzhin no ||<lb edRef="inst:4770" n="46b8"/> spyi rtags su bkod pa'i tshe bye brag cig chos can la ma grub kyang bye brag 1 chos can la grub na phyogs chos grub pas khyab pa yin ste | rigs kyi bye brag grub pas spyi 'grub pa'i phyir | spyi chos can du bzhag pa'i tshe chos can gyi bye brag 1 la rtags grub kyang chos can gyi bye brag 1 'ang rtags ma grub na phyogs chos ma grub pas khyab pa yin no || zhes <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos 46b9 kyi seng ge </rs>smra'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-49-51" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos kyi seng ge</rs> na re rtags kyi tshyad phyoos dang ldog pa'i khyab pa 2 yin zhing rjes 'gro yod kyang rtags kyi tshyad ma yin no zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0116-22-19" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kun gyi bshes gnyen</rs> na re | go byed rtags kyi 'brel pa don la med de | spyi 'brel don la med pa'i phyir te | spyi don la med pa'i phyir dang | chos 1 la <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="54b1"/> 'brel pa mi 'thad cing 'brel pa po 'brel yul gyi chos 2 tshogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex450120240625352" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3775">'brel pa brtags pa</rs> las | <quote source="db:3775" n="v. 1">de phyir dngos po thams cad kyi || 'brel pa yang dag <abbr>nyid du</abbr> med</quote> ces so || des na 48b5 'brel pa don la med pas bsgrub bya'i chos dang rtags kyang don la med ces grag go ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0112-50-09" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">chos kyi seng ge na re </rs>thal 'gyur rang rgyud la mi 'khrul <lb edRef="inst:5593" n="63a7"/> ba yin te | de ('di) 2 rtogs pa gnad 1 pa'i phyir ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0116-15-50" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4771">gzhan gyi phyogs thamd las rnaM par rgyal ba</rs> zhes bya ba | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4018">rigs par smra ba'i dge slong sing ha shri</rs>s <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4332">gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du legs par brtsaMs te | <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5574">dpal rtse dkar gyi gtsug lag khang</rs> du yi ger bkod pa'o || rdzogs sho ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex45012023-03-0116-15-51" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4771">rigs pa'i de nyid gsal ba</rs> zhes bya ba | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4018">rigs pas smra <lb edRef="inst:4770" n="77a5"/> ba'i dge' sbyong sing ha shri</rs>s <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4332">gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du legs par brtsams te || <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5574">dpal rtse dkar gyi gtsug lag khang</rs> du yi ger bkod pa'o || bkra shis par gyur cig ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50222023-09-131" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work">sher phyin gyi man ngag gi spyi khrigs laM gsal ba'i me tog </rs>ces bya ba zab pa'i don <pb n="[6b4]"/> bstan pa rdzogs s+ho ||<!--TODO add name in APIS of gnyan--> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">gnyan </rs>gyi dpe la <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">slob dpon chen po snar thang pa brgyad pa</rs><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">smon laM tshul khriMs</rs>r byon pas bris pa de la <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">btsun pa (<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="">ze'u</rs>) chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis bris shing zhus te dag par byas pa'o ||</seg>
source: 2_050_22 shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i man ngag.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50222023-09-202" status="unreviewed"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">snar thang gyi dben gnas</rs> su <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">bla ma</rs>'i phyag dpe la <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">btsun pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> gyi [gyis] bris pa'o || </seg>
source: 2_050_22 shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i man ngag.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex70032023-10-251" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5171">'grel pa don gsal ba zhes <lb n="[156b1]"/> bya ba tshig dang don legs par bshad pa shen pa [for shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa] mchog gi rgyan </rs>ces bya ba| lung dang rigs par smra ba |<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4296"> shag kya'i dge slong (brtson 'grus rdo rje</rs>s)| nye bar sbyar ba | rdzong so+ho | |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex70032023-10-253" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[156b3]"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5171">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad pa…shes [rab] mchog gi rgyan</rs> ces bya ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:"><!--TODO ref number of da+ha rma ba tra in APIS-->shakya'i dge slong rda|d+ha (da+ha rma b+ha tra)(rma?) * tra</rs>'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos s+ho ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex70032023-10-255" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="[156b4]"/> Oṃ sa rba byid sA hA [Oṃ sarvavid svAhA…] × <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5171">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad pa shes rab mchog gi rgyan</rs> zhes bya ba|| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:"><!--TODO ref number of da+ha rma ba tra in APIS-->shakya'i dge slong rda? (da+ha rma....)</rs><?oxy_comment_start comment="broken…"?><?oxy_comment_end?></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex70032023-10-257" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[156b8]"/><!--no input--> gtso bo dang phal pa; mtshon byed dang; mtshon bya ****** <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">seng ge bzang po</rs> *** mkha' ?? … ces pa'o || **** <lb n="[156b9]"/> **  slad kyi paN Di ta *** lnga pa dang; <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo ts+tsha ba dge long</rs> (blo ldan shes rab) kyis legs par gtan la bap pa *| </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex39012024-09-0915-25-36" status="unreviewed"><lb n="30a4"/>… chos rje'i <lb n="30a5"/> chos 'dul chu skyes dga' tshal gang|| 'jug ldog shes bya'i 'dab brgya rgyas pa la|| gnas brtan seng ge sbrang bus sbrang rtsi btus|| blo ldan slob ma ro brgyas dges par mdzod|| 'dir nongs de kun <lb n="30a6"/> kun mkhyen de la bshags|| legs pa gang bskrun des 'dir 'gro ba kun|| legs pa'i laM zhugs legs mchog drang srong che|| skyabs med skyob pa'i rdzogs sangs myur thob shog|| || </seg>
source: 2_039_01_ dPal ldan seng ge_'dul ba lung btus pa zhes bya ba'i dka' gnad.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex39012024-09-0915-27-122" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="30a7"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5844">dam pa'i chos 'dul ba lung kun las btus pa rin po che snang pa</rs> zhes bya ba ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4010">mang du thos pa'i btsun pa <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4010">ba ri pa</rs></note> dpal ldan seng ge</rs>s ¦ <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5661">bar ri'i dgon pa</rs>r bris pa'o ||</seg>
source: 2_039_01_ dPal ldan seng ge_'dul ba lung btus pa zhes bya ba'i dka' gnad.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50132023-10-131" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4866">skyes bu gsum gyi laM rin gyi khrid</rs> bzhugs_so ||</seg>
source: 2_050_13 skyes bu gsum gyi lam rim gyi khrid.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50132023-09-132" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">bla ma snar thang pa brgyad par byon pa</rs> des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4065">btsun pa grags pa shes rab</rs> la gnang te phyag dpe dngos la yi ger bris shing zhus dag par <abbr>byas so</abbr> ||</seg>
source: 2_050_13 skyes bu gsum gyi lam rim gyi khrid.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1022023-03-271212" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ref="db:4424">rab tu gnas par byed pa don <choice><reg>gsal</reg><orig>{°}gsal</orig></choice></rs> bzhugs lags ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex10221-02-20231350" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5624">rab tu gnas <lb edRef="inst:4423" n="2b3"/> pa'i rgyud</rs><note type="editorial" resp="PH">The identification as the Pratiṣṭhāvidhi is tentative.</note> dang <rs type="person" ref="db:5625" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon kun dga' snying po </rs> las stsogs pas mdzad pa'i bstan bcos rnams <app><rdg wit="inst:4428">gcig</rdg><rdg wit="inst:4423">cig</rdg></app> na'ang <app><rdg wit="inst:4428">ma rdzogs</rdg><rdg wit="inst:4423">rdzogs</rdg></app> shing <app><rdg wit="inst:4428">gzhung</rdg><rdg wit="inst:4423">bzhung</rdg></app> mang du <app><rdg wit="inst:4423">mthor</rdg><rdg wit="inst:4428">'thor</rdg></app> ba'i phyir | <lb edRef="inst:4428" n="1b4"/>de dag cig tu lag tu blang pa ma <lb edRef="inst:4423" n="2b4"/> 'ongs pa'i skye bo blo chung pa rnams la phan pa'i phyir | <rs type="person" ref="db:3784" ana="corpusmd:named_reference"><app><rdg wit="inst:4423">shag kya'i dge bslong</rdg><rdg wit="inst:4428">sha°pa'i dge slong</rdg></app> rin chen bzang po</rs>s nye bar sbyar <app><rdg wit="inst:4423">ba'o</rdg><rdg wit="inst:4428">ba</rdg></app> || rdzogs s+hyo ||
         </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1022023-27-03-1236" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb edRef="inst:4423" n="2b5"/><rs type="person" ref="db:4425" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">dge bar byed pa</rs>'i dpe' lags ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="exX52023-01-3015-18-40" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5515"><rs type="work" ref="db:3775">'brel ba brtag pa</rs> rgyan gyi me tog</rs> ces bya ba bzhugs so ||</seg>
source: X_005_Ral gri_brel brtag rgyan me tog_corrected.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="exX052023-01-3113-59-24" status="reviewed"><pb n="1a"/><lb n="1a1"/> @@|| <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5558"> rgya gar</rs> skad du | <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5515">saM ban d+ha pa ri k+Sha a laM ka ra puSH+pa</rs> nA ma ¦ <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5559">bod</rs> skad du | <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5515"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="3775">'brel ba brtag pa</rs> rgyan gyi me tog</rs> ces bya ba |</seg>
source: X_005_Ral gri_brel brtag rgyan me tog_corrected.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="exX052023-01-3015-21-54" status="reviewed"><rs type="school">nyan thos sde pa</rs> dang <rs type="school">sems tsam pa</rs> rgyu 'bras kyi 'brel pa 'dod pa 'gog pa ni <quote source="db:4214" n="v. 7">rgyu dang 'bras bu'i </quote>zhes pas <pb n="2a"/><lb n="2a1"/> de gnyis dus mnyam du 'gog la | <quote source="db:4214" n="v. 8">rim gyis <!--SP 8 D: rim las; SPĀ D: rim gyis--></quote> zhes pas snga phyi gnyis gcig la gnas pa'i 'brel ba 'gog ste | 'di ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bod</rs> kyang <lb n="2a2"/> 'dod do ||</seg>
source: X_005_Ral gri_brel brtag rgyan me tog_corrected.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX52023-01-3015-25-48" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><lb n="4a2"/> pa de dag phal cher ni <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5567">rang 'grel</rs> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5534">slob dpon dul lha</rs>'i <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5568">'grel bshad</rs> bzhin <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4006">bdag</rs> gis bris so ||</seg>
source: X_005_Ral gri_brel brtag rgyan me tog_corrected.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="exX52023-01-3015-35-34" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5552">bram ze shaM kar <lb n="4a3"/> nan ta</rs> 
         <quote source="db:5569" n="D22a5-6">'brel pa bkag pas bdag med gnyis bsgrubs par bshad de 'brel pa med na byed pa po'i bdag dang bzung 'dzin med <lb n="4a4"/> pas chos kyi bdag med bshad</quote><!--not a literal citation of SPA. D reads: de'i phyir 'brel pa med pa na gang zag gi bdag med pa sgrub po//de bzhin du rang gi bdag nyid tsam la gnas pa gzhan gyi dbang nyid dang gzhan dang sbyor ba dang / ltos pa nyid la sogs pa med pa na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po med pa ni chos kyi bdag med pa yin no//--> ces zer ro ||</seg>
source: X_005_Ral gri_brel brtag rgyan me tog_corrected.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="exX52023-01-3015-44-32" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><pb n="4b"/><lb n="4b1"/> <rs type="work" ref="5515"><rs type="work" ref="3775"> 'brel pa brtag pa</rs> rgyan gyi me tog</rs> ces bya ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">mang du thos pa'i dge slong bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s sbyar ba rdzogs so ||</seg>
source: X_005_Ral gri_brel brtag rgyan me tog_corrected.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50102023-10-132" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4858">zhi ba'i lha seMs bskyed</rs> bzhugs_so||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50102023-09-133" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4858"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3743">slob dpon zhi ba lha</rs>'i ? kyi seMs bskyed kyi cho ga mdor bsdus</rs> pa | 
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">btsun pa smon laM tshul khrims</rs> kyis yi ger bkod pa rdzogs s+hyo || 
         de la <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458">btsun pa ze'u</rs>s zhus shing <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">snar thang</rs> du bris pa'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1142023-05-24.18.06" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:3786" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">rngog lo chen po blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyi <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4447">spring yig <abbr>bdud rtsi</abbr>'i <abbr>thig le</abbr></rs> <choice><reg>zhugs so</reg><orig>(°°°o)</orig></choice></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1142023-05-25.09.22" status="reviewed"><abbr>bzhin</abbr> stong pa'i tshul la 'jug pa'i sgo ||yang dag<rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5632">rigs <abbr>tshogs</abbr></rs><rs type="person" ref="db:3720" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">klu grub</rs> zhal nas gsungs pa de ||
         <rs type="person" ref="db:3773" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">rigs pa'i dbang <lb n="1b8"/> phyug <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3772">rnaM 'grel</rs>mdzad pa</rs>'i gzhung mdzes las ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1142023-05-25.09.27" status="reviewed"><lb n="1b9"/> dag tshig gis <rs type="person" ref="db:3720" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">klu grub</rs> gyis bshad laM mi 'dor ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1142023-07-1812-11-35" status="reviewed"><abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> sprul pa'i sku <abbr>tshogs</abbr> ni || gzhan gyi rnaM rig snang pa<anchor xml:id="a21"/> ste || brgya byin <abbr>gzugs</abbr> brnyan <abbr>la sogs</abbr> dpe' || <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5633">mdo</rs> nas ji skad gsung de <abbr>bzhin</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1114_3442023_05_08" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:3786" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis <!--TODO blockprint lo tsa ba chen po shAkya’i dge slong blo ldan shes rab gyis ||--> || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5630">rga ston<!--TODO blockprint: dga' ston--> shes rab grags la sogs pa</rs><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5631">gtsong kha<!--TODO blockprint: tsong ka--> ru gsuM</rs> gyi dge 'dun la <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4447">spring pa'i <abbr>yi ge</abbr> bdud rtsi thig le<!--TODO blockprint: springs pa’i yi ge bdud rtsi’i thig le--></rs> zhes bya ba <abbr>rdzogs s+ho</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex61012023-10-25" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="">bla ma rnams</rs> kyi bka' drin las <pb n="[14a8]"/> cung zad thos pa dang thob pa rnams| dran par bya zhing bskul ba'i bsam pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yi ger bris pa'o | |<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">shAkya'i btsun pa smon lam [14b1] tshul khrims</rs> kyis [kyi] thob yig go |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex61012023-09-09-11.44" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4140">shAkya'i btsun pa rtsed pa bsod nams blo gros</rs> kyi dpe'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50162023-09-1109-09-00" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (3b3-5)] p. 316 :3-5"/>
         <pb n="3b"/><lb n="3b3"/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4875"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5634">chos nyid</rs> laM khrid rin chen</rs> 'di || <rs type="deity">byaMs pa</rs>'i dgongs pa snying po yin || <lb n="3b4"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4875"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5634">chos nyid</rs> kyi laM khrid</rs> rdzogs s+ho ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50162023-09-1109-04-00" status="unreviewed"><milestone unit="section" n="[Lineage (3b3-5)] p. 316 :3-5"/>
             <rs type="deity">rje btsun byaMs pa</rs>| 
             <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6109">byaMs pa'i 'gon  po</rs> | 
             <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6110">a ka ra shan ti ba</rs> | 
             <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5618">braM ze sar sdza na</rs>| 
             <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4143">zu dga' rdo rje</rs> | 
             <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3796">phu rangs pa chen po</rs>| 
             <rs type="person">dol pa</rs> |
              <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6111">gre <lb n="3b5"/> lhas pa</rs>| 
              des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">chas pa khu dbon 2</rs> | 
              des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6112">shangs pa</rs>| 
              des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">slob dpon snar thang pa <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">smon laM tshul khriMs</rs></note>brgyad par byon pa</rs> | 
              des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">btsun pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458">ze'u</rs></note> la gnang pa'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50162023-09-1109-04-001" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:6458">zhu ba po</rs>s <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458">chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs></note> <abbr>bris so</abbr>||
            </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50162023-09-1109-06-00" status="reviewed"><abbr>byas so</abbr> || <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">dam pas bsngags pa'i dben gnas snar thang</rs> du bris shing <abbr>zhus so</abbr></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex70426-04-202313.33" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3749">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma</rs> la don bzhi ste |
          [1] spyi'i don lus rnam par gzhag pa dang | [2] 'bras bu dkon mchog gi don dang | [3] de sgrub par byed pa'i rigs kyi don dang | [4] bstan bcos yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex70426-04-202313.40" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4490"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3749">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma</rs>'i bsdus pa'i don</rs> <rs type="person" ref="db:3831" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s nye bar sbyar ba'o || || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex25012023-03-1013-39-37" status="reviewed"><pb n="1a"/><lb n="1a1"/>phyi<lb n="1a2"/> dza<lb n="1a3"/> 18 <lb n="1a4"/>oM AH HuM  || <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4647"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3742">bslabs btus</rs> <choice><sic>kyis</sic><corr>kyi</corr></choice> sa bcad</rs> bzhugs pa'i dbu phyogs legs pa'o||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex25012023-03-1013-50-41" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4647"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3742">bslabs pa kun las btus pa</rs>'i don bsdus pa</rs> ni rnaM pa <abbr>gsum</abbr> ste | rtsol pa dang 'brel pa'i don dang | skabs kyi don dang ¦ mthar phyin pa'i bya ba'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex25012023-03-1014-10-49" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4647"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3742">byang chub seMs pa'i bslabs pa <choice><orig>kun {na}</orig><reg>kun</reg></choice> las btus pa</rs>'i don bsdus pa</rs> zhes bya ba | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5600">shag kya'i dge slongs byang chub skyabs</rs> kyis sbyar ba'o ||</seg>
