<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex38042023-09-18-114223" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><pb n="[52b6"/> sngon chad shes bya'i gnas la <pb n="[52b7]"/> sbyangs pa dang|| lhag pa'i lha'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang|| bshes [g]nyen dam pas rjes_su bzung ba'i mthus|| shes bya phal cher 'bad pa chung dus shes|| <rs type="work">bslab bya'i gnas gtan la 'bebs par byed pa'i legs</rs> <pb n="[53a1]"/> <rs type="work">bshad khyad par gsum ldan</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni| dang por <rs type="person" ana="">'jam pa'i dbyangs dkon mchog rin chen<anchor xml:id="a1"/> </rs>gyis <note type="gloss">bka' drin gyis</note> legs par bskyangs shing: bar du <rs type="person" ana="">mkhas pa'i dbang po gzhon_nu rgyal mchog</rs> <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa'i gsung gi smin <pb n="[53a2]"/> [p]ar byas te: mthar rnam dpyod kyis <abbr>blo gros</abbr> rtsa bshad kyi lung 'grel pa dang bcas <abbr>rnam par</abbr> dpyad pa la [b]rten nas: dgag bsgrub [sgrub] kyi [b]slab pa'i gnas la <abbr>blo gros</abbr> kyi snang ba rgyas pa: <rs type="person" ana="">shes rab rgya mtsho</rs>s  <rs type="place">mnga' ris</rs> <rs type="person" ana="">pa'i sde snod 'dzin pa</rs> <pb n="[52a3]"/> <rs type="person" ana="">chen po dkon mchog bzang po<anchor xml:id="a2"/></rs> <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pas bskul ba'i ngor: <hi rendition="#Time">lcags mo phag_gi lo</hi>: <hi rendition="#Time">smal po'i zla ba'i bzang po'i tshes</hi> <anchor xml:id="a3"/>la: <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">dpal snar thang gi chos sde</rs>r rdzogs par sbyar ba'o|| dge'o|| </seg>
source: 2_038_04_ Shes rab rgya mtsho_bslab bya'i gnas gtan la 'beb par byed pa'i legs bshad khyad par gsum ldan.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex38042023-09-18-114446" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">'jaMs dbyangs shes rab rgya 'tsho [mtsho]</rs> la <abbr>phyag 'tshal lo</abbr>|| <rs type="deity">'jaMs pa'i dbyangs</rs> × zhus dag_go. dge leGS</seg>
source: 2_038_04_ Shes rab rgya mtsho_bslab bya'i gnas gtan la 'beb par byed pa'i legs bshad khyad par gsum ldan.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex60520240828_1" ana="corpusmd:colophon" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4484"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3733">dbu ma brgyan gyi 'grel pa</rs> rgya cher bshad pa</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">rigs par smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s sbyar pa |||| rdzogs s+hO ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex14022023-10-11-105324" status="reviewed"><lb n="1a2"/> tsha<lb n="1a3"/> 103<lb n="1a4"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4575"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3711">mngon rtogs rgyan</rs> gyi 'grel bshad 'thad pa'i <lb n="1a5"/>'od 'bar</rs></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1142-10502023-08-22" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4575"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3711">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> ces <lb n="185a3"/>bya ba'i 'grel bshad 'thad pa'i 'od 'bar</rs> zhes bya ba | shes bya'i nam mkha' la blo gros kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing | legs smra'i 'od kyis phas rgol mun pa'i smag rum sel bar byed pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3884">shAkya'i dge slong rigs par <lb n="185a4"/>smra ba shes rab 'od zer</rs> gyis sbyar ba rdzogs so || × ||dag cing snyoms pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4576">shes rab 'bum</rs> gyis bris | dge'o || ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-08-2914-22-30" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">lha shag</rs> || <rs type="work">rgyan</rs> gi dgongs pa <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5564">rigs gter</rs> las: mi slu ma shes don gsal 2 || rnam grangs pa'nag * smra || (RT VIII.40b, gzhan gyis brtag ap dgag na)zhes gsung shing, de dgag pa yang: mtshan nyid 2 kyis 'jog * ni || mtshon byed de yang 2 su 'gyur || (VIII.41ab, agaisnt Lha dbang blo)mtshon bya gnyis su 'dod na yang ||spyi mtshan ** mi srid 'gyur || (RT VIII.41cd, against rGyan mdzad pa)tha snyad pa dang don dam pa || 2 ga la yang 2 po 'jug || (different from VIII 42ab against Chos mchog, which reads: ma khyab gcod tshul 'dir mi 'thad || gnyis su 'byed pa dgongs pa min )ces dang<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">bram ze</rs>'i bzhed pa la yang,mi dgos ma khyab mi srid 3 ||bden pa'i don rtogs 'dod na yod || (RT VIII.42cd, agaisnt Bram ze)ces so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-08-2914-22-3010" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5564">rigs gter</rs> las 
         <lg>
            <l xml:space="preserve">gang gis gang la ji ltar mi slu </l>
         </lg>
      zhes pa 3 bshad (Ref. to RTRG ad VIII.44ab) cing, don bsdus na: don ji ltar gnas pa ltar yod pa la yod par shes med pa la med par shes pa'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-09-2410-28-16" status="unreviewed"><lb n="4b5"/> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje</rs>s: <l>tshad ma'i stobs kyis nges pa 'dren ||</l>
         <l>nges pa'i 'gal zla sgro 'dogs yin || (RT VIII.46ab)</l>
         <l>zhes bya ba ltar, kun du tha snyad pa'i tshad ma'i stobs kyis 'jug ldog byed pa na nges shes 'dren dgos te</l>
         <l>yod med nges pa'i 'bras can min || phyir na tshad ma nyid mi 'gyur || (PV I.200ab) zhes bya bas so || (=RTRG ad RT VIII.46ab)</l>
         <l>de ltar tshad ma'i grangs pa'i nges shes des <lb n="4b6"/> sgro 'dogs gcod pa yin te, </l>
         <l>nges pa dang ni sgro 'dogs yid || </l>
         <l>gnod bya gnod byed ngo bo'i phyir ||</l>
         <l>'di ni sgro 'dogs dben pa la || </l>
         <l>'jug ces bya bar shes pa yin || (PV I.49)</l>
         <l>zhes bya bas so ||</l>
des na mngon sum gyis sgro 'dogs gcod ces brjod kyang mngon sum min gyi, rjes kyi nges pa gcod pa yin te, ku sha lag pas bzung nas zor bas gcod pa bzhin no || (=RTRG ad VIII.49ab)
<lb n="4b7"/>'di dag gi don nges par bya ba la gcad bya sgro 'dogs kyi rang bzhin: gcod byed nges pa'i rang bzhin ni: des ji ltar sgro 'dogs gcod pa'i tshul 3 gyis nges par byed par gsung kyang, rtogs sla zhing, 'og nas rtog pa'i rab dbye'i skabs su yang 'chad pas na 'dir ma spros so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-08-2914-22" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje pa</rs>s (tshid) (bcadu) bsdebs pa ni: <l>don rig 2 dang rang rig dang ||</l>
         <l>rjes su dpag pa ran glas nges ||</l>
         <l>dang po pa dang yid ma gtad || </l>
         <l>'khrul rgyu can rnams gzhan las nges || (RT VIII.64)</l>
         zhes gsungs shing,de nges byed kyi tshad ma yang |<l>don byed pa dang goms pa <lb n="5a5"/> can ||</l>
         <l>rjes su dpag pas nges par byed || (RT VIII.65ab)</l>
        ces bya'o </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-08-2914-13-45" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">mkhas pa chen po cha pa</rs> swo kyis kyang dpyod pa ba'i phyogs su <lb n="6a2"/> bslan nas dgag pa mdzad pa yin no ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-08-2914-18-35" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">gangs can mkhas pa'i gtsug rgyan chos rjes paNDi ta chen po</rs>s kyang snang yul dang | gzung yul 1 du mdzad nas dgag pa mdzad pa'i rgyun yang de 'di <lb n="16b8"/> yin no |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-08-2914-22-3011" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3892">chos <lb n="N005"/>kyi rje</rs>s mngon ng po mdo'i lung | byeg pa 3 rnam rig nyis | zhes pa ltar legs par mngon yang ba mi bla mas ni bang ni skad pa dang don pi rnam bzhagnyis las dang po'i dbang du byas nas <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5564">rigs gter</rs> nyid las kyang bag chag brtan dang mi brtan las | bden dang sdun pi rnaM bzhag byed | cesungs pas mngon dang po 2 kyang
               <lb n="N006"/>bzhed la phyi ma'i dpang du byas nas seMs tsam gyi tshul la rnor mngon dang dang rim mngon 3 ngo na yin pas byeg pa 3 rnam rig nyis | zhesungs pa yino | </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-08-2914-22-281" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje</rs>'i dongs par mngon | </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-08-2914-22-3012" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5564">rigs gter</rs> gyi dongs pa yid mngon yin na 'das pa yin pas khyab cing 'das pa las 'das pa li skye ba'i phyir na yid mngon la rgyun med ces 'dod pa'i
               <lb n="N004"/>khyor su bshad nas dgag pa yin du mang pa mdzad pa ni lung de la skyon rjod pa dbyes pa tsam du zad kyi yung de la ni chunga kyang mi bgod |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-08-2914-22-282" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje</rs>gi tshad 'bras ni la me'i tshogs don
               <lb n="N007"/>gzhalya du ba'i tang las de rtog pi rjegi tha skad 'brus | du ba'i rtag las la mo'i don tshang gyi rnal pa shar nas de la gsang du mu ni shes pa tshad ma zhes yang na phyil gyi don bzhalya don gyi rnaM pa shar nas don la bsar du mu bi shes pa tshad pa don rtog tshad ma 'brus | zhes pa des ba na rigi rjeg
               <lb n="N008"/>pang mtshan nus gsung | </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-08-2914-22-283" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje thaMd mkhyen pa</rs>'i  zhal               <lb n="N008"/>mnga' nas kyang de ltar grub mtha' 4 las slo+on phyil gyi don slon pi tshe med pa ltar mdzad la bye nang la 'jug pa na rnam zhal gyis bzhes zhesungs ci ste 'dir yang || gang gis dngos rnam dpyad na | zhes 1 dang du bral gyi gyi ba sungs mino zhe na gsungs mod kyi des ni dngos mtha' dag rangin mes
                           <lb n="N001"/>gtan la 'bebs pa ma yino | </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-08-2914-22-284" status="unreviewed"><lb n="N003"/>pa sgrib par gyur pa tsam zhig du zod des na <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje thaMd mkhyen pa</rs>s sa gsungs ltar | blo das 1 gis gang rung 1 rtong na 1 shos kyang rtogs pas khyab pa ni ldig dmigs kyi don to |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-08-2914-22-285" status="unreviewed"><lb n="N005"/>dmyings pa yin pir | snang bas sreg chang gi gi rgya mthong ba'i gags sbyed yir | dper na snang 1 mtshan rgyu dang || de las bdan pa'i dbangos dan | zugs mthong ba dang yi thun dang || 'thun pa tar byed pa 4n | zheso zhes lan 'debs kyang | 
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje</rs> sgrib pa med pa'i spyan dang ldan pas | zugs dang snang ba ni
            <lb n="N006"/>rugs dmigs pa snang pa la logs pa'i srob chang la las dmigs pa na rdzas tha dad ma yin | lcags bsreg pa 4n | snang ba la mos pa byi ba log pa la ldig dmigs med | snang ba med kyang zugs dang | rgyas med kyang snang ba dmigs pir | lags dang me tha dad par dmigs pa 4n | zhesung ngos ngos byun pi rnaM bzhan dang
            <lb n="N007"/>rdzas 1 dang rdzas tha dad ni sngar dpyad pa las shes |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-08-2914-22-286" status="unreviewed"><lb n="N001"/>rjes pa dpag byas pa yod ces brjod pa la brtens kyang cho rjes su pag bya kha na la mi po ste <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje</rs>s dud pa ba dang shad don rjes su pa bya lang po pir rjes su pa bya'i sa byang b kyi zhe na dang rjes su dang bya la yod ces brjod pa la bsten pa nyes pa dpa' bo de chon kho na la gog pa yin gyi
            <lb n="N002"/>sgras byag mo ba'i rgyun gnas skabs kyi nges pa yod pir phyogs kyi 'brel pa gtan la 'babs pa'i gnas skabsu phogs kyi sgro de bsgrub ba'i chon kho na la 'jug pir | </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-08-2914-22-287" status="unreviewed"><lb n="N007"/>'jug pa la lab pa bskyor ci dogs snyam na | dngos ming de ltar rjod na lrub pa ci yang med mod kyi don kyang shed chon gyi <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje</rs>s 'gro ldog pa zhes tshul 3 brjod pa yige mnyaM pas rjer mi bde ba dang | phyogs 'thong pod medang || zhes bya ba lasog pa'i tshog le'ur byas pa mi 'grib pas mkhas
            <lb n="N008"/>pa rnams kyis bad pa mtshad yang star kyi de 'jug thos pa bzhugs kyi don go na stod pang nas pa yon pa yang ba'i yang hyir zhes dang gyi thin pa la zhus kyis den togs pang nyes pa brgyad pa ma yin mnyam pas bsgus kyang pa yong du spangs pa yino | des na kyi skyed ni rtog kyang ba pa dang nas
        <lb n="[73b8]"/>…<rs type="work">gtan tshigs thigs pa</rs> las : * kyis don go yang nye bar b* pa * yi ge mnyam pas bsgrub dka' ba yongs su spangs pa yin no |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45042024-08-2914-22-289" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje</rs> nyid kyi <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5564">rigs pa'i gter</rs> las 
               la la par dang tha skad kyi | 
               grang pa 2 su 'byed pa yod || 
               ba skad 'di yi skabs don min || 
               mtshid de 'dra sar bkag zin | 
               dngos dang zhen pi rjod rung pi sa | 
               bra'i grangs pa'ang 2 zhes zer || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex22032023-09-181" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[40b2]"/> <rs type="work">sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i bshad sbyar</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">slob dpon ye shes zhabs</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="=Buddhajñānapāda"?><?oxy_comment_end?> kyi dgongs pa la 'khrul pa spang pa'i phyir| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5878">shag kya'i rge [dge] slong ye shes rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis sbyar ba'o|| rdzogs so|| ×|| ×|| <lb n="[40b3]"/> <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5656">rgyan dkar × phug<anchor xml:id="a1"/> </rs>du bris so|| ×|| ||<rs type="work">shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa</rs>'i|  don la dmyigs shing 'khrul pa'i skyon rnams sel cing sku × 'khrungs pa'i| <rs type="person" ana="">dam pa shes rab 'bar</rs> zhes grags| chu snod cig nas cig byo bzhin| don dang tshig rnams rdzogs par yang'| 'gro la phan phyir don rnams sgrogs <lb n="[40b4]"/> gsregs? don<rs type="person" ana=""> ye shes rgyal</rs> zhes grags| skye* shis 'jigs nas chos rgyad bor| |don tsam snang yang bye brag rjed [=brjed?]| dran pa bso phyir <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4335">chos 'khor bsam yas</rs> dag du bris| <rs type="person" ana="">dge' bshes zhug ston</rs> zhes byar grags|| 'gro ba 'dul kyin bzhan don mdzad| *thos mang sems <note type="gloss">dang</note> sims? kyi * me long lta|| <lb n="[40b5]"/> <rs type="person" ana="">shes rab thog po</rs> zhes su grags|| || || ||ItI|| ||</seg>
source: 1_022_03_ Ye shes rgyal mtshan _ bsdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i bshad sbyar.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" ana="corpusmd:the_tshom" xml:id="ex112_2023_05_08" status="reviewed"><choice><corr>yan</corr><sic>yang</sic></choice> lag sngar yod pas don du 'gyur ba'i the tsoM nyid myi dgos pa dang | don du myi 'gyur ba'i the tsoM ldog pa'i yan lag gzhan sngar gnas pa yang bzlog par myi nus pas dgos 'brel kyi ngag don myed do zhe na |
         de ni bden te <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">bdag cag</rs> dgos 'brel kyi ngag 'jug pa'i yan lag du khas <abbr>len to</abbr> || <pb n="4a"/><lb n="4a1"/> 'on kyang 'dir ni <rs type="person" ref="db:3780" ana="corpusmd:named_reference"> slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gi bzhed pa tsaM bkod pa yin la de'i 'dod pas kyang don du 'gyur ba'i the tsoM don la shas cher rtog pa la 'dod do || de yang myi 'thad pa ni dngos po'i nyes pa yin bas 'di ci byar yod |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex112_2023_05_082" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:3773" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon chos kyi <choice><corr>grags</corr><sic>drags</sic></choice> pa</rs>s 'bras <choice><corr>bus</corr><sic>bu</sic></choice>  nye bar mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa de gtan la <lb n="4a7"/> dbab par 'dod pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa'i tshig gi don 'chad pa ni <quote source="db:3779" n="37b4">myi slu bar byed pa'i shes pa ni yang dag pa'i shes pa yin no</quote> zhes bya <choice><reg>ba'o</reg><orig>ba.do→ba'o</orig></choice> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex112_2023_05_083" ana="corpusmd:yid_dpyod" status="reviewed"><lb n="4b8"/> phebs pa dang | phebs kyang brjed pa ni the tsoM du 'du la the tsom yang gnyi gar gyur ba myed pa'i yul 'jog pas log pa'i shes par du'o zhes <rs type="person" ref="db:3780" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> sems so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1122023-07-1715-14-27" ana="corpusmd:blo_rigs" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">bdag</rs> gis ni 'di ltar rig go || shes pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste | yang dag par rtogs pa dang | ma rtogs pa dang | log par rtogs pa dang | the tsoM mo || de la dang po ni tha snyad pa'i yang dag par rtogs pa kho na yin bas tshad ma'o || gnyis pa ni tha snyad pa'i rtogs pa'i byed pa dang bral ba yin bas snang <choice><corr>la</corr><sic>pa</sic></choice> ma nges pa dang bcad pa'i yul can no || gsuM pa ni myed pa'i don rtogs par <lb n="5a2"/> byed pa la log pa'i shes pa mtha' dag go || bzhi ba ni gang yang rnaM par myi gcod pas gang yang yongs su myi gcod pa'i phyir don <choice><corr>'jug</corr><sic>'jig</sic></choice>  pa'i nus pa myed pa'o || yid dpyod mtha' dag ni log pa'i shes par 'du ste | don myed par 'byung pas don myed pa'i rang bzhin dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro || dper na du ba dang dus mnyaM du yod pa'i dngos po rnaMs ni me myed kyang 'byung pas mye'i 'bras bu ma yin ba'i rang bzhin dang ma bral <lb n="5a3"/> ba bzhin no ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1122023-05-241713" ana="corpusmd:tshad_ma" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:5557" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon shes rab 'byung gnas sbas pa</rs> dang | <rs type="person" ref="db:5549" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon shag kya blo</rs> phyi rol kyi nor bu'i 'od la nang gi nor bur sgro 'dogs pa tshad mar 'dod pa dang | <rs type="person" ref="db:5534" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon dul ba'i lha</rs> ni phyed kyi dus su nyin bar bu 'ongs par mthong pa'i rmyi laM kyang shes pa tshad mar 'dod pa dang | <rs type="person" ref="db:5570" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference"><rs type="person" ref="db:3771" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po</rs>'i slob ma kha cig</rs> dang <rs type="person" ref="db:5570" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">mu stegs kha cig</rs> <choice><corr>dung</corr><sic>dang</sic></choice> <lb n="5a4"/> dkar po la ser por 'khrul pa yang dkar po'i mdog dang dbyibs la tshad mar 'dod pa rnaMs spangs pa'o ||||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1122023-05-24.17.241" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:3780" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gis dor byar bsdus pa dang | <rs type="person" ref="db:5534" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon <choice><corr>dul</corr><sic>du</sic></choice> ba'i lha</rs>s don gsuM par bshad pa gnyi ka 'khrul pa yin no ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1122023-07-1715-34-59" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> mngon suM rang rig pa'i rang bzhin don daM par yod la | rjes su dpag pa <choice><corr>rnam par rtog pa</corr><sic>rnaM par rtog par rtog pa</sic></choice> ni don daM par myed kyi <pb n="7a"/><lb n="7a1"/> kun rdzob du yod do zhes zer ba ni 
         <milestone unit="section" n="I'"/>
        myi rigs ste</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1122023-05-24.17.282" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:3735" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon ka ma la shi la</rs> na re | mtshan nyid ni grub pa yin te mtshon par byed pa yin ba'i phyir ro || mtshon <choice><corr>bya ni</corr><sic>bya'i</sic></choice> ma <lb n="7b8"/>grub pas bsgrub pa yin na mtshan nyid dang <choice><reg> </reg>
            <orig>{ma grub pa'i khyad par}</orig></choice>mtshon bya phyin ci log du <abbr>thal lo</abbr> zhes gsungs so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1122023-05-24.17.30" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:3780" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> na re | gnas skabs ni gnyis ste <choice><corr>mtshan nyid</corr><sic>mtshan</sic></choice>  gtan la 'bebs pa dang | mtshan nyid kyis tha snyad du byed do ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1122023-07-1715-43-33" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5629">slob dpon rab du zhi ba bzang po</rs> 'di skad ces | mying dang mying can kyi 'brel pa ci zhig bsgrub par zad kyi | mtshon bya grub pa la mtshan nyid bsgrubs pa'am | mtshan <lb n="8a3"/> nyid grub pas mtshon bya bsgrub pa ni ma yin te | rtog bral ma 'khrul ba nyid la mgnon suM zhes 'dogs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba'i don la <choice><corr>bsdu</corr><sic>ba su ba</sic></choice> ni |<quote source="db:3779" n="40b1-2"> rtog pa dang bral zhing ma 'khrul ba nyid <choice><corr>ma grub pa</corr><sic>bsgrub pa</sic></choice> yin quote</quote> zhes bya ba'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1122023-05-24.17.31" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ref="3773" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">slob dpon</rs> kyis 'khrul ba ni log par snang pa yin no zhes bshad pas de bral ba gzung yul la ma 'khrul ba grub po |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1122023-05-24.17.32" status="reviewed"><lb n="9b5"/> te des na <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5594">chos mchog chen po</rs>r <quote source="db:5594" n="ad PVin 1 40,3">grur zhugs pa'i 'khrugs pa lasogs pa</quote> zhes rgyu gsuM bshad do || 'dir ni <rs type="person" ref="db:3780" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gis legs par ma brtags par nges so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1122023-05-24.17.33" status="reviewed"><lb n="10a5"/> 'dzin bas don gzhan myi 'dzin ba'i phyir 'on long myed pa'i nyes pa myed la | de'i nyer len la ltos pas gtan tshigs myi ltos pa yang ma yin no || zhes <rs type="person" ref="db:3780" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> dgongs so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1122023-05-24.17.383" ana="corpusmd:mi_dmigs_pa" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:3780" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> ltar na dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur ba ni bltar rung pa'o || de ni myi dmyigs pa'i khyad par yin no || myi dmyigs pa <lb n="15a3"/>zhes bya ba ngo bo dang khyad par bltar rung pa 'gal ba ma <abbr>yin te</abbr> | khyad par sgro btags pa'i phyir ro || sgro gdags par bya ba ni rgyu mtshan yin la de yang sa phyogs kyi chos yod na buM pa snang par brtag par bya ba'o |||| de'i rang bzhin yang buM par snang pa'i shes pa'i rgyu nus pa <choice><corr>thogs</corr><sic>thog</sic></choice> myed tshang pa'o || sgro gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan de'i shes par byed pa yang shes pa cig la <choice><corr>'dre</corr><sic>'dra</sic></choice>  ba'i don gzhan snang pa'o zhes so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex112_352023_05_084" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ref="db:3786" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">shag kya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis sbyar ba || <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4443"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3779">bam po lnga pa</rs>'i bshad pa</rs> | rdzogs s+hO ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1052023-04-241305" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4431">bde ba can gyi smon lam</rs> bzhugs s+ho ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1052023-04-241330" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="2b8"/><rs type="person" ref="db:3784" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">lo ts+tsha ba <abbr>rin chen</abbr> bzang po</rs>s <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5623">thon mthing gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du sbyar ba dge'o ||</seg>
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex13072024-02-2616-05-01" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"/>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44042023-01-2321-29-46" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4017"><abbr>byang chub sems dpa'</abbr> dz+nyA na shri</rs>'i <rs type="work" ref="db:4767" ana="corpusmd:named_reference"><abbr>rigs</abbr> pa'i snying po de kho na nyid bsdus pa gsal byed nyi ma'i 'od</rs> ces bya ba <abbr>bzhugs s+ho</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44042023-01-2321-30-55" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ref="db:4767" ana="corpusmd:named_reference"><choice><sic>rig</sic><corr>rigs</corr> </choice> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>snying po</abbr> de kho na nyid bsdus pa <abbr>gsal byed</abbr> nyi ma'i 'od</rs> ces bya ba ¦ </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44042023-01-2321-34-25" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3773">de</rs> yi <abbr>gsung</abbr> rab <abbr>kun gyi</abbr> <abbr>snying po'i</abbr> bcud | <abbr><rs type="work" ref="db:3772" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">rnam 'grel</rs> lung</abbr> brgya ldan pa <lb n="1b3"/> gang de'i don ¦ <abbr>nyung ngu'i</abbr> <abbr>tshig gis gsal</abbr> bar ston mdzad <abbr>pa'i</abbr> |<abbr> gsal byed</abbr> 'od stong ldan <choice><sic>'di</sic><corr>'dir</corr></choice> <abbr>rnam par</abbr> dbye |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44042023-01-2321-37-44" status="reviewed"><abbr>gzung yul</abbr> <abbr>yin</abbr> <abbr>snang yul</abbr> <abbr>ma yin</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> mu <abbr>dbang po'i</abbr> <abbr>mngon sum gyi</abbr> <abbr>bzung don</abbr> <abbr>lta bu</abbr> zhes <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> <abbr>'dod do</abbr>¦            
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593"><abbr>kha cig</abbr></rs> <abbr>mi srid par</abbr> <abbr>bzhed de</abbr> ¦</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44042023-01-2413-25-34" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">snga rabs pa dag</rs>¦ <abbr>mtshan</abbr> mtshon grangs mnyaM <abbr>yin</abbr> pas <abbr>mtshon bya</abbr> <abbr>gcig</abbr> la <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> du ma dang ¦ <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> <abbr>gcig</abbr> la <abbr>mtshon bya</abbr> du ma <abbr>mi 'thad</abbr> ces 'dod pa'ang
             mi 'thad de |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex44042023-02-2308-02-07" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><abbr>rgyu tshogs</abbr> pa las <abbr>bras bu</abbr> 'byung <abbr>rung gi</abbr> rtags <abbr>yin par</abbr> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5554">lha</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5549">shAg</rs> 'chad pas dgag <abbr>rtags</abbr> pa ba <abbr>yin par</abbr> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">mkhas pa kha <abbr>cig</abbr></rs> gsungs mod ¦</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex44042023-02-2308-08-03" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><quote source="db:5564"><!--this is not a literal citation--><rs type="school">bye brag tu smra ba</rs> ni ¦ <abbr>gzugs sogs</abbr> thug phrad du snang pa'i don dngos <abbr>bzhugs</abbr>¦ phyi don mthong pa tshad ma ¦ phyi don <abbr>rtogs</abbr> pa <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> pa <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> smra bas ¦ <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad 'bras <lb n="15b3"/> rdzas tha dad dus <abbr>mnyam par</abbr> 'dod ¦
            <rs type="school">mdo sde pa</rs>s ¦ don lkog na mo <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> ¦ don dang 'dra bar skyes <abbr>pa'i</abbr> shes pa tshad ma ¦ don <abbr>rtogs</abbr> <abbr>btags</abbr> pa <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> smra bas <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad 'bras rdzas tha dad dus <choice><sic>mnyaM par</sic><corr>tha dad par</corr> </choice> 'dod do |
            <rs type="school">rnaM bden pa</rs>s ¦ bzung ba'i rnaM pa <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> ¦ 'dzin pa'i rnaM pa tshad ma ¦ rang rig <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> pa <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> <lb n="15b4"/> 'dod pas ¦ <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad 'bras bde sdug myong ba ltar dus dang <abbr>ngo bo</abbr> <abbr>gcig</abbr> du 'dod do |
            <rs type="school">rnaM brdzun pa</rs>s bzung <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rnaM pa sgro <abbr>btags</abbr> <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> ¦ 'dzin pa'i rnaM pa tshad ma ¦ rang rig <abbr>btags</abbr> pa ba <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> 'dod pas ¦ <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad <abbr>'bras skra </abbr>shad snang pa ltar <abbr>gcig</abbr> pa bkag <abbr>pa'i</abbr> tha dad du <abbr>'dod do</abbr></quote> ces <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5564">rigs gter</rs> <abbr>las gsungs so</abbr> ¦</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex44042023-02-0311-17-56" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ref="db:4767" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">
            <rs type="work" ref="db:3770" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">tshad ma mdo</rs> <rs type="work" ref="db:5553" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">sde bdun</rs> 'grel pa <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">'grel bshad</rs> bcas <pb n="16a"/><lb n="16a1"/>pa'i snying po rigs pa'i de kho na nyid bsdus pa gsal byed nyi ma'i 'od </rs> ces bya ba ni ¦ 
            don du gnyer ba'i slob ma 'gas bskul ba'i ngor ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4017">shAkya'i dge slong dz+nya Na shri</rs>s ¦ drag po'i lo sa ga zla ba'i dkar phyogs la ¦ <rs type="place" ref="db:6173">dpal ldan gsang phu'i chos gra</rs>r sbyar ba mchog tu dge <abbr>legs</abbr> su gyur <abbr>cig</abbr> |†|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex3101_2024-05-16_3" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3834">rgya dmar ba</rs>s mdzad pa'i <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4686">dbu ma'i de kho na nyid gtan la dbab pa</rs> bzhugs</seg>
source: 2_031_01_rgya dmar pa dbu ma de kho na nyid.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex3101_2024-07-12124618" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><note type="gloss"/>don daM pa’i bden pa ***************** bden pa mi ’thad ce na<note type="gloss"/><note type="gloss"/>‘di ***********bya***** <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">gangs pa</rs>’i*****la<note type="gloss"/></seg>
source: 2_031_01_rgya dmar pa dbu ma de kho na nyid.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex31012024-07-1212-49-03" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon zla ba’i grags pa</rs> dang | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">ti pang ka ra</rs>s bshad pa dang |</seg>
source: 2_031_01_rgya dmar pa dbu ma de kho na nyid.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex31012024-07-1212-49-44" status="unreviewed"><note type="gloss">gzhan yang ye shes med na rgyu log pas med daM gnyen po spangs nas med gnyi ga yang mi ’thad ye shes kyi (r)gyu ’khrul pa ma yin pa’i phyir dang | gnyen po mi srid pa’i phyir ro | (zh)es phyis gsung ngo ||</note>yang na dpyad bzod la gnod pas na ’khrul pas na tha snyad byas so zhes <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">slob dpon gzhan dag</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">gangs pa</rs></note> ’chad do || </seg>
source: 2_031_01_rgya dmar pa dbu ma de kho na nyid.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex3101_2024-05-16_2" status="reviewed"><note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3834">rgya dmar ba</rs></note> byang chub grags pa thob par shog ||</seg>
source: 2_031_01_rgya dmar pa dbu ma de kho na nyid.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex3101_2024-05-16" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4686">dbu ma de kho na nyid rnam par spyod pa</rs> || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3834">rgya dmar ba</rs>s mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho ||</seg>
source: 2_031_01_rgya dmar pa dbu ma de kho na nyid.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex75022023-09-281" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5200">don<anchor xml:id="a1"/> pha rol tu phyin pa'i nyaM len snying po rab gsal</rs> <abbr>bzhugs s+ho</abbr> |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex75022023-09-282" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (41b4-8)]"/>
         <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5200">don pha rol tu phyin pa'i nyaMs len snying po rab gsal</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni | 
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">dpal ldan bla ma daM pa</rs>'i gsung la snon 'khrid ma byas par | 
         nyaMs su len bde bar bya ba'i phyir | 
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4311"><abbr>rdo rje</abbr> 'dzin pa naM 'kha rin chen</rs> kyis bka'i bskul ba'i ngor | 
         <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5707">'khyog dgon pa</rs>r <hi rendition="#Time">chu pho spre'u'i lo bden bzhi'i chos 'khod skor ba'i dus chen kyi nyin</hi> | 
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4077">sod nams dpal bzang</rs> gis sbyar ba'i | 
         <abbr>yi ge</abbr> pa ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5201">btan bsal</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5201">bdag</rs> gi dgyis |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1102023-26-04-14.9" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4439"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5585"><choice><corr>dbus</corr><sic>dbu</sic></choice> mtha</rs>'i don bsdu</rs> <abbr>bzhugs s+ho</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1101106-02-2023-12-23" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3756">slob dpon thogs med</rs> yin la de dag kyang mchod par 'os <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>yon tan</abbr> dang <abbr>ldan par</abbr> go bas rtsa ba dang bshad pa la yid ches par <abbr>'gyur ro</abbr> || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1101106.2.2023.1" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6262">slob dpon blo gros brtan pa</rs>s kyang bshad pa ni mtha' gnyis sel ba'i dbang <lb n="3a8"/>du byas nas bshad pa dang | lam gnyis sgrub pa'i dbang du byas pa'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1102023-02-06-15-50-11" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4439"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5585">dbus dang mtha' <abbr>rnam par</abbr> 'byed <abbr>pa</abbr></rs><abbr>'i</abbr> don bsdus pa</rs> <rs type="person" ref="db:3786" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">dge slong blo ldan</rs> kyis sbyar ba'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50062024-07-1216-01-36" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4848">'da' ka <abbr>ye shes</abbr> kyi 'chi kha ma'i man ngag</rs> <abbr>bzhugs so</abbr> || × phyi¶ la¶ 550</seg>
source: 2_050_06 'da' ka ye shes kyi 'chi kha ma'i man ngag.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50062023-09-12-09" ana="corpusmd:colophon" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4052">bla ma snar thang pa</rs>'i phyag dpe las <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458">btsun pa ze'u</rs>s bris shing zhus te dag par <abbr>byas so</abbr> ||</seg>
source: 2_050_06 'da' ka ye shes kyi 'chi kha ma'i man ngag.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50062023-09-19-13" status="unreviewed"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">daM pas bsngags pa'i gnas snar thang</rs> du bris pa'o ||</seg>
source: 2_050_06 'da' ka ye shes kyi 'chi kha ma'i man ngag.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex89022023-10-25-141025" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5314">legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po</rs> zhes bya ba| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4314">shAkya'i dge slong d*** (bus [bu] ston)** <anchor xml:id="a1"/> [seng ge'i] 'od<anchor xml:id="a2"/> </rs>kyis <pb n="[80b5]"/> bkod pa'o|| dge legs kyi dpag bsam phyogs bcu <abbr>thaMs cad du rgyas par gyur cig</abbr>| </seg>
source: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex89022023-10-25-141421" status="unreviewed"><note type="gloss">zhus dag go</note>|| <note type="gloss">phyi mo thi? lha|lhu bzhin bris so</note>|| |bkrashispardugyurcig|</seg>
source: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50032023-09-191" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="">paN di ta chen po byaMs</rs> (<rs type="person" ana="">rgyal ba byaMs pa</rs>'i chos 2 yod pa'i) <rs type="person" ana="">pa'i mgon po</rs>| zhes bya ba <rs type="place">ma ga da'i dgon pa</rs> 1 na bzhugs pa la| rmi laM <lb n="[5a1]"/> (btsun pa 1 gdugs dkar po 1 phub nas lha'i 'khor mang po dang 'dug) du <rs type="place">tsan dan gyi mchod rten khri 'phang 4 pa 1 </rs>gi nang du <rs type="work">rgyud bla ma</rs> dang||  <rs type="work">chos nyid kyi gdaM[s] ngag</rs> 2 btsug nas <rs type="deity">byaMs pa</rs> dngos kyis ngo sprod byas te| spyir rgyu rkyen 2 'bras bu 3 du dril nas ngo sprod pa dang| <lb n="[5a2]"/> bye brag tu rgyu chos nyi mi 'gyur bar ngo sprad pa dang| bsaM mi khyab 4 lo ngo sprod mdzod|| phyis gnyid sad pa dang chos 'ga' seMs la byung kyang ma rga ba las| 'phags pa dngos kyi thugs rjes| <lb n="[5a3]"/> bzung kyang nga la chos 'dzin pa'i nus pa med_do snyaM mo|| de nas sngar skor ba byed pa'i <rs type="place">mchod rten 1</rs> la| 'od snga na med pa de nas byung_ngo|| de nas gdaM[s] ngag yod daM snyaM nas phye bas byung_ngo|| </seg>
source: 2_050_03 Skyid ston_Theg chen rgyud bla ma gdams pa.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50032023-05-26011" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5618">de</rs>s <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4143">gzu rga ba <abbr>rdo rje</abbr></rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5616">'i grong khyer dpe med</rs> du <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="">lo tsha ba</rs></note> la bshad || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4143">de</rs>s <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4141"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5614">spu rangs</rs> <lb n="5a7"/> <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5615">tho ling gser khang</rs> gyi dge tshul dri med shes rab</rs><!--bstan kha bo che--> kyis sngar nas 'di mkhyen par mdzod <abbr>cig</abbr> byas nas <abbr>zhus so</abbr> || 
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4141">dge tshul de</rs>s <rs type="person" ref="db:4593"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5612">la stod lho pa</rs> gcig</rs> la gnang | <rs type="person" ref="db:4593">de</rs>s <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5613">do pa snyan</rs> la gnang |
                <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5613">de</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">bla ma snar pa</rs> <note type="gloss">brgyad par byon pa</note><!--sKyo ston--> la <lb n="5b"/><lb n="5b1"/>gnang | de <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4052">btsun pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="">ze'u</rs></note><!--Rigs pa'i ral gri-->la gnang pa'o ||</seg>
source: 2_050_03 Skyid ston_Theg chen rgyud bla ma gdams pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50032023-05-2608-58-01" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><abbr>dge'o</abbr> || <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">dben gnas snar thang</rs> du zhus shing bris ste zhus dag par <abbr>byas so</abbr> ||</seg>
source: 2_050_03 Skyid ston_Theg chen rgyud bla ma gdams pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex81012023-09-131" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5268">chos mngon pa kun las btus pa'i rgyan</rs> ces bya ba × × × ×  <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">mkhan po</rs> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">bla ma</rs>'i gsung gi lhag ma dang ; **** <lb n="208a6"/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">blo gsal 'ga</rs>s bskul pa dang ; rang gzhan gyi don du <hi rendition="#Time">shing pho rta'i lo</hi> la ; <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5865">btsun pa 'khon ston</rs> gyis; <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5695">dpal e'i gtsug lag khang</rs> du sbyar ba rdzogs s+hyo|| </seg>
source: 3_081_01 mngon pa kun las btus pa'i rgyan ces bya.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex81012023-09-13-143" status="unreviewed"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5695">dpal e'i chos gra chen po</rs>r blo dman <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="5269">dbul po byang chub mgon</rs> gyis bris || bris pa'i dge bas <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> thob par shog || dge'o|| </seg>
source: 3_081_01 mngon pa kun las btus pa'i rgyan ces bya.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50072023-10-13-092301" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4851">theg chen dbu ma'i gdaMs pa</rs> <abbr>bzhugs so</abbr> || × phyi¶ la ¶ 550</seg>
source: 2_050_07 theg chen dbu ma'i gdams pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50072023-10-13-092545" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">slob dpon chen po</rs>'i phyag dpe la<!--read: las--> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458">btsun pa chos rgyal</rs> <lb n="3b4"/>gyis bris shing zhus pa'o ||</seg>
source: 2_050_07 theg chen dbu ma'i gdams pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex50072023-09-12-094632" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><abbr>dag go</abbr> ||<rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">snar thang</rs> du <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="6458">ze'u</rs>s <abbr>bris so</abbr> ||</seg>
source: 2_050_07 theg chen dbu ma'i gdams pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87012023-03-0911-14-28" status="unreviewed"><lb n="1a2"/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5290">tshad ma rnaM nges kyi ti ka¶</rs><lb n="1a3"/>************<lb n="1a4"/>** *yi* chung *zhugs<lb n="1a5"/>4¶ (149)></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87012023-03-0911-19-17" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba</rs> gzhung mdzes pa bskyed pa de kho na dgos 'brel gi dgos pa yin zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87012023-03-0911-20-16" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba</rs> ni brjod bya bstan pas dgos med kyi log rtog sel zer ro|_|dgos med kyi log rtog bsal ba'i don du dgos pa dngos su brjod pa don med du thal lo|_|'dod na|_'bras bu med par dogs pa bzlog pa'i phyir dgos pa brjod do|_|ces so|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87012023-03-0911-21-20" status="unreviewed"><?oxy_comment_end?>| (PVin 2.1b)_zhes pa'i tshul gsum po de gang zhe na|_tshul gsum po'i ya gyal phyogs chos de ni rtags chos can rjes su dpag bya la yod par nges pa'o|_|ya gyal rtags kyi rjes 'gro'i [\[p.92-9\]43b9]khyab pa de ni rtags chos can de dang bsgrub bya'i chos yod tu mtshungs pa nyid la yang yod par nges pa'o|_|dang ni tshigs bcad la ma shong ba yin la|_nyid ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba</rs>'i 'gyur la chad pa yin te |_<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5551">dz+nya na shri</rs>'i 'gyur las |_rjes dpag bya dang de mthun la|_yod dang med nyid la med par|_nges pa|_ces 'byung ngo |_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87012023-03-0912-04-01" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba</rs>'i 'gyur la chad pa yin te|_<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5551">dz+nya na shri</rs>'i 'gyur las | rjes dpag bya dang de mthun la | yod dang med nyid la med par|_nges pa|_ces 'byung ngo |_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87012023-03-0911-40-15" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">paN Di phal che ba</rs> ni rtags gnyis po de rtags btags pa ba yin par 'dod pa yin te|_<rs type="work"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5551">dz+nya na shri</rs>'i [\[]ti ka[;]TIk+ka [\]]</rs> las 'bras bu dang rang bzhin du btags pa ba dag gi dbye bas zhes so|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87012023-03-0911-40-53" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bod thams cad</rs> ni [\[p.197-1\]]97a1 dang po rtags btags pa ba yin la|_gnyis pa rtags mtshan nyid pa yin par 'dod do|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87012023-03-0911-23-33" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba</rs>'i <rs type="work">ti ka</rs> las yid ches bsal pa la 2 te | khas blangs rang tshig tha dad du 'dod pa dang | tha mi dad du 'dod pa'i phyogs 2 99a1 su yod do ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87012023-10-04-131522" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="151b7"/>bdag nyid chen po'i gzhung don ji bzhin 'chad pas gzhan gyi the tshom gcod || rang rgyud thal 'gyur gtan tshigs rnam par dag pas nus pa shin du che || tshig don legs par 'phrod cing snga phyi 'brel pas 'jug ngogs shin du bde' || de ltar chos gsum tshang ba legs par bshad pa bstan pa'i 'od zer yin || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3747">mi 'pham mgon</rs> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3720">klu las (em: la) dbang bsgyur</rs> dang || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3771">phyogs <lb n="151b8"/> las rgyal</rs> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3773"><rs type="work">rnam 'grel</rs> mdzad pa</rs> ste || kun kyi legs bshad 'dzin pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4018">chu mig pa</rs>s || <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6173">chen po'i pho brang dge ba'i gnas</rs> su sbyar || legs bshad bstan pa'i 'od zer kun du 'phros pas 'gro ba thams cad kyang || nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i mun pa stug po rab bcom ste || ji ltar ji snyed shes bya'i don kun <pb n="152a"/><lb n="152a1"/> blo yi mig gis legs mthong nas || spangs dang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin byang chub chen po'i go 'phang thob par shog || <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5559">gangs can</rs> 'dir 'ongs gzhung [*] lugs 'di 'chad 'di yi don || legs par bshad dang ma bshad log <lb n="152a2"/> par bshad pa'i don || thams cad len 'chad 'dor la 'gal zlos med phyir 'di || blo ldan legs bshad don gnyer kun gyis blang bar rigs || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3773">dpal ldan grags pa</rs>'i gzhung don blta bar 'dod pa gzhan gyi blo || sprin tshogs stug pos bsgribs pa'i mkha' la nyi ma blta ba bzhin | <lb n="152a3"/> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4018">bdag</rs> gi blo gros dri ma med pa nam mkh'yangs pa'i dbus || rnam par nges don (nyi ma)'i dkyil 'khor skyon med rab tu gsal || ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87012023-03-0911-03-47" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4023">rgya shes rab dbang phyug</rs> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4022">'jang shag kya dpal</rs> <lb n="152a4"/> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4020">rkyel grags pa seng ge</rs> las sogs pa chen po rnams kyi zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos blangs te mang du thos pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol du phyin pa'i don dang | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780">slob dpon chos mchog </rs>gis mdzad pa'i <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5594">ti ka 'thad ldan</rs> dang | <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5597"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5551">kha che dz+nya na shri</rs>'i ti ka</rs> lasogs pa mthong ba'i don | bsams <lb n="152a5"/> pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis legs par gtan la phab pa'i don ston par byed pa | blo la zin pa tsam gyis mkhas pa'i mchog du 'gyur zhing mkhas pa rtag tu mi nyams par byed pa'i <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5290">ti ka chen po</rs> 'di | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4018">shag kya'i dge slong gtsang chu mig pa seng ge dpal</rs> gyis <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6173">gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug lag <lb n="152a6"/> khang</rs> du brtsams te <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5595"><choice><orig>ya°</orig><reg>yar</reg></choice> lungs</rs> <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5596">khra 'brug gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du yi ger bkod pa'o || rdzogs s+ho ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex108032023-10-06-113311" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5429">srid zhi mnyam nyid kyi lta ba'i khrid thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor nyams su len tshul</rs> bzhugs so||</seg>
source: 4_108_03 srid zhi mnyam nyid kyi lta ba’i khrid_25_04_2022.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex108032023-10-06-111733" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[1b1]"/>༄༅༅|  ༑ |na mo gu ru <rs type="deity">aA+rya man+dzu shi+riA ye</rs>| rten 'brel sna tshogs la <abbr>brten nas</abbr>|| gnas lugs ji bzhin ston bya ste|| skyabs song tshogs bsams sgrib pa sbyang|| rten 'brel lugs 'bung lugs bzlog sgom||… </seg>
source: 4_108_03 srid zhi mnyam nyid kyi lta ba’i khrid_25_04_2022.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex108032023-10-06-112825" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[1b4]"/> <!--input incomplete--><rs type="person" ana="">bla ma</rs> dang <rs type="deity">rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs</rs> la gus par phyag <abbr>'tshal lo</abbr>||<!--input incomplete--> <milestone unit="section" n="[Body of the text (ca_1b4, 96)]"/>
         'dir <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5429">srid zhi'i mnyam nyid kyi lta ba'i khrid</rs> ston par byed pa la don 3 ste| sngon 'gro dang| dngos gzhi dang| <lb n="[1b5]"/> rjes la ngo sprad pa'o||</seg>
source: 4_108_03 srid zhi mnyam nyid kyi lta ba’i khrid_25_04_2022.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex108032023-10-06-113435" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[15a5]"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5429">srid zhi mnyam nyid lta ba'i khyid</rs> 'di <rs type="person" ana="">'phags pa klu sgrub</rs> yab sras dang <rs type="person" ana="">dpal ldan zla ba grags pa</rs>'i <rs type="school">dbu ma</rs>'i gzhung lugs dag gi lung dang rigs pas kyang cung zad <lb n="[15a6]"/> brgyan nas <rs type="deity">rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyang</rs> kyi bka' 4n du <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4116">dpa' bo rdo rje</rs>s yig ger bkod pa'o|| ||</seg>
source: 4_108_03 srid zhi mnyam nyid kyi lta ba’i khrid_25_04_2022.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex108032023-10-06-115547" status="unreviewed"><milestone unit="section" n="[Post-colophon annotations (ca_15, p. 123)]"/>
        <lb n="[15a8]"/> <!--input incomplete-->khrid 'dis kyang <rs type="school">dbu ma'i lta ba</rs> rnaM dag ston mod kyi| 'on kyang dngos gzhi gsang 'dus kyi 'od gsal gyi khrid yin pa'i phyir| zhi gnas kyi skabs la rigs lnga yum bzhi la sogs la brten| <abbr>ting 'dzin</abbr> sgom pa'i <lb n="[15a9]"/> babs nan mo ma yin pa yod do|| </seg>
source: 4_108_03 srid zhi mnyam nyid kyi lta ba’i khrid_25_04_2022.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex108032023-10-06-115629" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_referernce" ref="db:4593">dpal dlan bla ma dam pa khu dbon</rs> gyi thugs dgogs rdzogs pa'i phyir du <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4137">nyi ma dpal</rs> gyi <rs typ="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5725">dge ldan</rs> du bzhegs pa'o||</seg>
source: 4_108_03 srid zhi mnyam nyid kyi lta ba’i khrid_25_04_2022.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex55012023-01-2321-20-21" status="reviewed"><lb n="1a2"/><rs type="work" ref="db:4947" ana="corpusmd:named_reference"><rs type="work" ref="db:3775" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">'brel<choice> <orig>‹pa›</orig><reg>pa</reg></choice> brtag pa</rs>'i rab tu byed pa</rs> <abbr>bzhugs</abbr> so ||</seg>
source: 2_055_01a_Ral gri_brel brtag rab byed mchan bu.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5501a2023-01-2321-21-06" status="reviewed"><rs type="place" ref="db:5558">rgya gar</rs> skad du ¦ <rs type="work" ref="db:3775" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">saM ban+d+ha pa ri k+Sha pra ka ra Na ¦</rs> <rs type="place" ref="db:5559">bod</rs> skad du ¦ <rs type="work" ref="db:3775" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">'brel pa brtag pa'i rab tu <lb n="1b2"/> byed pa</rs> |</seg>
source: 2_055_01a_Ral gri_brel brtag rab byed mchan bu.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex25501a2023-01-2321-21-42" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ref="db:4947"><rs type="work" ref="db:3775">'brel pa brtag pa</rs>'i chan bu</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">dpal ldan ral <choice><sic>bri</sic><corr>gri</corr></choice></rs>s bkod ||</seg>
source: 2_055_01a_Ral gri_brel brtag rab byed mchan bu.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex25501a2023-01-2316-16-43" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ref="db:3775" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">'brel pa brtag pa'i rab tu byed pa</rs> ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3776">slob dpon mkhas pa chen po chos kyi <abbr>grags</abbr> pa</rs>s mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho ||
               <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5560"><rs type="place" ref="db:5558">rgya gar</rs> gyi mkhan <pb n="4b"/><lb n="4b1"/> po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha</rs> dang ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5561">lo tsa ba ban+de nam mkha</rs>s bsgyur ||
            <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5563"><rs type="place" ref="db:5558">rgya gar</rs> gyi mkhan po dpal rab 'byor zhi ba</rs>'i zhal bzhus dang ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5562">zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong ting 'dzin bzang po</rs>s zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab zer |</note></seg>
source: 2_055_01a_Ral gri_brel brtag rab byed mchan bu.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex70022023-09-261" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><?oxy_comment_start comment="[bold face in source document]"?> shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshigs su bcad pa'i ti ka snying po gsal byed <?oxy_comment_end?>zhes bya ba| </seg>
source: 3_070_02 Shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i Tik+ka snying po gsal ba.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex70022023-09-262" status="unreviewed"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5702">dpal gyi 'byung gnas zhang gad rin <lb n="[25a9]"/> po che</rs> ru <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">phyug po me [>mi?] nyag pa</rs>s yon bdag mdzad nas| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4072">shag kya'i dge slong grags pa tshul khrims</rs> kyis <hi rendition="#Time">me mo klang gi lo<anchor xml:id="a1"/></hi> la| <abbr>slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs</abbr> <?oxy_comment_start comment="=Buddhajñānapada"?><?oxy_comment_end?> kyi <rs type="work">ti ka</rs> dang mthun par mdzad pa ; rdzogs s+ho|| I-ti|| dge'o|| bkra shis s+ho|| || </seg>
source: 3_070_02 Shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i Tik+ka snying po gsal ba.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex603_11102023-05-06" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:3730" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon ye shes snying po</rs>s mdzad pa'i <rs type="work" ref="db:3729">dbu ma bden pa gnyis rnam par 'byed pa</rs> la don lnga ste |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex603_11332023-05-06" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4480"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3729">dbu ma bden pa</rs> gnyis kyi don bsdus pa</rs> <rs type="person" ref="db:3831" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">rigs par smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s sbyar pa |||| rdzogs s+hO ||||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50192023-09-201" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[7a1]"/> ༄༅| |che <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">snar thang</rs> du byon nas | dge 'dun yon mchod 'khor dang bcas pa <hi rendition="#Time">dgung lo bcu</hi>'i bar du skyangs te |…</seg>
source: 2_050_19 sangs rgyas sgom pa'i rnam thar_08_03_2022.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50192023-09-2012" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (8a7-8b1 p.374)]"/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3985">bla ma </rs>yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bden gnyis seng ge'i nga ros mtha' gnyis su 'dzin pa'i ri dags skrag <lb n="[8b1]"/> par mdzad cing | skye dgu ma lus pa'i mgon skyabs dam par gyur pa'i yon tan ri rab ltar brjid pa las nyung 'bru tsam zhig <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">snar thang</rs> du sdebs pa'o||<anchor xml:id="a1"/></seg>
source: 2_050_19 sangs rgyas sgom pa'i rnam thar_08_03_2022.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex54012024-09-1216-56-432" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4942"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3774">tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i 'grel bshad rgyan gyi me tog </rs>ces bya ba shar phyogs dzA ga ta la'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">paN+Di ta chen po dA na shi la</rs>'i man ngag brgyud pa la brten te dben par gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'byed pa la brtson pa zab pa dang |_rgya che ba gang yin pa de la mos pa thob pa shAkya'i bstan pa la mang du thos pa'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">btsun pa rigs pa'i ral gri</rs>s sbyar ba 'di legs par rdzogs so||__||_!_</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex54012024-09-1216-56-43" status="unreviewed"><!--Vol. 62 todo add folio number-->: 
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5797">shakya'i btsun pa dbang bkras</rs> kyis bris pa e ma to ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex705-1129-2023-06-271" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4492"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3749">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i <abbr>bstan bcos</abbr></rs> kyi tshig dang don gyi cha rgya cher bsnyad pa phra ba'i don gsal ba</rs> zhes bya ba |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex7052023-07-1814-08-32" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3805">zla myed rigs pas smra ba chos gyi bla ma</rs> dpal <choice><reg>la</reg><orig>‹la›</orig></choice> 'dud ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex7052023-07-1814-32-32" status="unreviewed"><lb n="56a3"/> dad pa'am | ngo bo tha dad pa'am | ngo bo gcig la ldog pa tha dad pa yin zhe na | gcig pa bkag pa'i tha dad pa ma yin te | <abbr>thams cad</abbr> dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro | dngos po tha dad pa'i nges pa'ang myed de bag la nyal la sogs pa 'ga' zhig dngos po gcig par 'gyur ba'i go skabs yod pas so | dngos po 1 pa'i yang nges pa myed de rgyud bzhir phye ba'i rgyud tha dad pa rnaMs ngo bo tha dad par yang 'gyur ba'i <lb n="56a4"/> phri ro| des na dngos po gcig gam tha dad kyang bla ste mtshan nyid tha dad pa dgu yod pas sgrib pa dgu'o |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex705-1104-2023-06-272" status="reviewed"><choice><reg>bar</reg><orig>ba‹r›</orig></choice> rab sbyang blo gros gsal gyur pa || <rs type="person" ref="db:3805" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">blo ldan khyu mchog chos rje chos kyi bla ma</rs>'i <lb n="93a2"/> gsung || theg mchog don gsal byed pa dran phyir mngon bar bstus ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex705-1104-2023-06-29" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3831">bdag</rs> kyang de dag rjes su byang chub mchog thob nas || 'gro rnams zhi ba'i lam la rab du 'god gyur cig ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex705-1104-2023-06-273" status="reviewed"><choice><reg/><orig>{°}</orig></choice>ma pham chos rgyal dri myed pa sa <choice><reg>stengs</reg><orig>steng‹s›</orig></choice> 'dir || byang chub shing dbang drung du mngon sangs rgyas pa na <choice><reg>|</reg><orig>‹¦›</orig></choice><rs type="person" ref="db:3831" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">chos kyi seng ge</rs> blo gsal grags pa'i nyi 'od kyis || <lb n="93a4"/> theg pa mchog la rmongs pa'i rab rib sel gyur cig ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex705-1104-2023-06-28" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4490"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3749">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos</rs> kyi tshig dang don gyi cha rgya cher bsnyad pa phra ba'i don gsal ba</rs> zhes bya ba |<rs type="person" ref="db:3805" ana="corpusmd:named_reference"> shag kya'i dge slong chos kyi bla ma</rs>'i zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos nod pa <rs type="person" ref="db:3831" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s nye bar sbyar pa rdzogs s+hO ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50122024-09-1712-59-27" status="unreviewed"><milestone unit="section" n="[Title page (ku_1a1)] p. 253"/>
         ||<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">mkhan po chen po snar thang pa'i</rs><note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">skyo pa</rs></note> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4863"> gsan yig</rs>gzhugs s+hyo ||</seg>
source: 2_050_12 skyo ston smon lam tshul khrims kyi gsan yig.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50122024-09-1712-56-13" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (ku_14a7-14b1)] pp. 279-280"/>
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">bla ma rnams</rs> kyi bka' drin las <lb n="14a8"/> cung zad thob pa dang thos pa rnams | dran par bya zhing bskul ba'i bsam pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yi ger bris pa'o || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">shAkya'i btsun pa smon lam <pb n="14b"/><lb n="14b1"/>tshul khrims</rs> kyis thos yig go |
         <milestone unit="section" n="[Post-colophon annotation : Owner (ku_14b2)] p. 280"/>
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4864">shAkya'i btsun pa rtsed pa bsod nams blo gros</rs> kyi dpe'o||</seg>
source: 2_050_12 skyo ston smon lam tshul khrims kyi gsan yig.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex56252023-09-251" status="unreviewed"><pb n="4b"/><lb n="4b1"/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db5024">tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rgyan gyi me tog</rs> ces bya ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5639">dpal na ro pa chen po</rs> <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa'i <abbr>rjes su</abbr> 'brang nas mang du thos pa <lb n="4b2"/>°°°°°° <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5680">gtsang me tog mdang can gyi dgon pa</rs>r sbyar ba 'di rdzogs s+ho || dge'o ||</seg>
source: 2_056_25_I_R_M_Ral gri_tshogs kyi 'khor lo cho ga rgyan gyi me tog - checked PH.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex56252023-09-2" status="unreviewed"><!--written without tsheg between the syllables--><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">chos kyi rgyal po bcoM ldan ral gri</rs>'i phyag dpe la zhus te dag go||</seg>
source: 2_056_25_I_R_M_Ral gri_tshogs kyi 'khor lo cho ga rgyan gyi me tog - checked PH.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex15012023-09-15-113344" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work">blo gros kyi mun pa sel bar byed pa chos kyi sgron ma</rs> <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">ri bo gangs can</rs> kyi rgyud du byung pa | <rs type="person" ana="">'bre</rs> rje ?? khri thog bzang gi rigs las <rs type="person" ana="">gzhon nu</rs> la rab tu byung pa| bslab pa la?? spras su byed ba| <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> kyi bstan pa la ma byed pa'i dad pa can? || lung dang rigs pa'i bstan <lb n="148b1"/> bcos <rs type="work"><rs type="work">mngon rtogs rgyan</rs> gyi 'grel pa</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3893">slob dpon 'od zer mgon po</rs>s sbyar ba rdzogs so || ×  shis par gyur cig||</seg>
source: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50082023-09-131" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5052">bla ma snar thang pa brgyad par byon pa</rs> des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458">btsun pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> la <abbr>gnang ngo</abbr> || 
         <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">daM pa bsngags pa'i snar thang gi dben gnas</rs> <abbr>su</abbr> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458">ze'u</rs>s phyag dpe las bris shing zhus <abbr>dag go</abbr> || ||</seg>
source: 2_050_08 rten 'brel lag len du dril ba .xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex61142023-09-261" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work">theg pa chen po mdo sde rgyan gyi (pin tartha?)</rs> mang du thos pa'i dge slong <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">dpal ldan snar thang gi dgon pa</rs>r sbyar ba rdzogs so || dge'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex11152024-09-0412-06-12" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4544">rten cing 'brel par 'byung <abbr>ba'i</abbr> rab tu byed pa | 'khor 'das kyi chos <abbr>thams cad</abbr> blta' ba'i me long</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni | lung rigs <lb n="26a8"/> kyi gzhung 'grel mang du thos shing legs par sbyangs pas tshul <abbr>bzhin</abbr> du rtogs shing | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3854">rigs par smra ba'i btsun pa blo gros seng ghe</rs>s | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6812">dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsod</rs><pb n="16b"/><lb n="26b1"/> nams 'bum gyi don du | nye bar sbyar pas 'di re shig yongs su rdzogs s+ho || <note type="gloss"><abbr>zhus so</abbr></note></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex58022023-09-251" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work">smon 'jug gi seMs bskyed kyi cho ga</rs> | <rs type="person" ana="">jo bo chen po rje'i cho ga'i gzhung</rs> la ji ltar 'byung ba rnams| <rs type="person" ana="">bla ma rnams</rs> kyi phyag len dang sbyar nas <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4066">btsun pa thogs med</rs> kyis| <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5692">dngul chu'i chos sdzong</rs> <lb n="[14a5]"/> du bkod pa'o||</seg>
source: 2_058_02_I_R_M_thogs med_sems tsam lugs kyi smon 'jug sems bskyed kyi cho ga.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex61102023-09-131" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">pad <lb n="1b3"/>ma</rs>s mdzad pa'i <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5097">tshe bsgrub</rs> rdzogs s+ho || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458">ze'u</rs>s bris dge'o ||</seg>
source: 3_061_10_I_R_M_slob dpon pad ma_bde gshegs kun gyi snying po_20211221.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex8601_2023-10-042" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[1a3]"/> ||<rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5281">chos mngon pe? [pa] mdzod gyi rnaM_par bshad pa slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa</rs> bzhugs_s+ho|| </seg>
source: 3_086_01 chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam bshad slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex8601_2023-10-043" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[1b1]"/>||||… <rs type="work">chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnaM par bshad pa slob ma la phan pa</rs> zhes bya ba| phyogs bcu'i rgyal pa ras dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo|| ji snyed shegs pa thag mngon mkhyen|| gdul bya'i don la|ma bsnyel … <abbr>thugs rje</abbr> can|| srid pa'i mtshor </seg>
source: 3_086_01 chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam bshad slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex8601_2023-10-044" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[121b1]"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5281">chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnamM par bshad pa slob ma la phan pa </rs>zhes bya ba 'di| mdo'i [mdo] dang rgyu[d] sde mtha' dag la <lb n="[121b2]"/> dbang 'byor pas daM pa'i chos <quote xml:id="d2e64">'chad pa dang rtsod pa dang rtsoM pa</quote>'i tshul la spobs pa dge' bcan [=ba can]| mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang <abbr>thugs rje</abbr> rmad du byung ba mnga' ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4131">ye shes rdo rje dpal bzang po<anchor xml:id="a1"/></rs> zhes bya ba'i bka' drin las lung dang rigs pa'i de kho na nyid khong du chud pa mang du thos pa <rs type="person" ana="">shakya'i dge slong</rs> <lb n="[12b3]"/> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4130">blo gros grags pa<anchor xml:id="a2"/></rs> zhes bgyi bas| |<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">dge' ba'i bshes gnyen mang po</rs>s nan <abbr>chen po</abbr> yang dang yang du bskul ba'i ngor du ?| |<hi rendition="#Time">shing pho spre'u'i chu stod gyi zla ba'i tshe 1<anchor xml:id="a3"/></hi> la| |<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">mkhas pa'i skye bo</rs> du ma'i bsti gnas dam pa <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5950"> ra ti dga' ldan gyi chos grags [grwa?] chen po</rs>r<anchor xml:id="a4"/> nye bar sbyar ba 'di re shig <lb n="[121b4]"/> rdzogs s+ho|| 'dis 'khor ba snyul? gyi rgya mtsho chen po smyur du skeMs par 1|| dge'o|| ||</seg>
source: 3_086_01 chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam bshad slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex8601_2023-10-041" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[121b5]"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5281">chos mngon pa mdzod gyi rnaM bshad bloM [slob ma] phan pa</rs> las gnas dgu<anchor xml:id="a5"/>||</seg>
source: 3_086_01 chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam bshad slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50152023-09-1108-24-56" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4872"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3746">mdo sde rgyan</rs> gi khrid</rs> <abbr>bzhugs so</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50152023-09-1108-27-56" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4872"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3746">theg pa chen po mdo' sde'i rgyan</rs> rin po che dang 'dra ba'i man ngag</rs> 3 ste | dbang po rab la mtshan dang | 'bring la lus dang | tha ma la yan lag rgyas pa'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50152023-09-1108-31-58" status="unreviewed"><lb n="3b3"/>yongs su grub pa ni phun suM tshogs pa thob pa rin chen sgrol phye ba lta bu <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">rngog</rs> <abbr>zer ro</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50152023-09-1108-00-55" ana="corpusmd:colophon" status="reviewed"><lb n="3b6"/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">bla ma snar thang pa brgyad par byon pa</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">smon laM tshul khriMs</rs></note> des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458">btsun pa<note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458">ze'u</rs></note> chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> la gnang ste yi ger bris shing dag par <abbr>byas so</abbr>||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50152023-09-1108-00-56" ana="corpusmd:colophon" status="reviewed"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">daM pas bsngags pa snar thang gyi dben gnas</rs> <abbr>su</abbr><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">bla ma</rs>'i phyag <lb n="3b7"/>dpe <choice><corr>las</corr><sic>la</sic></choice> bris pa'o || zhus <abbr>dag go</abbr>|| </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1092023-02-1414-36-11" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="3746">theg pa chen po mdo sde rgyan</rs> gyi don <lb n="1a2"/> mtha' dag <abbr>gsuM</abbr> du gnas te | skabs <choice><orig>sgrub{°}</orig><reg>sgrub</reg></choice> pa dang | spro ba bskyed pa dang | chos brjod pa'o ||
        </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1092023-02-1414-28-48" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><rs type="deity" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">ma phaM</rs> rgyal sras daM pa legs bzhag de || blo chen <choice><sic>brtan</sic><corr>bstan</corr></choice> pa'ï sgron ma <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3758">dbyig <choice><orig>‹g›nyen</orig><reg>gnyen</reg></choice></rs> gis || blo <choice><orig>myi{°}g</orig><reg>myig</reg></choice> ldan pa rnaMs la gsal bar <choice><sic>mdzod</sic><corr>mdzad</corr></choice> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1092023-02-1414-20-02" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><choice><sic>rnaMs</sic><corr>nams</corr></choice><choice><orig>(thob)</orig><reg>thob</reg></choice> des sa steng 'dir || 'gro ba'i <lb n="24b11"/> <choice><sic>bugs</sic><corr>dbugs</corr></choice> 'byin byaMs chen gshags pa na || mnyes byas chos sgor mngon du <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">bdag</rs> bzhugs nas || chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba'i mun sel shog || || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1092023-02-1414-17-43" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4437"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3746">mdo sde rgyan</rs> gyi don bsdus</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis sbyar ba'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex66042024-09-1615-06-08" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="81a4"/> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4221">kyi ston 'jam pa'i dbyangs</rs> kyis bshad ||
         dge ba 'di yis 'gro kun sems bskyed de ||
            byang chub spyod pa'i tshul la legs zhugs pas ||
            tshogs gnyis rgyu chen rgya mtsho'i mthar son nas || sku gsum nor bu'i dpal la spyod par shog ||</seg>
