source: 3_066_04_skyi ston grags pa rgyal mtshan_BCA comm_etext.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex66042023-09-26-110525" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5149"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3727">byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa</rs>'i rgyan</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni |<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3977"> byang chub <lb n="81a5"/> sems dpa' chen po 'phyims nam mkha' grags</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="P1060"?><?oxy_comment_end?> yab sras kyi byin bslab ° zhugs pa'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4221">skyi ston 'jam pa'i dbyangs grags pa rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis 'grel pa<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">mkhan po </rs>lnga dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">gtsang pa</rs> lasogs pa'i legs bshad rnams blangs | nyes bshad rnams dor nas | <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5733">dpal ldan <abbr>sa skya</abbr>'i gtsug lag chen po</rs>r sbyar ba'o ||</seg>
source: 3_066_04_skyi ston grags pa rgyal mtshan_BCA comm_etext.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex66042023-09-091209" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5835"><abbr>chos skyong</abbr> dpal ldan</rs> gyi dpe'o
      </seg>
source: 3_066_04_skyi ston grags pa rgyal mtshan_BCA comm_etext.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex3012023-07-1008-51-50"><pb n="1a"/><lb n="1a1"/> phyi<lb n="1a2"/> tsha<lb n="1a3"/> 93<lb n="1a4"/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4457">sher <choice><reg>phyin</reg><orig>phyi(s?)</orig></choice> gyi bshad</rs> sbyar</seg>
source: 1_003_01_Ar_sher phyin sdud tshigs rnam bshad A.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex3012023-07-1009-02-40" status="reviewed"><note type="gloss">yuM la bstod pa ston pa</note> de nyid <note type="gloss">kyi</note> yum gyur gang yin dang ||<note type="gloss">***…***</note><note type="gloss">bla ma la bstod pa</note> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3807">'bre</rs></note> gang gi gsung gi 'od zer gyis ||<note type="gloss">bla ma'i khyad par</note>
         <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3816">ar</rs></note> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3816">bdag</rs> gi blo'i <note type="gloss">mi shes ba'i</note> mun sel ba'i || bla ma rnams la <note type="gloss">(de yan chad)***…***</note> gus btud de ||
         </seg>
source: 1_003_01_Ar_sher phyin sdud tshigs rnam bshad A.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex3012023-07-1009-02-42" status="reviewed"><note type="gloss">(rgyu mtshan gang*** na)</note> <note type="gloss">bshad par dam bca'</note> don gnyer skyes bus <note type="gloss">lha (gcig ?) ston **</note> bskul byas bas ||<lb n="1b2"/> <note type="gloss">rgyu gang gis 'bri na | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3807">'bre</rs></note> bla ma dam pa'i bka' drin gyis ||<note type="gloss">tshig dang don khyad par</note> rtogs <note type="gloss">(gang gis gsal byed na)? </note>dka'i mdo'i <note type="gloss"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3693">sdud pa</rs></note> tshig don gyi ||<note type="gloss">gang na</note> gsal byed cung zad <note type="gloss">gang gis na</note> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3816">bdag</rs> gis <note type="gloss">bshad gzhi</note> bri <note type="gloss">snying rje chen <abbr>bas so</abbr></note>||</seg>
source: 1_003_01_Ar_sher phyin sdud tshigs rnam bshad A.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex3012023-07-1009-06-03"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsa ba</rs> ltar na <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5530">'bum</rs> lasogs pa ni legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis gsungs pa yin la | <rs type="school">phyi rol pa dag</rs> sgra tshad mar <lb n="3b7"/> byed cing don ngan pa yang sgra bzang pos bstan na mchog yin no zhes de la mngon par zhen pa dgag cing ston pa po tshad mar gyur pa'i skyes bus don tshad mas 'thad na sgra ngan na yang gnod pa med do zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir <rs type="work">mdo' 'di'</rs> ni skad rnam pa bzhis gsungs pa yin ste | legs par sbyar ba'i skad dang | pra gi ta'i skad dang | a ba braM shi ta'i skad dang | be sha tse'i skad do ||</seg>
source: 1_003_01_Ar_sher phyin sdud tshigs rnam bshad A.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex3012023-07-1009-07-52"><note type="gloss">(skad 'grel)***</note> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha 1</rs> na re rgyas 'bring gsum gyi don sdud par byed pas sdud pa yin no zhes zer ro <note type="gloss">don 'du gsung</note>| de ni bden mod kyi 'on kyang rgyas 'bring gsum gyi don <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3807">'bre</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:0000">seng kar shag kya 'od</rs></note> <lb n="3b9"/> sdud pa'i ldog pa <choice><reg>na</reg><orig>na{°}</orig></choice> mtshan brtags pa ni ma yin no ||</seg>
source: 1_003_01_Ar_sher phyin sdud tshigs rnam bshad A.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex3012023-07-1008-53-45" status="reviewed"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5559">bod</rs> kyis bcug pa yin pas bshad du med do ||</seg>
source: 1_003_01_Ar_sher phyin sdud tshigs rnam bshad A.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex3012023-07-1009-09-00"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">slob dpon</rs> 'di'i ltar na mtshan gzhi'i rab tu dbye ba dang | mtshan <lb n="4b9"/>nyid dang | mtshon bya gsum gyis shes par bya'o ||</seg>
source: 1_003_01_Ar_sher phyin sdud tshigs rnam bshad A.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex3012023-07-1008-55-05" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5830">slob dpon sangs rgyas <abbr>ye shes</abbr> </rs> kho na'i rjes su 'brangs nas sbyar pa'i | <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4457"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3693">shes rab pha rol phyin pa sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa</rs></rs>'i rnam par bshad pa | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3816">shag kya'i dge slong byang chub <abbr>ye shes</abbr></rs> kyis mdzad pa || rdzogs s+ho ||||</seg>
source: 1_003_01_Ar_sher phyin sdud tshigs rnam bshad A.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex3012023-07-1008-58-53" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3816">kho bo</rs>s <note type="gloss">phyi mar</note> phan par 'gyur ba'i || mchid gros <note type="gloss">'og nas 'byung ba</note> 'di dag 'debs byed kyis || <note type="gloss">seMs can gyi khyad myed dang sbyor dang zur la bdag nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan brjod pa</note> 'di bzhin nyid kyis gsan par mdzod ||</seg>
source: 1_003_01_Ar_sher phyin sdud tshigs rnam bshad A.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex61132023-09-09-1206" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4922">grub pa'i mtha' rnam par bshad pa rgyan gyi me tog</rs> <lb n="114a9"/>ces bya ba rang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho lta bu la blo'i nyi ma'i 'od gsal <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">mang du thos pa'i <lb n="114a10"/>dge slong bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s sbyar ba 'di rdzogs s+ho || dge'o | zhu dag °</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex61132023-09-09-12.05" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5098">dge 'dun bzang po</rs>'i  dpe 'di yig mkhan <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5099">glang ma ?</rs> gyis bris so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1012023-01-2014-17-31" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ref="db:4422" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">dpal 'khor lo bde mchog lU i pa'i bstod pa yid bzhin nor bu</rs> <abbr>bzhugs s+ho</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1012023-01-2014-22-39" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3784">lots+tsha ba  <abbr>rin chen</abbr> bzang po</rs>s <rs type="work" ref="db:4422" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">bstod pa</rs> <abbr>rdzogs</abbr> s+ho ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex8012023-01-2014-38-27" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bla ma rnaMs</rs> la phyag 'tshal lo ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex801202023-01-2014-39-35" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3773">slob dpon chos kyi grags pa</rs>s mdzad pa'i <rs type="work" ref="db:3774" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">tshad ma rnaM par nges pa</rs> 'di la don bzhï <note type="gloss"><abbr>gsum</abbr></note> ste | bstan bcos rtsom pa'i rgyu dang | rang gi bstan bcos kyi 'bras bu dgos 'brel <note type="gloss"><abbr>gnyis</abbr> kyis bstan bcos rtsom pa la 'jug pa</note> dang | bstan bcos kyi rang bzhin dang | bstan bcos kyi don nges pas <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3771"><rs type="work" ref="db:3770" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">mdo</rs> mdzad pa</rs>'i <choice><sic>dgos</sic><corr>dgongs</corr> </choice> pa nges pa la spro ba bskyed pa'o |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex8012023-01-2014-49-18" status="reviewed"><note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5534">dul lha</rs> dang |  <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5550">shan ti pa</rs> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsa ba</rs> ltar na</note> dang po la lnga ste | 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'i rtags dgod pa dang | don las don dang 'dra ba skye ba dang ¦ don yang ming <lb n="2a5"/> 'brel pa <abbr>med</abbr> pa dang ¦ ming 'dzin <note type="gloss">ming snang pa tsaM gyi spyi rigs</note> pa la don dang 'brel <note type="gloss">par snang</note> pas khyab pa<note type="gloss">s rang gi mtshan nyid kyi ming snang yang <abbr>gsum</abbr> gyis </note>ming don <note type="gloss">dang</note> ma 'brel bas don las skye bas <note type="gloss">skye basskyes pa la</note><!--TODO check arrow-->ming mi snang pas khyab pa dang | shugs la grub pa <choice><orig>yul la{°}</orig><reg>yul la</reg></choice> ltos pa'i sbyor ba dang ¦ dngos su bstan pa yul can la ltos pa'i sbyor ba <abbr>gnyis kyis</abbr> skabs kyi don bsdu ba dang | sgra don bdag cig kyang don las skye ba la ming mi snang pas khyab pa dang | zhar la rnaM rtog srid pa'i yul yid kyi rnaM shes yin pa'o</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex8012023-01-2014-55-54" status="reviewed"><note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsa ba</rs>s de yan chad kyis don gyi mthu skyes kyi rjes 'gro'i khyab <choice><orig>(pa bshad)</orig><reg>pa bshad</reg></choice> zin nas de'i ldog ston gsung ste de ltar na khyab pa grub pa na sgrub bya grubs du 'gyur bas 'di <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780">chos mchog</rs> ltar </note> sgra spyi <choice><orig>mi‹ng›</orig><reg>ming</reg></choice> snang pa dgag pa la lnga ste |
            <note type="gloss">'di rtag pa rang rgyud du byed kyang rgyas thal gyur du byas so</note>'dod pa ma gnod pa'i thal 'gyur bstan pa dang | brjod pa snang pa brda dran pa la ltos pas 'bras bu'i rtsa ba'i thal 'gyur gyi khyab pa sgrub pa dang | 'dod pa la gnod <pb n="2b"/><lb n="2b1"/> thal 'gyur gyi khyab pa sgrub pa dang | de'i 'dod pa la gnod pa'i thal ba dang | bzlog pa'i rtags kyis rtsa ba'i sgrub bya sgrub pa'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex8012023-02-2415-18-33" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><abbr>gsum</abbr><note type="gloss">gsum<abbr>bzhi</abbr></note> ste | skyes bu'i lung dgag pa dang | rig byed dgag pa dang | <note type="gloss">gsum</note> sgra kun rang gi don la tshad mas dgag <note type="gloss">dang | don bsdu</note><note type="gloss">gsung</note> pa'o ||<!--TODO anonymous citation without mention of a named or unnamed person--></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex8012023-01-3110-23-53"><lb n="7a4"/><abbr>gnyi</abbr> ga la rigs pa'i gnod pa la <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5549">shag kya blo</rs> <note type="gloss">'i <abbr>rjes su</abbr> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsa ba</rs></note> <abbr>lasogs</abbr> pa ltar na</note> <abbr>gnyis ste</abbr> | spyir bstan pa dang ¦ dpe la sbyar ba <abbr>gnyis kyis</abbr> mngon suM gyis gnod pa dang | 'thad pas gnod pa'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex8012023-01-2015-15-29" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ref="db:4499" ana="corpusmd:named_reference"><rs type="work" ref="db:3774" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i bsdus don</rs> | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">rigs pa smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s sbyar pa rdzogs s+h+yo ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex8012023-01-2015-16-15" status="reviewed"><lb n="13b4"/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4098">mang du thos pa'i dge slong rdo rje dbang grags</rs> kyis sbyin par bya ba'i chos s+h+yo ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex38032023-09-181" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="[102a4]"/> <rs type="person" ana="">dgra bcom pa chen po sa ga'i lha</rs>s <?oxy_comment_start comment="Visakhadeva, P7673"?><?oxy_comment_end?><anchor xml:id="a1"/> mdzad pa'i <rs type="work">'dul ba'i bstan bcos me tog phreng rgyud kyi TI ka bla ma'i legs bshad rgya cher bshad pa legs bshad rgya mtsho</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type="person" ana="">bla ma thams cad mkhyen pa dka' bzhi pa shes rab seng ge</rs>'i <?oxy_comment_start comment="sNar thang pa| rGyud smad Shes rab seng ge, P2093"?><?oxy_comment_end?><anchor xml:id="a2"/> gsung la [b]rten nas <rs type="person" ana="">mang du thos pa bsaM [102a5] gtan bzang po</rs>s rnam g.yengs spang te <rs type="person" ana="">ston pa </rs>myang ngan las 'das nas <hi rendition="#Time">lo sum stong bzhi brgya dgu bcu rtsa gsum pa'i dus</hi> su| <hi rendition="#Time">gdong ngan gyi lo sa ga'i dkar phyogs tshes brgyad<anchor xml:id="a3"/> </hi>la <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">dpal snar thang gi gtsug lag khang chen po</rs>r rdzogs par sbyar ba'o| |'di la brten nas sems cad thams cad kyis blang dor gyi gnas rtogs nas| 'jug ldog phyin ci ma log par byas te rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sar bsgrod par gyur cig|</seg>
source: 2_038_03_ bSam gtan bzang po_me tog phreng rgyud kyi TIk+ka legs bshad rgya mtsho.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex610320230926090052" status="unreviewed"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4383">ldan mchad khar<anchor xml:id="a3"/></rs> bris || × shu b+haM||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex610320230926090053" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3977">mchims nam_mkha' grags</rs> gyis mdzad par grags gsung |<anchor xml:id="a4"/> </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex61032023-09-26-091118" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3829">pu to ba</rs> yan blo sbyong chen po dang ka|gcig?| de nas <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4104">glang thang ba<anchor xml:id="a5"/></rs> × <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4156">dgyal pa chos 'bar<anchor xml:id="a6"/></rs> × <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3874">'chad kha ba {ye shes rdo rje </rs>P3447}<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3859"> se spyil phu ba {chos kyi rgyal mtshan </rs>P3448}× <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:"><!--TODO person ID in APIS-->lha chen po {Lha chen lung gi dbang phyug</rs> P3449<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4048">} lha 'gro mgon {Lha 'gro ba'i mgon po</rs> P4137<rs type="person" ana="">}<anchor xml:id="a7"/></rs>× <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3977">mchims namkha' grags</rs>| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:"><!--TODO person ID in APIS-->slob dpon ston zhaNG<anchor xml:id="a8"/></rs> × <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4158">Sang 'od? pa</rs> × <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:"><!--TODO person ID in APIS-->mkhan po seng rgyal ba<anchor xml:id="a9"/></rs> des <rs type="person" ana="">bdag</rs> so</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex67022024-09-1610-30-07" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb edRef="inst:4711" n="122a5"/>bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros kyis sde snod du ma'i don thugs su chud cing yon tan du ma'i dpal 'byor gyis 'gro ba mang po'i 'dren pa chen por gyur mang po'i 'dren pa chen por gyur pa yongs kyi <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">dge ba'i <lb edRef="inst:5152" n="73a5"/>bshes gnyen mkhan po nam <lb edRef="inst:4711" n="122a6"/>mkha' ches</rs> dang | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">mkhan po zhang chos rgyal rin chen</rs> dang | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">mkhan po byams pa'i dpal</rs> lasogs pa slob ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang pos gsol ba btab pa'i ngor | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4068">shAkya'i dge slong skad gnyis <lb edRef="inst:4711" n="122a7"/>smra ba blo gros dpal bzang po</rs>s gtso bo che par <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">mkhas pa chen po shes rab 'byung gnas <lb edRef="inst:5152" n="73a6"/>blo gros</rs> gyi 'grel pa dang bstun gsal bar bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5802">dge slong ston pa brtson 'grus seng ge</rs>'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19112024-09-1013-25-17" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4616">dpal ldan dus 'khor <lb n="15b3"/>bde stong gnyis med kyi || bsgrub thabs mdor bsdus rnal 'byor bcu gnyis pa</rs> || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">shakya'i dge slong chos grub dpal</rs> dang ni | grogs <lb n="15b4"/> mchog dga' yis <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4608">bdag</rs> la legs bskul phyir || snyigs ma'i dus na <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">rgyal ba gnyis pa</rs>'i tshul || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3905">kun spangs chos rje</rs>'i gsung bzhin <lb n="15b5"/> rang bzo'i || dri ma med pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4608">shes rab</rs> ming can gyis || legs par bris la nyes nongs bzod par gsol ||</seg>
source: 1_019_11_Shes rab 'bum_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor bcu gnyis pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19112023-09-15-125911" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="15b7"/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4616">dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor bcu gnyis pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni | dpal rdo rje <pb n="16a"/><lb n="16a1"/>'dzin pa gnyis pa dpal ldan <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3905">bla ma dam pa kun spangs pa chen po</rs> <note type="gloss">thugs rje rtson khrus</note>'i zhabs kyi rdul dri ma med pa spyi bos len pa | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4608">shakya'i dge slong shes <lb n="16a2"/>rab 'bum bdag</rs> gis bla ma dam pa nyid kyi phyag len bzhin | bla ma dam pa'i gsung dang gdams pa la brten nas <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5654">dpal <note type="gloss">byo°°</note>nags rgyal gyi dben gnas dkar leb</rs> du sbyar <lb n="16a3"/>ba 'di yongs su rdzogs s+ho || || dge'o ||</seg>
source: 1_019_11_Shes rab 'bum_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor bcu gnyis pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19112023-09-15-125912" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5626">shakya'i btsun pa nyi ma rgyal mtshan</rs> gyi dpe'o | dag go | </seg>
source: 1_019_11_Shes rab 'bum_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor bcu gnyis pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex502_10502023_05_022" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3806">dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gro lung pa</rs>'i <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4473">bstan rim chen mo'i don bsdu</rs>'am <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4473">lam rim</rs> bzhugs so |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex5022023-07-1011-29-41"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3745">jo bo</rs>s chos bzhi dang ldan pa la brten dgos par gsungs te || mkhas pas lta ba khyad du mi gsod pa | <lb n="3b7"/> btsun pas tshul khrims khyad du mi gsod pa || tshe 'di don du mi gnyer ba | byang chub don gnyer ba'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex502_2024-08-3013-38-05" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4189">rje btsun sgam po pa</rs>'i <lb n="3b8"/> zhal nas || chos gsum dang ldan par gsungs te || <quote>shes rab chen pos gzhan gyis lam sna 'khrid pa | snying rje chen pos 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa || tshe 'di la ltos pa ma mchis pa'o || </quote><!--Source=sGam po pa gsung 'bum'-->
         </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex502_2024-08-3013-39-04" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5639">bla ma rin po che</rs> yis || <quote>gsol ba 'debs pa'i bla ma'i mtshan nyid ni <pb n="4a"/><lb n="4a1"/>gang gi drin gyis bde chen nyid || skad cig nyid la 'char ba gang || bla ma rin chen lta bu'i sku || rdo rje can zhabs pad la 'dud ||</quote><!--Source=dbang gi bya ba mdor bsdus--></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex502-19072023-05-24" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3745">jo bo</rs>'i zhal nas |<quote> <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> <pb n="5a"/><lb n="5a1"/> dngos bzhugs tsam na bla ma dkon mchog bzhi pa yin | sangs rgyas 'das nas 'khor dag yod tsam na bla ma de sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa yin | da lta sangs rgyas las lhag pa yin gsung ste |de la rgyu mtshan gsum sangs rgyas thams cad <lb n="5a2"/>kyi 'phrin las bsdus pa yin pas na bla ma de sangs rgyas las lhag | snyigs ma lnga'i dus su skyob pas bla ma sangs rgyas las lhag | byang chub kyi lam dngos su ston pas bla ma sangs rgyas las lhag go | de ltar yin pa yang | tshogs chen po yis <lb n="5a3"/>lung ston dpal la phyag 'tshal lo|| sems can nyam thag gnas nas 'don la || dngos su ston cing dri ma bral la bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo ||</quote> zhes <abbr>gsungs so</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex502-2023-05-342" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:4182" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">dge bshes stod lung pa</rs>'i zhal nas | nga la ston pa'i 'du shes skyed cig byas na | khyed kyis rgas su khyod la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed na dang khyod dga' ste || bskyed la bzhag gi sems pa srid de ma skyed na yang ma skyes <lb n="5a6"/>su la gnod lta ba yin gsung skad de de mad pa yin gsung || de bas na bla ma la sangs rgyas dngos kyi 'du shes gsha' ma gcig skyes na gnas skabs dang mthar <abbr>thug gis</abbr> yon tan gong ma kun 'byung ba'o || de la sgrub pa'i bsnyen bkur ni | nyon mongs pa <lb n="5a7"/> dang nyes spyod spongs pa dang | dge ba la brtson pa gnyis yin te || de ltar ma byas na bla ma'i bka' bcag pa yin gsung ngo ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex502-19072023-05-39" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3747">mgon po byams pa</rs>'i zhal nas || 
         <quote><lg>
            <l>bkur sti rnyed pa dag dang rim gro dang ||</l> 
            <l> sgrub pa'i sgo nas bshes gnyen bsten par bya ||</l>
         </lg></quote>
    <lb n="5a8"/>zhes gsungs so||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5022024-08-3013-21-41" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5639">dpal nA ro pa</rs>s <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5641">tI lo pa</rs>'i phyag phyir lo bcu gnyis 'brangs nas | dka' ba bcu gnyis <lb n="5b3"/>spyad pas dngos grub thob pa bzhin du || mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub rnams ma bsgrubs kyang thob bo || <abbr>grangs su</abbr> ma chad pa ni | <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> kyi <abbr>yon tan</abbr> mtha' med pa bla ma la brten te 'byung bas bgreng bar mi lang ba'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5022024-08-3008" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5639">nA ro pa</rs>s <quote>ri rab gser gyi ngos <lb n="6a3"/>la bya gnas pa || rang gi rang bzhin dor nas gser du snang zhes so|_|</quote></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex502-11252023-05-22" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4189">rje sgam po pa</rs>'i zhal nas kyang |<quote> 'chi ba sgom pa ni dang por gal che ste | chos la 'jug pa'i <lb n="9b6"/>  rgyu yin || bar du gal che ste brtson 'grus kyi lcag yin  | tha mar gal che ste chos kyi sku gsal 'debs yin 
         </quote> ces <abbr>gsungs so</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5022023-07-1912-16-00" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3745">jo bo</rs>'i <lb n="23a6"/>bzhed kyis smon pa ni 'bras bu la dam 'cha' ba yin la 'jug pa ni rgyu la dam 'cha' ba'o || de'i go ba ni / smon pa 'bras bu la dam 'cha' ba ni | 'bras bu gzhan don du <lb n="23a7"/>byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir rgyu bya chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la bslab par bya'o zhes dam 'cha' ba'o |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex5022023-07-1912-20-07" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3806">kho bo</rs>s ni gzhung bltas na 'di ltar go ste | gzhan don du byang chub thob <lb n="23a8"/> par 'dod pa ni smon pa yin la | gzhan don du byang chub thob par 'dod pa 'i don du bslab pa la slom par 'dod pa 'jug pa yin | de yang bslab pa la slob par 'dod pa rkyang pa ni ma yin te | byang chub ni ched du bya ba'i dmigs pa yin la | bslab pa ni dngos kyi dmigs pa yin pas |<pb n="23b"/><lb n="23b1"/> gnyis ka thob pa dang slob par 'dod pa'o || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3743">slob dpon zhi ba lha</rs> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3745">jo bo</rs>'i bzhed pa yang de ltar yin par go ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex5022023-07-1912-29-59" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><lb n="24b7"/> ni chos drug dang ldan te | theg pa chen po'i chos la dad cing mos pa dang | thob shing shes pa dang | rigs dang ldan pa dang | bla ma la gus pa dang | smon pa brten pa dang | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3745">jo bo</rs>'i lugs kyi so so thar pa rigs bdun gang rung gcig dang ldan pa'o ||
            </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex502-12422023-05-22" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3745">jo bo</rs>s de'i steng du snying rje dang bsnan pas chos bzhi ldan 'dod de |  <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3744">lam sgron</rs> las | 
       <quote>  <lg>
            <l xml:space="preserve">sdom pa'i cho ga la mkhas dang | bdag nyid gang zhig sdom la gnas | sdom pa 'bogs bzod snying rjer ldan | bla ma bzang por shes par bya ||</l>
         </lg></quote>
         zhes gsungs so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5022023-07-1913-00-24" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> na re | snum khur dang | dbyugs pa'i rigs pas so so thar pa'i thun mong ba bzhi yang | de bzhi don gyi go bar 'gyur te |rnyed dang bkur sti la chags pas | bdag la bstod cing <lb n="29b7"/> gzhan la smod pa dang | ser snas bdag gi nor gzhan la ma byin pa dang | khros pas gzhan la tshogs pa dang | rmongs pas chos ltar bcos par smra na yang ltung ba 'gyur na | rim pa bzhin du chags pas mi tshangs par spyod pa dang | gzhan gyi nor brkus <lb n="29b8"/>pa dang | gzhan gyi srog gcod pa dang | brdzun du smra ba rnams lta smos su yang med do || zhes gsungs pa de ni rigs so <choice><corr>gsungs so</corr><sic>gsungs ngo</sic></choice> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5022023-07-1913-04-36" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> kun rdzob shes pa'i shes rab dang | don dam shes pa'i shes rab bo || tha mi dad pa shes pa'i shes rab la yang 'dod do ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex502-2023-05-34" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3745">jo bo</rs>s ni | 
      <quote>   <lg>
            <l xml:space="preserve">lnga po thabs yin la | shes rab dang gnyis su 'dod do || de yang shes rab pha rol phyin spangs pa'i || sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin la sogs || dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad dag || rgyal ba rnams kyi thabs su bshad |</l>
         </lg></quote>
         zhes gsungs so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5022023-07-1913-24-02" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i | sems can don byed kyi tshul khrims kyi dngos gzhi yin zhes zer ro || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex502-19072023-05-36" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3745">jo bo</rs>s | thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab dang | shes rab dang <lb n="35b4"/>bral thabs dag kyang |gang phyir 'ching pa zhes gsungs pa |de bas gnyis ka spang mi bya |zhes pa ste |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex5022023-07-1912-45-04" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5644"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5640">grub chen sa ra ha</rs>s mdzad pa'i do ha</rs> las |
         <quote><lg>
            <l xml:space="preserve">snying rje dang bral stong pa nyid zhugs gang |_|des ni lam mchog rnyed pa ma yin no|_|'on te snying rje 'ba' zhig bsgoms na yang ||<lb n="35b6"/>'khor ba 'di las thar pa thob mi 'gyur|_|gang yang gnyis po sbyor bar nus pa des|_|'khor bar mi gnas mya ngan 'das mi gnas|_|</l>
         </lg></quote>
         zhes pa'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex502-11552023-05-22" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4474">thub pa'i bstan la rims kyis 'jug pa'i tshul</rs> || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bla ma</rs>'i gsungs dang lung la bstan nas bris || de las byung ba'i dge ba gang thob des || 'gro rnams log pa'i lam du mi 'gro zhing || yang dag laM zhugs sku <lb n="40a4"/> gsum thob par shog ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex502-1262023-05-22" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3806">bdag</rs> kyang <rs type="deity">thub pa</rs>'i bstan pa rgyas byed cing || yang dag lam zhugs sku gsum thob nas kyang || lhun grub rgyun chad med pa'i 'phrin las kyis || nam mkha' mnyam pa'i 'gro ba sgrol bar shog ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex5004-12512023-05-23" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4474">sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rims kyis 'jug pa'i tshul</rs> <lb n="40a5"/> lam <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4474">blo sbyong</rs> 'am <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4474">lam rim</rs> zhes bya ba ni<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3806">gro lung pa blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> <choice><corr>kyis</corr><sic>kyi</sic></choice><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4332">gsang phu</rs>r sbyar ba'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45022024-09-1110-23-42" status="unreviewed"><?oxy_comment_end?>'i mtshan nyid : yul de la tshad ma yin par rang stobs kyi nges shes de ma thag tu 'dren pa'i tshad ma.mtshan gzhi ni : <quote source="RT 8" n="">don rig 2 dang rang rig dang ; rjes su dpag pa rang las nges</quote> (RT VIII 64ab)zhes pa dang <quote source="RT 8" n="">don byed pa dang goms pa can | rjes su dpag pas nges par byed |</quote> (RT VIII 65ab) zhes <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5564">rigs <lb n="3a6"/>gter</rs> las bshad pa dang | rnal 'byor mngon sum yang yin no ||</seg>
source: 2_045_02_Sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan_mtshan nyid bsdus pa_etext.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45022024-09-1110-23-422" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5564">rigs gter</rs> las : <quote source="RT 8" n="">dang po ba dang yid ma gtad || 'khrul rgyu can rnams gzhan la nges |</quote> (RT VIII.64cd)zhes so ||</seg>
source: 2_045_02_Sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan_mtshan nyid bsdus pa_etext.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex45022023-09-19" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (9a5--9a6)]"/>
         las dang po pa la nye bar mkho ba <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4773">tshad ma'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa rigs pa'i sgo 'byed pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni          <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5911">mdar btsun pa rin chen bzang po</rs>s yang dang yang du bskul ba'i ngor dang ¦ gzhan yang shes ldan 'ga' res bskul <abbr>ba'i phyir </abbr> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5910">shakya'i <lb n="9a6"/>btsun pa sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan</rs> gis go bde <abbr>ba'i phyir</abbr> du lung dang ri<abbr>gs</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> sgo nas dgag gzhag dang skyon gyi gcod tshul phra mo rnaMs re shig bzhag nas ding sang gi <abbr>rtog ge</abbr> pa <abbr>thams cad</abbr> kyi brda cha‹d› dang mthun par <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5697">dben gnas brag dkar</rs> du sbyar ba rdzogs s+ho ||</seg>
source: 2_045_02_Sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan_mtshan nyid bsdus pa_etext.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="exX202024-09-1811-03-222" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="1a1"/>Pa <!--volume-->
               <lb n="1a2"/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5871">phar phyin chu tik</rs> bzhugs | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6036">thang bla brang pa</rs>'i dpe' ||<!--different hand-->
               <lb n="1a3"/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5871">Tik chen lung don rnaM gzigs</rs> zhes pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4018">gtsang chu mig pa seng ge dpal</rs> gyis mdzad pa bzhugs so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="exX202024-09-1811-03-223" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="N008"/>logs par 'thong nas <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5870">lung don rnam gzigs</rs> 'di || 
               mi 'pham 'gon dang klu la dbang bsgyur dang || 
               phyogs las rgyal dang rnams 'grel mdzad pa ste || 
               kun gyi gzhung lugs 'dzin pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db.4018">chu mig pa</rs>s ||
               <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:6173">chen po'i pho brang dge pa'i gnas</rs> su sbyar || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="exX202024-09-1811-03-22" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="208a3"/>las byung pa'i shes rab kyis || legs par bstan la phabs pa'i don zab pa pa dang rgya che ba bston par byed pa 'di || lung dang rigs pa'i don la dbang phyug du rgyur pa || | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db.4018">shakya'i dge slong rtsang chu mig pa sang ge <note type="gloss">dpal</note> bzang po</rs> <note type="gloss">gyis</note> <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6173">gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug khang</rs> du legs par sbyar pa'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex17012023-07-2411-54-04" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4588"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3749">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos</rs> kyi nges don gsal bar byed pa rin po che'i sgron me</rs> bzhugs s+hO |</seg>
source: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex17012023-07-2411-54-05" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4588"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3749">theg pa <abbr>chen po</abbr> rgyud <abbr>bla ma'i</abbr> bstan bcos</rs> kyi nges pa'i don gsal bar byed pa <abbr>rin po che'i</abbr> sgron me</rs> <lb n="2"/> zhes bya ba |</seg>
source: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex17012023-07-2412-28-34" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon</rs> gyi bla ma</rs>'i zhal snga nas kyang |_sems nyid gcig pu kun gyi sa bon te|_|gang la srid dang mya ngan 'das 'phro ba|_|'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa yi|_|yid bzhin nor 'dra'i sems la phyag 'tshal lo|_|zhes pa dang 'gal lo|_|</seg>
source: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex17012023-07-2412-29-35" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon</rs> gyi <rs type="work">springs yig</rs> las|_mthun par gyur pa'i yul du gnas pa dang |_|skyes bu dam pa la ni brten pa dang |_|bdag gis legs smon sngon yang bsod nams bgyis|_|'khor lo chen po bzhi ni khyod la mnga'|_|zhes gsungs pa'o|_|</seg>
source: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex17012023-07-2412-32-11" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon 'jam dpal grags pa</rs> ni ngo bo nyid la sogs pa sngar gyi bzhi po dang bya ba thams cad thugs su chud cing sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i bya ba grub pa'i ye shes la ye shes kyi sku zhes bya ste lngar bzhed do|_|</seg>
source: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex17012023-07-2412-33-39" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon kun dga' snying po la sogs pa 'ga' zhig</rs> ni dang po bcu byang chub sems dpa'i yin la tha ma gnyis sangs rgyas nyid kyi yin par bzhed do|_|</seg>
source: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex17012023-07-2412-33-38" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon shAkya bshes gnyen</rs> ni dka' ba spyod pa'i tshe rnam par smin pa'i sku de nyid du bzhag nas sprul pa'i skus 'og min du song ste der sangs rgyas nas slar yang sngar gyi sku la bzhugs te|_byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa la sogs pa mdzad pas dang po bdun byang chub sems dpa'i yin la phyi ma lnga sangs rgyas kyi yin par 'dod de|_theg pa chen po ba phal cher gyis thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yin par bzhed do|_|</seg>
source: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex17012023-07-2411-54-06" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4588"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3749">theg <lb n="4"/> pa <abbr>chen po</abbr> rgyud <abbr>bla ma'i</abbr> bstan bcos</rs> kyi nges pa'i don gsal byed pa <abbr>rin po che'i</abbr> sgron me</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type="place">yul dbus</rs><anchor xml:id="a3"/> kyi <lb n="5"/> char byung pa × <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3896">rigs par smra ba <abbr>blo gros</abbr> mtshungs med</rs> kyis | skyes bu mkhas pa'i <abbr>tshogs</abbr> kyis brten pa'i bsti <lb n="6"/> gnas dpal <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6173">gsang phu ne'u thog gi chos gra <abbr>chen po</abbr></rs>r sbyar ba'o||
         </seg>
source: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex17012023-09-15-120548" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5898">'jam dpal rgyal mtshan</rs> nas | len cig zhus pa'i dag |</seg>
source: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex46042024-09-1214-47-22" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3773">bdag nyid chen po chos kyi grags pa</rs>s ri<abbr>gs</abbr> pa'i bstan bcos tshad ma sde bdun mdzad pa'i lus kyi <abbr>bstan bcos</abbr> bar pa <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3774">tshad ma <abbr>rnaM par <lb n="1b1"/></abbr> ng[e]s pa</rs> la 3 te ||</seg>
source: 2_046_04_Grags pa rgya mtsho_rnam nges syor phreng yid bzhin nor bu_etext.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex4604_2023-09-19-11" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4024">grags pa rgya mtsh </rs>'am || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4024">legs pa'i <note type="gloss">mtshan ldan</note> bde legs 'byung gnas</rs> kyis || <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5668">gtan gnas srog shing bod kyi <abbr>rdo rje</abbr> gdan || gur thang rtsug lag <lb n="89a9"/>khang chen</rs> x 'di sbyar x rdzogs||</seg>
source: 2_046_04_Grags pa rgya mtsho_rnam nges syor phreng yid bzhin nor bu_etext.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex10012024-07-31-15-03"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="">jo bo 'buM</rs> <lb n="2a2"/> pa ni <rs type="school">dbu ma sgyu ma lta bu</rs> dang | <rs type="school">rab du mi gnas pa</rs> gnyis kyi don shes pa ste |
         dang po ni bden pa'i chos kyis stong ba yin la | gnyis pa ni snang ba tsaM du yang mi gnas pa yin no ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex10012024-07-31-15-04"><rs type="school">rab du mi gnas pa</rs> dang | <rs type="school">sgyu ma lta bu</rs> ni 'o zhes 'chad pa ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="">jo bo</rs>'i dgongs pa ma yin no || <note type="gloss">……dbu ma nyid…..</note></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex10012024-07-31-15-55"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="">lo tsha ba</rs> ltar na khyod bshad par dam bcas nas bstan chos 'chad na | bstan chos kyi brjod bya mngon par rtogs pa thaMd nyams su myong nas saM | 'on te bla ma do pa'i bdang gag la brten nas 'chad |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex10012024-07-31-15-29"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="">khyung po</rs> na re seng ge bzang pos nges 'byed zag med chung ngur bshad pa'i rjes su <lb n="130a5"/>'brangs nas | de'i rigs thar pa'i ma 'thun yang zag med du yar sman nas 'chad do ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex10012024-07-31-15-14"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="">'brom</rs> na re thar pa'i cha 'thun zag bcas yin pas de'i rjes su 'brangs nas nges 'byed kyang zag bcas su bshad pa yang seng ge bzang po'i 'dod pa ma yin te skyon 'og du ston no ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex10012024-07-31-15-24"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="">mda'</rs> na re | yang seng bsang la <lb n="132a2"/>lugs gnyis pas | dang po ltar na chos mchog man chad du mkhyen pa gsuM bsgoMs nas sa dang po nas dbu ba'i bar du rnaM kun sgoM yangs bcu pa la rtse mo sgo de'i smad la mthar gyis pa lasogs pa sgo pa yin no ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex10012024-07-31-15-01"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="">'broM</rs> na sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa gsuM gyi ye+es dang rnal 'byor ba bdag nyid kyi shes pa tha mi dad par bloMs nas snoM pa yin pas de'i bsaM pa dang sbyar nas nges 'byed la zag med chung rung bshad do ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex10012024-07-31-15-54"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="">zangs kar</rs> na re pha rol du phyen pa drug dang | rjes su dran pa drug ni so so ba <lb n="153b7"/>dngos po med pa'i ngo bo ni bsdus pa'o zhes zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex10012024-01-2916-35-26"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (161a4–161a5)]"/>
         <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">shes rab gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan chos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> ces <lb n="161a5"/> bya ba'i 'grel pa</rs>'i tshig dang don gsal bar bshad pa</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:">shag kya'i dge slong shes rab brtson 'grus</rs> kyis <rs type="person" ana="">dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa rnams</rs> kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brangs nas sbyar ba'o |||||| dge bar gyur cig ||||||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="exX0032023-09-13-15" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (97a5)]"/>
        <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5509">rtog ge rigs pa'i brgyan gyi snying po</rs> zhes bya ba| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5510">shag kya'i dge' slong d+ha r+ma rad na</rs> zhes bya <lb n="97a6"/> bas sbyar ba || rdzogs s+hyo ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="exX0032023-09-13-152" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work">rtog ge rigs pa'i snying po</rs> 'di || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5866">kho bo zhang</rs> gis gzabs nas bris || bshes gnyen se'i thugs mdzod ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-0311-43-41" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><pb n="1b"/><lb n="1b1"/> || <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5292">tshad ma shes rab sgron ma</rs> zhes bya ba ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87032023-03-2810-35-31" status="reviewed"><lb n="5b1"/> gyi gzhan sel dang | gzhan bsal nas brjod pa sgra'i gzhan sel zhes bya ba yang gnas so zhes <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5590">bdag gi bla ma blo gros kyi spyan dang ldan pa dag</rs> gsung ngo ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex83032023-06-2912-18-04" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4265">kha cig</rs><note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4265">rtag pa</rs></note> <lb n="5b4"/><note type="editorial">We take "rtag pa" to be an alternative way of referring to "sTag/rTag"</note> na re snang pa'i don la nges shes 'dren mi nus pa yin no zhes zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-014-22-28" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:snang_la_ma_nges_pa"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3834"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3831">kha cig</rs></rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">phya</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3834">rgya</rs></note> sgro 'dogs dang mi 'gal ba'i snang pa yin no zhes zer ba</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87032023-03-1613-14-21" status="reviewed">
  <note type="editorial">The author of this view is identified as Phya pa (id:3831) by Glo bo mkhan chen. See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 32, n. 49.</note>
</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87032023-07-2417-03-49" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> na re mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni de ma yin las tha dad du 'byed pa'i rgyu mtshan nam mtshon bya rnam 'jog gi rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba yin no zhes zer ro ||<note type="editorial">This view is also mentioned in RTRG VIII 186,14 (mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid mtshon bya rnam 'jog gi rgyu mtshan yin na…). RTGKh 163,8, RTŚ19 Dza 70b1 (=586) and RTŚ10 Tha 128a5 (=255) identify it as rNgog Lo tsa ba chen po (ID: 3786)'s view.       </note> </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-0314-09-36" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><mentioned>gal te mtshon bya sgra blos khyad par du byas na byed chos kyi sgra blo 'phel bas des khyad par du byas pa'i mtshon bya 'ang du mar gyur pa'i phyir mtshan nyid cig gis mtshon bya du ma mtshon par 'gyur ro zhe na | </mentioned>
               sgra blo 'phel bas sgra blos zhen rung tsam 'phel bar 'gyur yang | mtshon bya du mar mi 'gyur te <abbr>thams cad</abbr> don ldog de la sgra blos zhen rung nyid las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro || des na zhen yul gyi don ldog cig las med <lb n="11a7"/> na de la sgra blo mi 'dra ba brgya phrag du mas zhen par byas kyang mtshon bya cig du 'gyur la | zhen yul gyi don ldog du ma yod na de <abbr>thams cad</abbr> la sgra blos gcig nyid kyis zhen par byas kyang mtshon bya du mar 'gyur ba yin te ngag lasogs pa don dgu la go zhes bya ba'i sgra blo cig gis zhen par byas kyang mtshon bya dgur 'gyur ba bzhin no || <note type="gloss">mtshan gzhi'i <choice><orig>{°}nyid</orig><reg>nyid</reg></choice> la <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3810">gangs pa</rs> na re dngos po gnas skabs dang skyon yon brtsi ba 2 yod <choice><reg>ces pa 'ang</reg><orig>(ces pa'ang)?</orig></choice> de mi 'thad de spyi'i mtshan nyid dri ba la bye brag gi dbye ba skabs su ma bab pa'i phyir ro ||</note> || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-0311-47-21" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">sngon gyi bdag nyid chen po dag</rs> sgrub dang dgag pa'i mtshan nyid rim pa bzhin dgag bya rnam par bcad nas shul du chos gzhan 'phen pa dang mi 'phen pa yin te | dper na bden pas stong pa dang <lb n="17b1"/> bden pas stong pa'i snang pa lta bu'am bum pa stong pa dang bum pa med pa'i sa phyogs lta bu'o zhes gsung go ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-0314-14-17" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3810">gangs pa</rs> na re</note> gal te tshad ma ni ¦ <quote source="PV 1.200ab">yod med nges pa'i 'bras can min || phyir na tshad ma nyid ma yin ¦</quote> <note type="editorial"> PV I.200ab sadasanniścayaphalāneti syād vā 'pramāṇatā. Also cited in <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 26b6. ma yin: PV <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> mi 'gyur </note> zhes 'byung pa'i tshul gyis yod pa dang med par nges pa'i 'bras bu can yin na 'dis ni de lta <lb n="23a3"/> bu'i nges pa mi skyed pas tshad ma ma yin no zhe na |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-0313-55-44" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4270">kha cig</rs><note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4270">rgya grags sod</rs></note> na re de ni bum snang gi shes pa chos can rkyen gsuM las gzhan pa'i rkyen gzhan bzhi pa cig la ltos pa yin te rkyen gsuM tshang yang res 'ga' bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'bras bu ldog pa'i rtags la rten pa'i rjes dpag gis sgrub po zhes zer ro || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87032023-03-1611-09-25" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">sngon gyi dgan po dag</rs> na re <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bcad pa'i yul can med de | don gyi skad cig re re blo'i skad cig re res rtogs pas don dang blo rnying pa phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-12-1214-24-38" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3839">kha cig</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">rtsang</rs><note type="editorial">Cf. <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 61b8-62a2 'di snyam du skad cig snga phyi'i rdzas de lta na yang de dag la ye shes kyis 'gro ba rtogs pa 'am sngon po nyid rtogs pa zhes bya ba yod dam myed | myed na spyi ma rtogs pa'i bye brag rtogs par 'gal la | yod na yang de nyid la ye shes phyi ma bcad pa'i shes pa ji ltar ma yin | gzhan yang rtog pa myed mod sngon ji ltar mkhyen pa'i chos rnams da ltar ma mkhyen na thams cad mkhyen par mi 'gyur la | sangs rgyas kyi chos bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba dang dran pa nyams pa mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don yang ci zhig yin | des na 'jig rten mkhyen pa ni thams cad du rdzas la tshad ma nyid la ldog pa la bcad pa'i yul can nyid kho na ste |  </note></note>  <lb n="28b6"/> na re rdzas la ltos nas bcad shes ma yin kyang rigs la ltos nas sngar rtogs zin la 'jug pa'i phyir bcad pa'i yul can ji ltar ma yin | gzhan yang rtog pa med mod sngon ji ltar mkhyen pa'i chos rnams da ltar ma mkhyen na <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa ma yin par 'gyur la | sangs rgyas kyi chos bsnyel pa mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don yang ci zhig yin | des na <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa ni <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du rdzas la tshad ma dang rigs la bcad pa'i yul can yin no zhes zer ro || <lb n="28b7"/></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-08-0414-24-38" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusm:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5600">kha cig</rs><note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusm:named_reference" ref="db:5600">byang</rs></note> na re rdzas la ltos nas kyang bcad pa'i yul can du 'gyur te | rdzas sngar ma rtogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro ||
         </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-0314-24-38" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><mentioned>yang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis dus gsum ma mkhyen pa mi 'thad la | mkhyen na yang 'das ma 'ongs gnyis snang nas mkhyen nam mi snang par mkhyen | </mentioned> snga ma ltar mi 'thad de 'gags pa dang ma skyes pa snang par mi rung pa'i phyir ro || phyi ma ltar yang mi 'thad de sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum spyan du mi rung pa'i phyir ro zhe na | <lb n="28b8"/>'di la <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3831">kha cig</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">phya</rs></note> 'das ma 'ongs gnyis ye shes da ltar ba la mi snang yang da ltar ba'i dngos po snang pa'i shugs la de'i rgyu' dpal dang 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa yin no zhes zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-0314-26-50" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3839">kha cig</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">rtsang</rs><note type="editorial"/>Glo bo mkhan chen also ascribes this position to "slob dpon gTsang nag pa." See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 131, n. 219</note> 'das ma 'ongs kyi rnam pa snang pa'i stobs kyis de dag gi rang mtshan ma byung pa dang mi 'byung pa'i sgro 'dogs chod pa yin no zhes gsung mod kyi rnam pa de ci rang mtshan gyi rnam pa 'am | sgra don nam med pa'i don gsal bar snang pa yin zhes brtags na 'thad pa ma yin no || 'on kyang dus gsum mkhyen pa <lb n="28b9"/> lasogs pa'i ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni gdul bya gzhan gyi blo ngor snang pa tsam du zad kyi sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyud kyis bsdus pa yod pa ma yin pas dpyad par bya ba ma yin no ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87032023-03-1610-18-48" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">kha cig</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo</rs></note> na re <quote source="db:4445" n="216,4-7"><!--TODO ref to the typeset edition-->rtags kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid tshul gsum dang mtshon bya gtan tshigs kyi 'brel pa nges par byed pa la</quote> zer ba yin gyi<!--The first part of the citation, up to "zer" corresponds to <mentioned>rNam bshad</mentioned> 216,4-7 de la gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid tshul gsum dang | de'i mtshon bya'i 'brel pa nges par byed pa ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid la |.--> <note type="gloss"><choice><orig>° gnyegs </orig><reg><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4267">gnyags ye shes 'bar</rs> </reg> </choice> ltar<!-- identification upon assumption that "gnyegs" stands for "gnyags ye shes 'bar" (id:4267)--></note> tshul dang po'i mtshan mtshon gyi 'brel pa gtan la 'bebs pa ni ma yin te rtags kyi sgra tshul dang po <lb n="31a1"/> kho na la nye ba'i rgyu <choice><orig>‹mtshan›</orig><reg>mtshan</reg></choice> med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro || 
         <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3809">khyung </rs>na re</note>'di ni mi rigs te | de ltar na khyab pa'i mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa yang gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs par 'gyur la 'dod na rtags kyi mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa'i skabs su rjes su dpag bya'i sgra rtsod gzhi' kho na la 'jug par ji ltar 'gyur te de'i tshe chos la'ang 'jug pa'i phyir ro || des na 'dir gtan tshigs ni tshul dang po la bya ste tshul dang po'i mtshan nyid <lb n="31a2"/> dang mtshon bya'i 'brel pa gtan la 'bebs pa la gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa'i skabs zhes brjod par bya'o ||</seg>

su rya A similar objection is cited in the Tshad ma rigs gter. Glo bo mkhan chen identifies the opponent as "paṇḍita Surya thong po." See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 151, n. 269. rtsod gzhi' chos can la rjes su dpag bya'i ming gis btags nas bstan pas mi phan te | 'di ltar rjes su dpag bya'i ming de rtsod gzhi' chos can kho na la 'jug na rtags rjes su dpag bya la yod pa tshul dang po zhes brjod pas mthun pa dpe'i chos can dang mi mthun dpe'i chos can gnyis la rtags yod pa la mi go bar 'gyur ba zhig na | rjes su dpag bya ni rtsod gzhi' dang bsgrub bya'i chos dang tshogs don gsuM ka la 'jug pas chos rjes su dpag bya la rtags yod pa dang tshogs don rjes su dpag bya la rtags yod pa yang tshul dang po yin nam snyam pa'i log rtogs skye zhing | de skyes na ma 'khrul pa'i mig gi gzung byas sgra mi rtag par sgrub pa lta bu'i rjes 'gro can la yang rtags chos rjes su dpag bya la yod pa'i tshul dang po dang rjes su 'gro ldog gnyi' ka tshang pas yang dag pa'i rtan tshigs yin nam snyam pa'i log rtogs snga ma ci lta ba bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro zhe na ||

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87032023-03-1612-55-52" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">bdag nyid chen po kha cig</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo</rs></note> btags pas mi phan pa'i rtsod pa spang pa dang | gdags mi dgos pa'i rtsod pa spang pa dang | de'i lan mtshungs pa'i rtsod pa spang pa gsuM gyis lan 'debs par mdzad de | </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87032023-03-1612-55-525" status="unreviewed"><lb n="33a2"/> phyogs tsam gyi rigs kyi spyi la yod par bstan pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur bas mtshungs so zhe na | 
            mi mtshungs ste <rs type="person" ana="">kho bo cag</rs> ni tshul dang po'i tshig gis mthun dpe' kho na la yod par rnon par go dgos yod ces zer ba yin la de dang rjes 'gro' tshig gis mthun phyogs tsam gyi rigs kyi spyi la yod par bstan pa la 'gal ba ci zhig yod de | blo rno ba spyir mi tsam la yod cing bye brag lha sbyin kho na la yod pa mi 'gal ba bzhin no zhes zer ro || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87032023-03-1613-00-02" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">kha cig</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo</rs></note> the tsom dang ldan pa yin no zhes zer ba <!--Cf. rNam bshad 217 des na the tshom dang ldan pa'i don ni chos can yin no //--> yang ma yin te | the tsom dngos dang ldan pas ma khyab cing 'jug rung tsam ni de ltar grub zin pa la yang yod pas ha cang khyab ches pa'i phyir ro || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87032023-03-1613-03-19" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">gzhan dag</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo</rs></note>  mthun yul phyogs mtshan nyid pa'i rnam pa tsam la byas nas de dang bsgrub bya'i chos yod du mthun mi mthun la brjod pa'ang mi rigs te | rigs pas mi 'thad pa dang | gzhung gi dgongs pa <lb n="34b8"/> ma yin pa'i phyir ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87032023-03-1613-05-07" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">kha cig</rs> na re <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo</rs></note> du <lb n="36a3"/> bas la la{} me sgrub pa'i tshe gtan tshigs du ba ni mi mthun phyogs yin te me steng du mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zer ro || <!--Also cited in <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 89b6 kha cig me bsgrub pa'i rtags du ba ni mi mthun phyogs yin te me steng du mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro |-->
         de ni mi rigs te |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-0313-59-01" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4264">kha cig</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4264">gnyags <abbr>ye shes</abbr> 'bar</rs></note> bsgrub bya'i chos me nyid kyang mi mthun phyogs yin te me gzhan gnyis pa zhig steng du mi ldan pa'i phyir ro || 'on kyang de la rtags zhugs pas ldog pa ma grub par mi 'gyur te | <lb n="36a6"/> me ma yin gyi gzhi' la du ba yod pa'i phyir zhes rtags khyad par can bkod pas de la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-0311-48-37" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">che ba'i che ba dag</rs> rtags kyi tha snyad gnas pa'i rten du mtshan nyid tshul gsuM blos nges par byas pa mi dgos ste | <hi rendition="#petittitrechapitre">rnam gcod med pa dang | don gyi chos su mi 'thad pa dang | ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro</hi> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-0311-50-04" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><!--presumably Tibetan opponent-->
            yang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">blo gros rnam par dkar ba dag</rs> na re rtags kyi mtshan nyid du tshul gsuM blos nges par byas pa zhig dgos pa yin te | <hi rendition="#petittitrechapitre">nges rung la ni bsgrub bya'i mtshan nyid dang mtshungs pa dang | tshul gsuM dngos po la ma grub pa dang ma mtshungs pa dang | ha cang thal ba</hi>'i skyon gsum yod pa'i phyir ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-0314-17-13" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><lb n="45a9"/> la yod pa'i khyad par rtags kyi mtshan gzhi' 'dod pa ni med mod kyi <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3834">kha cig <!--This view in presented in RT X 291,2, and attributed to "sTod lung rgya dmar ba la sogs pa dag" in RTGKh 223,17.--></rs> la'i du ba lasogs pa rtsod gzhis khyad par du byas pa rtags kyi mtshan gzhir 'dod do ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-0314-18-48" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3834">kha cig</rs><note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3834">rgya</rs></note> na re nam mkhar snang tsam chos can rtag ste ma byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu ste | rtags de chos can <lb n="51b5"/> du bkod tshod kyi nam mkhar snang tsam dang mi 'gal bas phyogs chos grub cing bsgrub bya rtag pa'i dngos po rten pa'i gzhi' dngos por gyur pa'i nam mkhar don gyis 'phangs pa de 'gog pas chos can 'gog pa'i 'gal ba yin no zhes smra'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87032023-03-1610-25-32"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">kha cig</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">rngog</rs></note> na re rgyu 'bras nges par byed pa'i tshad ma ni <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du ma dmigs pa dang dmigs pa'i mngon suM lnga kho nas yin te | 'di ltar dang <lb n="52b3"/> po rgyu 'bras gnyis ka ma dmigs pa dang | de nas rgyu dmigs pa dang | de nas 'bras bu dmigs pa dang | de nas rgyu log pas rgyu ma dmigs pa dang | de nas 'bras bu log pas 'bras bu ma dmigs pa'i mngon sum mo zhes zer ro || <!--This view is already mentioned in <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 142a8-142b1 (kha cig gzhung las gsungs pa'i mi dmigs pa dang dmyigs pa'i mngon sum lngas de'i mtshan nyid rjes 'gro dang ldog pa nges pa yin no zhes zer ro ||). It is also the view supported in <mentioned>rNam bshad</mentioned> 333,3-4 (mngon sum dang myi dmyigs pa rnam pa lngas rgyu 'bras kyi mtshan nyid nges pas de kho na tshad ma yin no ||).-->
                de ni mi 'thad de | <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3809">khyung</rs></note> gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'gro ldog mthong pa'i tshad ma lngas nges pa yin nam 'on te rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ldog mthong pa'i tshad ma lngas nges pa yin | dang po ltar na rnga'i sgra dang nyi ma'i 'od zer yang rgyu <lb n="52b4"/> 'bras su thal te gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'gro ldog lan brgyar mthong pa'i phyir ro || gnyis pa ltar na tshad ma lnga yis ci zhig bya ste rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ldog mthong pa'i tshad ma gsuM gyis rjes 'gro dngos su nges pas ldog pa shugs la 'phen pa'i phyir ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87032023-03-1613-09-57" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">kha cig</rs> na re lhan cig mi gnas pa <lb n="55a2"/> 'i 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid ni dngos po gnyis la gnas pa'i chos gnod bya gnod byed ces pa'am | rdzas kyi rgyun gcad bya dang gcod byed ces bya ba yin no zhes zer ro ||<!--The first part of this definition is also cited in RTRG VII 168,21. It is attributed to Lo <hi rendition="#sanskritpasitalique">tså </hi>ba chen po in RTGKh 153,10. Cf. <mentioned>rNam bshad</mentioned> 277,7-8 de la 'di'i mtshan nyid ni dngos po gnyis la brten pa'i chos gnod bya gnod byed kyi rang bzhin no ||.-->
            de ni ma yin te </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87032023-03-1610-30-05" status="unreviewed"><note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3809"><abbr>kha cig</abbr> </rs>na re <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3809">khyung</rs></note> thal ba [la sgrub byed] 'phen pa'i thal ba dang sun 'byin pa'i thal ba gnyis su yod pas | de gnyis la khyab pa'i mtshon bya thun mong ba cig med pas mtshan nyid kyang thun mong pa <abbr>med</abbr> ces pa rigs pa ma yin te | de ltar na spyi'i mtshan nyid thams cad mi rung par 'gyuro ||</note> </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87032023-03-1611-01-15"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4953">kha cig</rs> na re rtags <lb n="62b8"/> kyi ngo bo rgol ba'i zhe bas mi 'dod cing tshul gsuM gzhan gyis ci rigs par khas blangs pas dam bca' mi 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i ngag yin no zhes zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-0311-47-58" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">sngon gyi blo gros{} chen po dag</rs> thal ba'i chos gsuM dang bzlog pa'i chos gsuM <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du gnad cig par 'chad de | 'di ltar thal ba'i gtan tshigs khas blangs dang bzlog pa'i bsgrub bya shes 'dod gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang pa dang tshang par gnad gcig<hi rendition="#FootnoteCharacters"><anchor xml:id="a457"/></hi> ste | pha rol po la la me med par khas len na gnyi' ka tshang la | mi len na gnyis ka ma tshang pa'i phyir ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-0311-50-52" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><!--presumably ref. to Tibetan-->
            yang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">shing rta chen po'i srol dag</rs> ni 'dod tog gyis lan 'debs par byed te | thal ba de dag gi 'dod pa la tshad mas bsal pa yod pas bzlog pa'i thal ba'i gtan tshigs grub par thal ba ni 'dod pa yin te | <lb n="64b1"/> mi rtag pa dang tshogs pa khegs pa nyid mi rtag pas stong pa'i phyogs chos yin pa'i phyir ro || de bzhin du dgag bya yod pa dang tshogs pa khegs pa nyid yod pas stong pa'i bsgrub bya yin pas gzhi' sha za'i bum pa rtag pas stong pas stong zhes pa'i dgag pa'i rtags 'phen pa yin no zhes gsung ngo ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-03-0311-55-26" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="67a6"/>@@|| yid kyi mun pa ma lus sel byed pa || rigs tshul dri med <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5292">shes rab sgron ma</rs> 'di ||                       <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3773">dpal ldan grags pa</rs>'i gzhung dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5590">bla ma</rs>'i<anchor xml:id="a469"/> || gsung la brten nas gzhan phan yid kyis sbyar || 'di las byung pa'i dge tshogs mthu' ldan des || skye bo <abbr>thams cad</abbr> rigs lam 'dir zhugs te || lta ngan g.yang sa'i ri bo rab bsnyil nas || yang dag lta ba'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin par shog || ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex87032023-07-0312-01-05" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="67a8"/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5292">tshad ma shes rab sgron ma</rs> zhes bya ba | lung dang rigs pa'i don phyin ci ma log par khong du chud cing | rdzogs s+h+yo || cig zhus ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex81022023-09-28-121342" status="unreviewed"><pb n="1b"/><lb n="1b1"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5271">'grel bshad kun las btus pa'i snying po nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba</rs> zhes bya ba ||</seg>
source: 3_081_02_rin chen tshul khrims_grel bshad kun btus snying po nyi ma od zer.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex81022023-09-28-159" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5271">'grel bshad kun las btus pa'i snying po nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba</rs> zhes bya ba 'di, <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5954">shAkya'i btsun pa gzhung brgya smra ba rin chen tshul <lb n="100a3"/>khrims</rs> kyis ¦ <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6173">mkhas grub du ma'i 'byung gnas ne'u thog gi chos sgra<!--sic--> chen po</rs>r sbyar ba'o ||</seg>
source: 3_081_02_rin chen tshul khrims_grel bshad kun btus snying po nyi ma od zer.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex2012023-07-10082928" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4449"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3692">bcom ldan 'das yum brgyad stong pa</rs>'i don bsdus pa</rs> <lb n="22a2"/> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="3712">slob dpon seng ge bzang po</rs>'i rjes su 'brangs te | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba chen po dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir sbyar ba las | dus phyis <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="5611">jo bo 'bum pa <!--brTan skyong, Sthirapāla--></rs> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba</rs> de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang zhing <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3807">mang du thos pa'i dge slong shes rab 'bar</rs> gyis mdo'i don legs par gtan la phab nas yang zhus te sbyar ba |||| rdzogs s+ho ||||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex2012023-07-1008-32-58" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="22a3"/> yul <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5645"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5546">chos skor bsaM yas</rs> kyi lung phran mchims phu'i gtsug lag khang</rs> du mang du thos pa'i <note type="gloss">khu lha sdings pa la</note> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5827">dge slong ¦ bshes gnyen lha sdings pa</rs>'i gsung gi bdud rtsi <note type="gloss">(lhung pos)?</note> la ngoms ngoms su 'thungs pa <rs type="deity">bde bar gshegs pa</rs>'i bka' rab 'byaMs pa <note type="gloss">rtsod pa myed pa rnaMs la</note> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5828">blo gros kyi snang pa rab tu rgyas pa khyung po 'dul ba 'dzin pa</rs>'i spyan sngar <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bdag</rs> mchod nas <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4451"><note type="gloss">lho brag rong pa</note> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4451"/>bla ma 'od</rs> kyis yig mkhan byas nas bris so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex2012023-07-1008-34-15" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="22a4"/> @|| 'di bris pa'i bsod naMs kyis || yon mchod byang chub thob par shog || bkra shis par gyur cig ||||
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5827">mdo smad pa mar pa ston pa</rs>s bris so | legs so |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex64082023-09-261" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[22b1]"/>… <rs type="work">mtha' bral dbu ma'i rnam bzhag gsal byed sgron me</rs> 'dis| chos smra ba'i gshes gnyen shes ldan gzu bor gnas pa'i don gnyer ba bstan 'dzin zhes pas nan gyi[s] bskul ba la brten nas| sde snod gsum dang <lb n="[22b2]"/> rgyud sde <abbr>bzhi</abbr> [la]| dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa la blo'i snang ba cung zad thob pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4674">rat+na kir+ti [dkon mchogs grag pa] </rs> zhes bya bas| rang lo brgyad bcu lon pa <hi rendition="#Time">me mo lugs</hi> gi lo <hi rendition="#Time">smin drug zla ba'i dkar phyogs </hi><?oxy_comment_start comment="Kārttika śukla pakṣa"?><?oxy_comment_end?> la <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5699">dpal glang ri thang gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du sbyar ba rdzogs so|| shu b+haM||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex9105_202409182" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="113b4"/>
              <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6853">ka ma'i dgon pa</rs>r sku bzhugs nas || bla ma rnams kyis gnang ba yi || man ngag thugs la skyes pa 'di || kun gyi brdzi <abbr>med</abbr> g.nya na'i mtshan || thugs rje'i mnga' bdag<lb n="113b5"/>b+ho de'i mtshan || bdag ci bla ma 'gro ba'i 'gon || sa stengs grags pa nyid la bshad || de'i nyams myong gdams ngag 'di || brjed dogs <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4105">bdag</rs> gis bris pa la || lhag <lb n="113b6"/>°°° mdzod || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4105">bdag</rs> gis 'di mnyan bris pa'i || bsod naMs grub pa yin des || kun gyis bzang po thob par shog ||
            <lb n="113b7"/> °° gyi °i° pa || <note type="gloss"><!--in dbu can--> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5883">mkhan po snar thang pa</rs>'i phyag dpe °(ngas?) zhus cing dag go ||</note> rdzogs s+ho ||
            </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex29042023-10-111" status="unreviewed"><lb n="1a1"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4676"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3706">bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> gyi lus mdzes par byed pa| legs bshed rin po che'i tshoms </rs>bzhugs lags so|| e ma ho|| <lb n="1a2"/> theg pa chen po'i sa dang lam gyi rim pa shin tu gsal zhing × mgo bde bar bshed pa lags s+ho|| maNGgalaM|</seg>
source: 1_029_04 bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi lus mdzes par byed pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex29042023-09-112"><lb n="47b7"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4676"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3706">bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> gyi lus mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan legs par bshad pa rin po che'i tshoms </rs>bsgrigs pa <lb
