n="48a1"/> 'di ni| lung gi sbyor ba mang po dang | 'dod lugs sna tshogs dang | dgag sgrub kyi rtsod lan mang po bris na sde snod la ma sbyangs pa'i gang zag gi ngo bar <lb n="48a2"/> dka' bas| theg pa chen po'i sa lam gyi rim pa shin tu gsal zhing rtogs sla ba| tshig gis ma sgrib pa| gsar bu thos pa chung bas bltas kyang blo la 'char bde ba cig <lb n="48a3"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3706">mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rtsa ba</rs> dang sbyar nas gzhung gi go ba longs pa la'ang phan par 'gyur zhing | 'jug pa bde bar bris shig zhes| bsnyen bkur| me tog bzang po dang bcas <lb n="48a4"/> te| dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'tsho ba'i rig byed la mkhas pa'i go 'phang thob pa| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:"><!--who is kun dga' rgyal mtshan-->kun dga' rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis snga mo nas yang yang bskul ba las| btang snyoms la re shig <lb n="48a5"/> 'gyangs par gyur na'ang | <hi rendition="#Time">shing pho rta'i lo</hi>  ljon shing dang  sa gzhi rnaMs lo 'dab dang | <hi rendition="#Time">rtswa ljang gi myu gu skyed pa'i dus</hi> su  <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5781">bsod snyoms pa rin chen rgyal mtshan dpal <lb n="48a6"/> bzang po</rs>s yi ger bkod pa 'dis kyang  thub pa'i bstan pa dang | sems can la phan bde 'byung par gyur cig| <rs type="work">mngon rtogs rgyan gyi rtsa ba</rs> <abbr>thaMs cad</abbr> la sbyar ba'i bshad pa byas na'ang <lb n="48a7"/> ha cang rgyas pas go dka' ba'i char gyur dgos nas  lus rnam bzhag dang sbyar ba yin cing| 'di tsam zhig legs par go na  <rs type="work">'grel pa TI ka</rs> dang bcas pa bltas pas <lb n="48b1"/> shes par 'gyur ba lags so || || × maNG ga laM sid d+hi × shu b+haM|| × dge'o||||</seg>
source: 1_029_04 bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi lus mdzes par byed pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19082023-03-0908-24-527" status="unreviewed"><lb n="3a4"/><abbr>'bras bu</abbr> bshad yin ¦ nas ni ces pa mtshams sbyor gyi tshig ste bya ba gzhan 'dren par byed pa yin la / de yang phyag gi yul klu sgrub de yis mdzad pa'i dbu ma rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel pa bya ces sbyor ro || ci 'dra cig byed ce na ¦ khyad par bzhi ldan ste ¦ tshig mtshams 'byor zhing don gsal bas slu ba dang ¦ sdeb sbyor gyi gtsug lag dang mthun zhing khyad par<lb n="3a5"/> gyi gzhi ngag don khags pa dang ¦ dbu ma'i don ¦ chos rnaMs la bden par rtog pa'i rlung gis ma dkrugs pa dang / tshig gi <abbr>'bras bu</abbr> gnyer ba dang don gyi mtshams sbyor lasogs bshad dgos pa mi 'chad pa ma yin te legs par 'chad pa dang ¦ gzhung mthong pa tsam gyis don go bas bshad mi dgos pa mi 'chad pa dang ¦ rtsa ba mkhan po'i dgongs pa mi 'chad pa ma <lb n="3a6"/> yin te legs par 'chad pa dang ¦ de las gzhan skabs su ma bab pa 'chad pa ma yin te skabs su bab pa nyid 'chad pa dang / brjod bya'i gtso bo la mi sbyor ba ma yin skabs kyi brjod bya ngos bzung nas ston pas ¦ rab tu gsal ba cig bya'o ces pa ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> gi'o ||</seg>
source: 1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19082023-03-0908-24-528" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> 'them sbyor sngar bzhin la khyad par gyi chos ni ¦ ci 'dra cig byed ce na gsal ba<lb n="3a7"/>cig bya'o ces sbyar ste de yang tshig gsal ba slu zhing bsdeb legs ngag gis sbyar ba don gsal ba rtog ges rlang gis ma dkrugs pa'o ces pa ni legs bshad do ||</seg>
source: 1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19082023-03-0908-48-24" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">'ga' zhig</rs> na re bstan bcos la mdzad pa po'i khyad par lasogs yon tan mang po yod pa'i phyir dgos 'brel bzhir grangs nges pa med do zhe na |</seg>
source: 1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19082023-03-0908-37-39" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> gi'o ||</seg>
source: 1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex19082023-03-0909-02-13" status="unreviewed"><lb n="25b3"/>bstan bcos su brjod pa yin no snyam na ¦</seg>
source: 1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1908202302281313" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4610"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3724"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3715">dbu ma rtsa ba</rs>'i 'grel pa tshig gsal ba</rs>'i bshad pa nges don rnaM par gzigs pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di la tshig gi <abbr>'bras bu</abbr> bshad pa dang ¦ gzhung ngag don du 'chad pa dang ¦ khyad par gyi <lb n="32b4"/> gzhi bsdus te 'them sbyor du bshad pa dang ¦ ngag don gyis mtshams sbyar te gzhung rtags sbyor gyi khongs su bsdus te bshad pa dang | <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3715">rtsa ba mdo</rs> dang <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5826">dgongs 'grel gyi bstan bcos</rs> dang | <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5530">de 'chad byed kyi Ti ka</rs> rnams dgongs pa cig tu ston pas thub pa'i bstan pa'i yan lag tu 'brel par 'chad pas | 'chad pa po gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa 'di ni thub pa'i chos kyi 'khor <lb n="32b5"/> lo rim gsuM bskor nas lnga brgya phrag bdun pas lhag pa na | <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4326">ma ga da rdo rje'i gdan pa</rs>s byang phyogs su dpag tshad brgya bsgrod pa'i gnas su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang phyogs su dar par 'gyur ro  zhes lung bstan pa ltar grub pa na lung dang rigs pa'i de kho na nyid khong du chud nas smra ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4608">shag kya'i dge slong shes rab 'buM</rs> gyis <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5572">brag raM gyi gtsug lag khang</rs> du sbyar <lb n="32b6"/> ba'o || </seg>
source: 1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex37012023-10-11-115312" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[1a3]"/>|| <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4728">'dul ba mdo'i rnams bshad mdo'i nyi ma'i rgyan </rs>zhes bya ba 'zhugs|
         <milestone unit="section" n="[Incipit (1b1) (p. 12:1) "/>
         <lb n="[1b1]"/>  || || <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4728">'dul ba mdo'i rnam bshad mdo'i nyi ma'i rgyan</rs> zhes bya ba| <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo|| </seg>
source: 2_037_01 Blo gros rgyal mtshan_'dul ba mdo'i rnam bshad nyi ma'i rgyan.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex37012023-09-11-145230"><lb n="225a2"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4728">'dul ba mdo'i rnam bshad mdo'i nyi ma'i rgyan </rs>zhes <lb n="225a3"/> bya ba di ni | 'dul ba 'dzin pa stan 1 pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4311">nam_mkha' rin chen</rs> dang | lung riGS smra ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:"> <!--grub pa seng ge ???-->grub pa seng ge</rs> | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:"><!--dpal ldan seng ge ???-->dka' bcu 'dzin pa dpal_ldan seng ge</rs>| 
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:"><!--byang chub dpal ???-->'dul ba 'dzin pa byang chub dpal</rs>_la <abbr>sogs pa</abbr> don du gnyer <abbr>ba'i</abbr> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">slob ma rnams</rs> kyi bskul <abbr>ba'i</abbr> ngor: mkhyen rabs <lb n="225a4"/> dang <abbr>thugs rje</abbr>'i mnga' bdag lhar bcas 'gro ba kun gyi gtsug_gi <abbr>nor bu</abbr> <abbr>mkhan chen</abbr> <abbr>rin po che'i</abbr> <abbr>byin gyis</abbr> brlabs shing 'dul ba 'buM sde'i mnga' bdag 'dul ba 'dzin pa<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4003"> dmar ston dpal_ldan rin chen <?oxy_comment_start comment="P10033?"?><?oxy_comment_end?></rs> dang:  <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4004">'dul ba 'dzin pa nam_mkha' rgyal mtshan<?oxy_comment_start comment="P71?"?><?oxy_comment_end?>gyi</rs> sku drin la [b]rten_nas: <rs type="work">'dul <lb n="225a5"/> ba mdo rtsa ba</rs>'i tshig don la <abbr>blo gros kyi</abbr> snang ba <abbr>cung zad</abbr> 'chod pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4002"><abbr>dge slong blo gros rgyal mtshan</abbr></rs> gyis| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">dpal_ldan bla ma</rs>s <abbr>byin gyis</abbr> brlabs <abbr>pa'i</abbr> gdan sa: <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5748">yol rin chen <abbr>gling gi</abbr> gtsug lag khang<anchor xml:id="a1"/> </rs>du <hi rendition="#Time">lnga brgya phrag brgyad pa'i drug bcu re 3 pa: sa mo bya: zhi ba<anchor xml:id="a2"/>'i lo <lb n="225a6"/> dbyar zla ra ba<anchor xml:id="a3"/>'i yar ngo'i tshes 3<anchor xml:id="a4"/> </hi>la zin bris_su bkod pa'o| <abbr>mkhan chen rin po che nas</abbr> 'dis pha mas gtso byas <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>sems can</abbr> <abbr>thams cad</abbr> kyis <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen <abbr>pa'i</abbr> go 'phang myur du thob par gyur cig| yi_ge pa ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4729">shAkya'i dge slong blo gros seng ge</rs>'o | |phyoGS dus gnas <lb n="225a7"/> skabs <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du bkrashis par gyu[r] cig| × <!--lantsa characters--> dge'o||</seg>
source: 2_037_01 Blo gros rgyal mtshan_'dul ba mdo'i rnam bshad nyi ma'i rgyan.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex105022023-10-06-102131" status="unreviewed"><pb n="1a"/> <lb n="1a1"/>" || <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5409">byang chub laM gyi sgron ma</rs> las dkon mchog 3 la skyab du 'gro ba'i sgo nas de'i bslab bya bzhugs||</seg>
source: 4_105_02_I_R_M_bang chub lam gyi sgron ma las dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex105022023-10-06-102531" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><pb n="[29a2-29a5]"/>bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'jug pa'i sgo [29a3] thog ma ; gang dang ldan pas nang pa sangs rgyas par ‘jog pa’i khyad chos bla na med ; ci bsam pa’i don rnams myur du ‘grub par byed pa’i thabs kyi <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5409"> mchog dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song nas de'i bslabs bya la rnams la</rs> [29a4] <rs type="work">slob pa'i tshul</rs> phyin ci ma log par dam pa rnams kyi gsung la brten ste legs par bshad pa 'di ni mang du thos pa'i dge slong song ba pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4113">dkon mchog gsum gyi 'bang</rs> zhes bya bas : <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5722">dpal byams chen</rs> gyi gnas su legs <lb n="29a5"/> par sbyar ro|| ||
            'dis bstan pa dang sems can la phan pa rgya che po 'byung bar gyur cig| ||dge'o||</seg>
source: 4_105_02_I_R_M_bang chub lam gyi sgron ma las dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex58032024-01-3014-06-11" ana="corpusmd:colophon" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5042">slob dpon chen po zhi ba lha'i lugs kyi smon 'jug gi sems bskyed kyi cho ga</rs> 'di || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6311">yang dag pa'i yongs kyi dge ba'i <abbr>bshes gnyen</abbr> 'jam dpal <abbr>rdo rje</abbr> snying po</rs>'i bkas bskul nas | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4066">thogs med</rs> kyis sbyar ba 'dis | 'gro ba mang po la phan <abbr>thogs</abbr> shing <lb n="13b6b1"/> 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skems par gyur cig | shub+haM ||</seg>
source: 2_058_03_I_R_M_thogs med_smon 'jug sems bskyed kyi cho ga_Checked Pascale.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex58032023-09-13-103956" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5042">smon 'jug seMs bskyed kyi rgyud pa'i bla ma rnams la bstod pa</rs> 'di | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6312">lung rigs 'dzin pa se ston</rs> gyis bskul ba'i don du || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4066">chos smra ba'i btsun pa thogs med</rs> kyis <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5692">chos rdzong</rs> du <lb n="15a2"/> bkod pa'i yi ge pa ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5043">'jam dbyangs dkar po</rs>'o || shub+haM ||</seg>
source: 2_058_03_I_R_M_thogs med_smon 'jug sems bskyed kyi cho ga_Checked Pascale.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex58032023-09-13-103957" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5042">dbu ba lugs su grags pa'i sems bskyed brgyud pa la phyag 'tshal ba</rs> 'di yang || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4066">btsun pa thogs med</rs> kyis bkod pa'o ||</seg>
source: 2_058_03_I_R_M_thogs med_smon 'jug sems bskyed kyi cho ga_Checked Pascale.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1972023-09-06_1041" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3720">slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub</rs> kyis<lb n="58a5"/> mdzad pa'i <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4607"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3715">dbu ma rtsa ba</rs>'i bshad pa 'thad pa rnam par nges pa</rs> zhes bya ba ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4608">lung dang rigs par smra ba'i dge slong shes rab 'buM</rs> gyis rnam grangs kyi bshad pa rnaMs re shig bzhag ste |<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3725">slob dpon zla ba</rs>'i gzhung bzhin du ||<rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5572">dpal brag ram gyi gtsug lag khang</rs> du sbyar ba 'di re shig rdzogs s+ho || ||</seg>
source: 1_019_07_Shes rab 'bum_dbu ma rtsa ba'i bshad pa 'thad pa rnam par nges pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex75012023-09-28-091757" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5197">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa don gsal gyi rnam par bshad pa mi pham dgongs pa'i rgyan</rs> zhes bya ba 'di| bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab kyi dgongs pa'i don rnam par 'byed pa la rnam dpyod kyi skal ba gzhan las mi dman par gyur pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5198">shAkya'i dge slong blo gros rgya mtsho</rs> zhes bya bas mkhas grub du ma'i 'byung gnas <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6173">dpal ldan gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du sbyar ba rdzogs so||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex115-2023-06-271-14" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ref="db:4528" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">blo sbyong don bdun ma'i rtsa ba</rs> ni |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex115-2023-06-2712-54" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3874">rnal 'byor dbang phyug 'chad kha ba</rs>s gsungs so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1152023-06-271-25" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5635">smon lam thams cad kyi don bsdus pa</rs> 'di |<rs type="person" ref="db:5636" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">shar tsong kha pa</rs>s mdzad pa'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex11052023-09-15-111356" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5638">chu shul</rs> gyi || gnas pa <rs type="person" ref="db:3831" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">dpal 'phel</rs> zhes <lb n="1b7"/> bya bas || dad pa'i sems kyis kun blangs te || spar du brkos nas phul pa yi || dge bas 'gro ba ma lus pa || byang chub sems gnyis stobs rgyas nas || kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i sku thob ste || 'gro kun srid mtsho las sgrol shog ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex23022023-10-111" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[1a2]"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5847"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3693">mdo bsdud pa</rs>'i ti ka</rs> bzhugs</seg>
source: 1_023_02_ rgyal ba’i yuM sdud pa’i don gsal ba’i ti ka.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex23022023-09-112"><lb n="28b11"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5847">dus gsuM rgyal yuM yon tan rin chen sdud pa</rs> la|| 'grel dang bshad pa myi mthun grags mang yang || snyan brgyud ma chad gdaMs pa kaM [=skam?] gyi lugs || <rs type="work">rtsa ba nges pa'i bshad pa</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5849">bdag</rs> gis bkod || dge bas 'gro ba rgyal yuM mngon gyur shog|| || <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5847">rgyal ba'i yuM sdud pa'i don gsal ba'i ti ka</rs> zhes bya ba| chos 'di la <lb n="[28b12]"/> nan tan du byas pa'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5849">dmyal sde jo sras</rs> kyis | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:"><!--TODO Id in APIS of rag rga-->rab rga</rs> slob ma'i don du nye bar sbyar ba | de'i rjes su 'jug pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5779">chab ** <!--chab shul gyi rgyal--> gyi rgyal ×</rs> kyis bris pa|| <rs type="person" ana="">rgyal po 3?**</rs>bkyis byis? | *pa yin non  rdzogs s+h+yo||||||</seg>
source: 1_023_02_ rgyal ba’i yuM sdud pa’i don gsal ba’i ti ka.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex9042024-09-1712-48-21" status="unreviewed"><milestone unit="section" n="212.3 bsgyur (2a4–2a5)"/>
         bsgyur ba ni shan sbyar ba las ‹'›thob ste | <foreign xml:lang="sa-Latn-x-wylie">a rya</foreign> na 'phags pa'o || <foreign xml:lang="sa-Latn-x-wylie">(s)a rba</foreign> na <abbr>thams cad</abbr> do || <foreign xml:lang="sa-Latn-x-wylie">shra ma Ne ra</foreign> na dge tshul <lb n="2a5"/> lo || <foreign xml:lang="sa-Latn-x-wylie">ka ri ka</foreign> na tshig le'ur byas pa'o ||<anchor xml:id="a2"/></seg>
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex9042023-09-09-100" status="unreviewed"/>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex9042023-09-09-948" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (33b5–33b6)]"/>
         <abbr>thams cad yod par smra ba'i dge tshul rnaMs kyi <lb n="33b6"/> bslab pa'i rim pa ston pa'i rnaM par bshad pa</abbr> || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3818">shag kya'i dge slong brtson 'grus 'bar</rs> gyi zhabs kyi pad ma'i rdul la spyi bos btugs pa'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s sbyar ba |||| rdzogs s+ho ||
         </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex7062023-10-11103259" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4494"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3746">theg chen mdo sde rgyan</rs> gyi legs bshad yang rgyan nyi 'od gsal ba</rs> ces so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex706_29-07-2024001" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:3786" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">rngog</rs> na re khaMs sna tshogs par cis shes zhes pa la bsu ra'i mdos shes so || 
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">btsan</rs> na re khaMs sna tshogs dmigs pa'i phyir rigs yod bsgrub du mi btub ste || ces khaMs bya ba dang rigs bya
         <lb n="N008"/>pa ming gi rnam grangs yin pas 'dra ba 1 gis 'dra ba sgrub du mi 'dod de || dper na bum pa chos can | byas pa yin te | bgyis pa'i phyir ro || zhes pa 4n no || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex7062023-09-11-143"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4494"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3746">mdo sde rgyan</rs> gyi bshad pa</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">shag kya'i dge slong dha rma seng ge</rs>s legs par sbyar ba rdzogs s+hyo ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex7062023-09-11-143413"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4494"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3746">theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i rgyan</rs> gyi rnaM par bshad pa</rs> 'di la <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bla ma</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5571">'grel</rs> ; <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">tik</rs> ; <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">dznya shri</rs> ; <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3798">pa ra he da</rs> ; <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3800">sa rdza</rs> ; ‹‹*›› <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">btsan</rs> ; <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">tsang nag</rs> ; <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3816">ar </rs>; (drug?)</note>'i gsung ma lus pa zin bris byas pas bag tsaM nyog du gsal kyang gting 'theMs che bas dang (du) slang par rigs s+hO ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="reviewed" xml:id="ex7062023-09-11-14"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="bd:4495">ston pa rang 'byung</rs> gis bris pa¶ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6039">long</rs> gis rtsi byas 'di'i don rtogs nas dga' ldan bskye bar cig ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex53022023-09-2607-40-03" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4944">sde bdun rgyan kyi me tog</rs> bzhug go | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">btsun ral gris</rs> ba</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex54022023-09-2607-42-10" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4944">shA s+t+ra pra mA na se na sa ta a lam ka ra puSh+pa na ma</rs> || 
         bod skad du | <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4944">tshad <lb n="1b2"/>ma'i bstan bcos sde bdun rgyan gyi me tog</rs> ces bya ba ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex54022023-09-0814-59-42" ana="corpusmd:colophon" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4944">tshad ma'i bstan bcos sde bdun rgyan gyi me tog</rs> ces bya ba || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">mang du thos pa shAkya'i dge slong bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5680"><!--in APIS two different id 5683 or 5680 ??--><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5915">rtsang</rs> <lb n="98a6"/> ru lhag gi snying po dpal me tog mdangs ldan<!--variant: can--> gyi dgon pa</rs>r sbyar ba legs par rdzogs so || ||</seg>
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex54022023-09-091111" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">ral gri</rs>'i dpe ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex65032023-09-261" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work">grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho'i rgyan</rs> ces bya ba lung dang rigs pa'i sgo nas phyi nang gi grub pa'i mtha'i tshul la blo'i snang ba cung zad thob pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">btsun pa 'phags pa'i ming can</rs> gyis <hi rendition="#Time">shing pho 'brug</hi>i lo <hi rendition="#Time">snron gyi zla ba<anchor xml:id="a1"/></hi> la | <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5700">dpal ngam ring gi chos grwa chen po</rs>r sbyar pa'o || dpag tu med pa 'byung bar gyur cig  dge'o|| </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87042023-10-041" status="unreviewed"><lb n="1a"/>@@ || <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5294">tshad ma'i don bsdus pa</rs> zhes bya ba bzhugs pa lags s+hyo ||</seg>
source: 3_087_04_Blo gros mtshungs med_tshad ma don bsdus.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87042023-10-042" status="unreviewed"><lb n="1b1"/> || rgya gar skad tu || <rs type="work">pra mā ṇa pin dār tha</rs> nama || bod skad du || <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5294">tshad ma'i don bsdus pa</rs> zhes bya ba |</seg>
source: 3_087_04_Blo gros mtshungs med_tshad ma don bsdus.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87042024-09-1215-44-53" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">slob dpon cha pa</rs> na re: rdzas yod chos 3 tshang ba de rdzas su yod pa rigs mi 'thun gyi spyi dang dngos su 'gal ba | mtshan gzhi la grub pa ni mtshan nyid yang dag gi mtshan nyid du 'dod pa la |</seg>
source: 3_087_04_Blo gros mtshungs med_tshad ma don bsdus.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87042024-09-1215-46-31" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4018">chu mig <pb n="2b"/><lb n="2b1"/> pa</rs>s mtshan nyid kyi rigs mi 'thun gyi spyi dang dngos 'gal la byed na | mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i rgyu bskyed mtshan nyid du thal te|chos gnyis po de tshang pa'i phyir gsung pa mi rigs te| mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i rgyu bskyed chos can|mtshan nyid kyi ldog par thal|mtshan nyid kyi rigs mi 'thun gyi spyi dang dngos 'gal yin pa'i phyir|| khyab pa dang rtags <lb n="2b2"/> khas blangs yod pa na bzlog mi nus so||</seg>
source: 3_087_04_Blo gros mtshungs med_tshad ma don bsdus.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87042024-09-1215-46-312" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4018">chu mig pa</rs> kho nyid mtshan nyid du bkod pa la ltos te mtshan gzhi ma yin par mtshon zer ba ni |</seg>
source: 3_087_04_Blo gros mtshungs med_tshad ma don bsdus.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87042024-09-1215-46-3123" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4018">chu mig pa</rs>s bum pa rgyus bskyed du mtshon pa la <lb n="13a2"/> skad cig ma mtshan nyid du bkod pa mtshan nyid skyon med du 'dod pa mi 'thad de|mtshon bya yang skyon med du 'gyur na rang ldog tha snyad du ma grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro || khyab pa khas kyang blangs de gang rung skyon can yin na gsum ga skyon can du 'gyur bas khyab pa'i phyir ro ||</seg>
source: 3_087_04_Blo gros mtshungs med_tshad ma don bsdus.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87042023-10-04-133" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5294">tshad ma'i don bsdus pa</rs> las mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste dang po'o||</seg>
source: 3_087_04_Blo gros mtshungs med_tshad ma don bsdus.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87042023-10-04-135" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5294">tshad ma'i don bsdus pa</rs> zhes bya ba'i bstan bc[o]s 'di ni <lb n="61b4"/> lung dang [r]igs pa man ngag gyi tshul la dbang 'byor pa | mkhas pa'i <abbr>gtsug gi</abbr> rgyan du gyur pa |<anchor xml:id="a3"/> phyogs ma lus par snyan pa rab tu <abbr>grags</abbr> pa <?oxy_comment_start comment="*"?><?oxy_comment_end?>can | 'gran zla dang bral ba'i mkhas pa chen po <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4095">dbang phyug dpal<anchor xml:id="a4"/></rs> gyi bka' drin pas rab tu byed pa <rs type="work">sde bdun mdo</rs> dang bcas [pa? legs???]par sbyor bas rnams (read: rnam) spyod <lb n="61b5 *"/>rtog rig pa'i tshul khon du chud pa gzhung luGS{} la <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4094">chen po_blo gros mtshungs med</rs> la (BDRC falsly notes, or corrects?: pas) don du gnyer ba'i slob ma blo gsal zhing yid gzhungs pa du mas yang dang yang du bskul zhing <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5957"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5949">mnga' ris</rs> pa dge'i ba'i bshes | <?oxy_comment_start comment="*"?><?oxy_comment_end?> gnyen 'od zer seng ge</rs>s shog gu yang phul nas snar ********** <lb n="61b6"/> kyis <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5733">dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang</rs> du legs par sbyar ba rdzogs s+ho ||</seg>
source: 3_087_04_Blo gros mtshungs med_tshad ma don bsdus.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex41012024-09-1014-28-24" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba</rs> na re rtso pa'i skabs mngon du byas nas gzhung mdzes par 'gyur ba tsaM ngag de'i <abbr>'bras bu</abbr> yin la | de yang rang <abbr>bzhin</abbr> kyi mdezs pa ngag 'di'i <abbr>'bras bu</abbr> mi 'dod kyi bcos mas ba shes pa ngag gis <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> 'dod pas gzhung 'buM pa laswo pa rang <abbr>bzhin</abbr> gyi mdzes  pa yod kyang dgos 'brel gyi ngag <abbr>med</abbr> pas bcos mas ma shes pa <abbr>med</abbr> do zhes zer pa yang </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex41012024-09-1014-31-26" ana="corpusmd:colophon" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4011">mang du thos pa shag kya'i sras || lung rigs 'dzin pa gsad pa ring mo</rs> gyis || <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5662">gnyes thang brag sna</rs> zhes bya bar || gzhan gyi don du brtson pas byar || || 
			<rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4752"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3755">chos mngon po kun las btus pa</rs>'i rnams par bshad pa gsal ba blo'i rgyan</rs> zhes bya ba <lb n="180b3"/><!--possibly lost portion of the line-->chos dang gang zag po || || <note type="gloss">dag go |</note> bkra shis par gyur gcig || he he || |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex44052023-01-3114-45-40" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><abbr>thun mong</abbr> dang de <abbr>min par</abbr> snang yang <abbr>gcig</abbr> du zhen pas <abbr>gcig</abbr> yin zhe na ¦
            <abbr>thun mong</abbr> min bar snang <abbr>ba'i</abbr> se gol gyi sgra <abbr>rang mtshan</abbr> <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang 'dzin rtog <abbr>pa'i</abbr> snang yul dang <abbr>gcig</abbr> min <abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>rang mtshan</abbr> <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦<lb n="2b7"/> <abbr>der thal</abbr> ¦ don daM par don byed nus <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ tshad ma <abbr>gnyis</abbr> gang rung min <abbr>ba'i</abbr> rtog tshad kyi <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>rang mtshan</abbr> <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780"><abbr>chos mchog</abbr> </rs>dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsA ba</rs>'o ¦</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44052023-02-0310-54-47" status="reviewed"><!--unclear whether "sgros" is Indian or Tibetan -->
         lkog gyur <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang 'dzin <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> gyis bzung don du byas nas <abbr>rtogs</abbr> par mi 'thad <choice><orig>{°}par</orig><reg>par</reg></choice> thal ¦ rang 'dzin <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> la rang 'dra'i rnaM pa <abbr>dngos su</abbr> gtod <abbr>pa'i</abbr> nus pas stong ba <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5565">sgros</rs> dang <abbr><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780">chos mchog</rs> go</abbr> |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex44052023-01-3114-46-20" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><abbr>gnyis</abbr> gang rung min <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <lb n="2b8"/> rtog tshad kyis rtogs par mi 'thad  <choice><orig>{°}par</orig><reg>par</reg></choice> thal ¦ rang 'dzin gyi blo la rang 'dra'i rnaM pa <abbr>dngos su</abbr> gtod <abbr>pa'i</abbr> nus pas stong <abbr>pa'i</abbr> spyi mtshan <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="3786">lo tsA ba</rs>'o ||
         </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex44052023-01-3114-27-10" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ <lb n="4b2"/>de'i nus pa nye ba la mi ltos <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="4018"><!--chu mig pa-->chu <abbr>mig</abbr></rs><abbr> go</abbr> ¦</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex44052023-02-0110-17-09" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><!--TODO unclear whether sgros is Indian or Tibetan-->
            tshe snga phyi la <abbr>dmigs</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> mngon <abbr>med</abbr> pa <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ khyod tshe snga phyi <abbr>med</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>rtogs</abbr> byed <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ khyod <abbr>med</abbr> dgag <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ ma khyab na ¦<lb n="4b4"/><abbr>med</abbr> dgag yin na tshe snga phyi <abbr>med</abbr> pa <abbr>rtogs</abbr> <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>med</abbr> dgag yin tshe snga phyi <abbr>med</abbr> pa <abbr>rtogs</abbr> <abbr>byed du</abbr> 'gal <abbr>ba'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780">chos mchog </rs> gi</abbr> don du mngon ces <abbr><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5565">sgros</rs> so</abbr></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex44052023-01-3114-30-48" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyis byas pa'i <abbr>gzugs</abbr> zhes <abbr>pa'i</abbr> ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>bag chags</abbr> sad pa <abbr>med</abbr> par khyod yod par mi <abbr>rigs</abbr> te ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyis byas <abbr>pa'i</abbr> ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> bag <abbr>chags</abbr> sad pa des <choice><orig>khyod {°} byas</orig><reg>khyod byas</reg></choice> <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>ma grub</abbr> na ¦ brda la byang <lb n="6a6"/> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> skyes bu <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ <abbr>gzugs</abbr> zhes <abbr>pa'i</abbr> ming las <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi don mi 'dzin <abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog pa de <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyis byas <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> bag chags sad pa des ma byas <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba las byung <abbr>ba'i</abbr> <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog pa <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba de <abbr>med</abbr> par khyod yod par mi <abbr>rigs</abbr> te ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba des khyod byas <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>ma grub</abbr> na ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> <lb n="6a7"/> mthong ba las byung <abbr>ba'i</abbr> <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog pa min <abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba des khyod ma byas <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr>| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:5566">yongs 'dzin</rs> gsung ¦</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44052023-03-17-8-49" status="reviewed"><abbr>gal te</abbr> <abbr>med</abbr> pa dang <choice><sic>khyad</sic><corr>khyod</corr></choice> yod kha dog <abbr>med</abbr> na khyod reg bya <abbr>med</abbr> de <abbr>med</abbr> na kha dog 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog <abbr>med</abbr> <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ kha dog 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> du gyur <abbr>pa'i</abbr> 'dir rtog bskyed pas de'i gzung <abbr>don no</abbr> zhe na ¦
            da lta'i buM <abbr>gzugs</abbr> 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> dbang mngon gyi rgyud rgyur song <abbr>ba'i</abbr> yul dang blo °°° <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ da lta'i buM <abbr>gzugs</abbr> 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> dbang mngon gyi gzung don du thal ¦ de brgyud nas bskyed <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <pb n="7b"/><lb n="7b1"/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780"><abbr>chos mchog</abbr></rs> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5565">sgros</rs> so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex44052023-01-3114-47-20" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong mtshan mo buM pa la reg tshe 'di buM dmar po'i snyaM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> 'di rtog <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang gi gzung don nye ba la <choice><orig>ltos ××pa</orig><reg>ltos pa</reg></choice> ma yin par thal ¦ rang <abbr>gi gzung</abbr> don nye ba <abbr>med</abbr> par khyod yod <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>ma grub</abbr>  te ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de gzung don no zhe na ¦
buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi gzung don du <abbr>med par thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod la rang <lb n="7b2"/>'dra'i rnaM pa <abbr>dngos su</abbr> gtod byed min <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>der thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi dngos kyi spyod yul min <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ 
dbang po'i <abbr>sogs</abbr> phyi ma <abbr>gnyis</abbr> dang <abbr>gcig</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog khyod kyi gzung don yin te ¦ des khyod rgyud nas bskyed pa'i phyir zhe na ¦
 'das pa yang <abbr>sogs</abbr> sngar dang <abbr>gcig</abbr> ¦| nyin par buM <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong mtshan mo buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> reg bya la reg tshe 'di buM pa dmar po'o snyaM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> 'di rtog <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦<lb n="7b3"/>buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog <abbr>pa'i</abbr> dbang po'i <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi gzung don du <abbr>med</abbr> <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>der thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi <choice><orig>{°°°}dngos</orig><reg>dngos</reg></choice> kyi spyod yul min <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5551">dz+nya</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780"><abbr>chos mchog</abbr> </rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="3786">lo tswa ba</rs>'o |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44052023-03-1315-16-58" status="unreviewed"><!--meaning unclear; seems to be a reference to "becoming a translator and a Buddha" and not to a specific translator--><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3770">kun btus </rs>su|_mnyan bya'i sgra smos pa chos can|_dgos pa yod de|_sgra spyi rdzas gzhan gnyan bya min par dam bcas pa'i don la nyan shes dbang po'i mngon sum <lb n="76b9"/>gyis mi gnod par bstan pa'i phyir|_lo [\[]tsa [;]tsA [\]]ba dang bcom par thal lo|_|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44052023-03-1416-24-46" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5554">lha</rs><abbr> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780">chos mchog </rs> gi</abbr> dgongs pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">snga rabs pa</rs>s <choice><sic>blangs</sic><corr>khas blangs</corr></choice> pa dang <abbr>mi mthun</abbr> yang <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593"><!--could be a ref to Dharmottara's commentary-->'grel pa</rs> nyid la zhib tu spyad<!--for dpyad--> pas <abbr>nges so</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44052023-03-1416-27-18" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5564"><abbr>rigs</abbr> gter</rs> du ¦
         <quote source="db:5564" n="Chap. X, Lhasa p. 295"><!--TODO correct reference--><lg>
            <l xml:space="preserve"><abbr>phan tshun</abbr> spangs pa <choice><sic>dngas</sic><corr>dngos</corr></choice>la ni ||</l>
            <l xml:space="preserve"><abbr>rtags</abbr> dang <abbr>rtags</abbr> can grub pa <abbr>med</abbr> ||</l>
         </lg></quote>
        ces te ngag las so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44052023-03-1410-33-58" status="reviewed"><abbr>pa'i</abbr> sbyor ba yang <abbr>yod de</abbr> ¦ 'di na ba mo'i reg <lb n="89b2"/>pa yang <abbr>med</abbr> de ¦ lcags gong 'bar ba mthong <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> <abbr>ces so</abbr> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780"><abbr>chos mchog</abbr></rs> ji <abbr>bzhin</abbr> te ¦ <abbr><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4017">kho bo</rs>s</abbr> <abbr>rtogs so</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44052023-01-3114-38-58" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4768"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3774"> tshad <abbr>rnam par</abbr> nges pa</rs>'i <choice><orig>TIk+k(k)a×blo</orig><reg>TIk+ka blo</reg></choice> gsal gyi mgul </rs>zhes bya ba snyig dus gyi 'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal du gyur pa ¦ <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4017">dza na shri</rs>s <rs type="place" ref="db:4432">gsang phu ne'u thog</rs> du sbyar ba dge<choice><sic>lags</sic><corr>legs</corr></choice> 'phel ¦</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex78032023-09-281" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5245">gzhi gsuM gyi cho ga gsal bar byed pa bdud rtsi nying khu'i dga' ston spel ba</rs> zhes bya ba bzhug‹s› pa'i dbu chog ||</seg>
source: 3_078_03_I_R_M_gzhi gsum gyi cho ga gsal bar byed pa bdud rtsi nying khu.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex78032023-09-282" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[1b1]"/> ༄༅༅༅|| ? ||<rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5245">gzhi gsuM gyi cho ga gsal bar byed pa bdud rtsi nying khu'i dga' ston spel ba </rs> zhes bya ba | thams cad <lb n="[1b2]"/> mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo | </seg>
source: 3_078_03_I_R_M_gzhi gsum gyi cho ga gsal bar byed pa bdud rtsi nying khu.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex78032023-09-283" status="unreviewed"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon 32b3-33a3]"/>
                     'di ni <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5245">gzhi gsum gyi cho ga lag tu blang pa'i rim pa nye bar mkho ba nyaMs su lung</rs> dang <rs type="work">mdo rtsa kar+ma ba taM</rs> rnaMs kyi dgongs pa <lb n="[32b4]"/> bzhin bkod pa yin la.|… ‹'dir dus nges ‘jug rgyu yin_no›</seg>
source: 3_078_03_I_R_M_gzhi gsum gyi cho ga gsal bar byed pa bdud rtsi nying khu.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex78032023-09-284" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[32b5]"/> sbyong cho ga ga'i lag len rnaMs | <rs type="work">lung</rs> dang de <rs type="work">'grel</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref=""><!--TODO person ID in APIS-->gnyag dbon chos rje</rs> yi|| dgongs pa ji bzhin <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4086">chog grub seng ge</rs>s bkod||…</seg>
source: 3_078_03_I_R_M_gzhi gsum gyi cho ga gsal bar byed pa bdud rtsi nying khu.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex78032023-09-285" status="unreviewed"><hi rendition="#Time">gshing pho khyi'i lo</hi>.| <hi rendition="#Time">sbron gyi </hi>‹<hi rendition="#Time">sa</hi>›<hi rendition="#Time"> nya'i [33a2] ba'i dkar phyogs kyi tshes bcwo lnga'i nyin.</hi></seg>
source: 3_078_03_I_R_M_gzhi gsum gyi cho ga gsal bar byed pa bdud rtsi nying khu.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex78032023-09-286" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5757">yar rgyab kyi sa'i cha.| pho brang rgyal chen gling gi kun ga'i ra ba</rs>r.| <rs type="person" ana="">shAkya'i <lb n="[33a3]"/> dge slong jo stan kha che'i bsod snyom‹s› pa chen po</rs>'i ring lugs 'dzin pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5243">d+harma sid+hi sing ha</rs>s<anchor xml:id="a1"/> bkod pa'o ||</seg>
source: 3_078_03_I_R_M_gzhi gsum gyi cho ga gsal bar byed pa bdud rtsi nying khu.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex28032024-09-1115-20-56" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="60b2"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4667"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3715">dbu ma rtsa ba</rs>'i ti ka rnam dpyad snying po</rs> zhes bya ba | yul byang phyogs kyi rgyud du byung ba | bdag dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho'i pha rol du son pa | rtog ge ngan pa'i rgol ba tshar gcod par byed pa| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3931">dbu ma <lb n="60b3"/>smra ba'i dge slong shag rings</rs> kyis <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5660">thang po che'i gtsug lag khang<anchor xml:id="a1"/></rs> du sbyar ba | rdzogs s+ho ||  ||  bkra shis par gyur cig  ||  ||</seg>
source: 1_028_03_ Shag rings _ dbu ma rtsa ba'i Tika rnam dpyad snying po.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex2702_2024-09-1114-42-58" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">bla ma dam pa</rs>s rjes bzung zhing || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">blo ldan slob ma</rs>s yang yang<anchor xml:id="a1"/> <lb n="217b5"/> bskul ba'i mthus|| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4128">blo gros rgyal mtshan dpal</rs> gyis rnam par sbyar || <rs type="work">'phags pa'i gsung</rs> dang <rs type="work">dam pa'i legs bshad</rs> dpang byas nas || tshig don ma lus gsal bar bshad yod<anchor xml:id="a2"/> de lta na'ang|| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4128">bdag</rs> bla'i [blo'i]<anchor xml:id="a3"/> nyes pas gal te 'khrul <lb n="217b6"/> pa'i cha mchis na || de nyid gzigs pa'i mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol || phyogs zhen phrag dog ti* [gti]<anchor xml:id="a4"/> mug gis bsgribs [sgrib]<anchor xml:id="a5"/> pa'i|| log sred can dag 'di yis mchu<anchor xml:id="a6"/>  dka' mod || gzu bor gnas shing <rs type="work">legs bshad</rs> <lb n="217b7"/> don gnyer ba'i|| blo ldan skal ba [pa]<anchor xml:id="a7"/>  can rnams dgyes par mdzod || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4128">bdag</rs> blo dang ba'i mkha' las 'ongs pa'i <rs type="work">legs bshad</rs> nyin mor byed pa'i 'od || ma lus 'gro ba'i gling la shar bas mi shes mun pa'i tshogs bcom nas ||  </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex2702_2024-09-1114-42-582" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4661"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3749">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos</rs> kyi rnam par bshad pa nges don rab gsal snang ba</rs> zhes bya ba| | bla ma dam pa rnams kyi bka' drin la brten nas || rig pa'i gnas lnga la blo gros kyi snang ba cung zad thob pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4128">bod kyi paN+Di ta 'jam dbyangs blo gros</rs> kyis <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5659">dpal sa skya'i chos grwa chen po</rs>r nye bar<anchor xml:id="a8"/> sbyar ba'o ||   
   bstan pa rin po che dang 'gro ba mang po la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig | || mang+ga laM b+ha wa tu|          
   yi ge pa ni <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">seng ge</rs> yi ming can nga'o || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex2702_2024-09-1114-42-583" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">thogs med</rs> 
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">dbyig gnyen</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="Vasubhandu"?><?oxy_comment_end?>

         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">rin chen rdo rje</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="Ratnavajra"?><?oxy_comment_end?> 
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">sad dza na</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="Sajjana"?><?oxy_comment_end?>dang ni ||
      <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">sa ra hi ta</rs><?oxy_comment_start comment="Sa ra he ra P0RK1757"?><?oxy_comment_end?> 
      <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">blo gros grags pa</rs> {P0RK1758} dang ||
      <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">mar pa jo 'phan</rs> {P0RK1759
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">don grub</rs> {'Chim ston don grub P0RK1760
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">brtson seng {'Chim ston brtson seng </rs>P0RK1761
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">} chims › 
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">nam mkha' grags</rs>P1060 ||
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">bcom ldan ral gri</rs>P1217 
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">skyi ston shag 'bum {skyi ston shAkya 'bum </rs>P5741 dang || 
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">skyi ston 'jam dbyangs </rs>P144
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">kun mkhyen chos rje dol po</rs> dol po pa shes rab rgyal mtshan P139
            la| la</rs> | brgyud de <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4128">sa bzangs pa</rs> la gnang ba'o || mang+ga laM b+ha wa tu |

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex107012023-10-06-103914" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5421">byang chub lam gyi sgron ma'i rnam thar bshad pa phul byung dgongs pa'i rgyan bzhugs s+ho</rs>||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex107012023-10-06-110204" ana="corpusmd:colophon" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5421">byang chub lam gyi sgron ma'i rnam par bshad pa phul byung dgongs pa'i rgyan</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">jo bo chen po</rs> <rs type="place">bod yul</rs> du phyags phab nas <hi rendition="#Time">lo bzhi brgya dang nga brgyad</hi> 'das pa na| <rs type="person" ana="">bla ma dam pa rnams</rs> kyi bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba <rs type="person" ana="">dge slong kun mtshan</rs> gyis <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">dge ba'i bshes gnyen</rs> gong ma dag gi gsung la gces spras su dang nan tan du byas te rang bzo dang bral bar | dpal <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5765">rtses thang gi chos gra chen po</rs>r legs par bsdebs pa'o ||
               'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig | drag po zhes bya lcags spre'u  dbyar 'bring gi || rgyal bas chos 'khor skor ba'i dus chen la || shing  rta'i lam <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5421">chen byang chub lam sgron gyi || rnam bshad phul byung dgongs pa'i rgyan</rs> 'di grub||  ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex107012023-10-06-110731" status="unreviewed"><pb n="[Annotations (239b 4-5-240a: 5)] pp. 414-415s"/>
         <rs type="work">byang chub lam gyi sgron ma</rs>'i tshig don gyi gdams pa bla ma rnams kyi zhal nas zhal snyan thugs nas thugs su rim par byon pa'i brgyud pa ni |  <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3745">jo bo</rs> | 
               <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3827">'brom</rs> | 
               <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3829">pu to ba</rs> | 
               <rs type="person" ana=""><!--maybe id:3869-->zhang rom<anchor xml:id="a1"/></rs>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3925">gtum ston</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="P3446 1st abbot of Snar thang"?><?oxy_comment_end?>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3924">rdo ston</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="P3997 2nd abbot of Snar thang"?><?oxy_comment_end?>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">gro mo che</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="P2271 4th abbot of Snar thang"?><?oxy_comment_end?>| yang na <rs type="person" ana="">zhang rom</rs>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">chu mig pa shes rab grags </rs>P5740|  
               <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3880">gro mo che</rs> | 
               <rs type="person" ana="">zhang ston chos bla</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="P3998 5th abbot of Snar thang"?><?oxy_comment_end?>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">sgom seng</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="P2640  6th abbot of Snar thang"?><?oxy_comment_end?>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">mchims chen</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment=" P1060 7th abbot of Snar thang"?><?oxy_comment_end?>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">ze'u 'dul 'dzin</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="P1304 10th abbot of Snar thang"?><?oxy_comment_end?>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">grags sho ba</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="P1303 11th abbot of Snar thang"?><?oxy_comment_end?>|  
               dpal_ldan mchims <?oxy_comment_start comment="P1298 12th abbot of Snar thang"?><?oxy_comment_end?>|
               <rs type="person" ana="">gro ston kun rgyal</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="author | P1297 13th abbot of Snar thang"?><?oxy_comment_end?>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">spang ston grub pa shes rab</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="P1302 14th abbot of Snar thang"?><?oxy_comment_end?>| 
               dpal_ldan bla ma chos kyi spyan ldan ku mA ra shri de la <rs type="person" ana="">bdag</rs> gis bka' drin zhus_so|| || 
               
               yang <rs type="person" ana="">bla ma rin po che 'gos lo tsA ba{</rs>P318<rs type="person" ana="">}</rs>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">spyan snga rin po che chos kyi brags pa ye shes dpal bzang po {</rs>P317<rs type="person" ana="">}</rs>| 
               de la <rs type="person" ana="">bdag</rs> gis <rs type="person" ana="">bla ma chen po</rs>'i <rs type="work">TIka</rs> chen gyi stengs<anchor xml:id="a2"/> nas tshar gcig bka' drin mngos| 
               
               yang na <rs type="person" ana="">jo bo chen po</rs>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">dge bshes ston pa</rs>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">dgon pa ba {</rs>P1322 1016-1082} | 
               <rs type="person" ana="">sne'u zur pa<anchor xml:id="a3"/></rs>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">rgyang ro dar brtson<anchor xml:id="a4"/></rs>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">lji la ston grags</rs>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">spyi lhas pa byang chub 'od</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="P0RK647"?><?oxy_comment_end?><anchor xml:id="a5"/>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">grang bu lung pa 'jaM dbyangs rgyal mtshan<anchor xml:id="a6"/></rs>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">rma bya shAkya seng ge </rs><?oxy_comment_start comment="P5656"?><?oxy_comment_end?><anchor xml:id="a7"/>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">mchims namkha' grags</rs><?oxy_comment_start comment=" P1060 7th abbot of Snar thang"?><?oxy_comment_end?>|| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">rgyang ro byang chub 'bum</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="P3644 13th century"?><?oxy_comment_end?>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">mchims blo bzang grags pa</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="P1298 12th abbot of Snar thang"?><?oxy_comment_end?>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">bla ma bsod nams lhun grub</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="P5762"?><?oxy_comment_end?>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">slob dpon grags pa rgya mtsho</rs><?oxy_comment_start comment="P1307"?><?oxy_comment_end?>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">mkhan chen grub pa shes rab</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="14th abbot of Snar thang P1302"?><?oxy_comment_end?>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">mkhan chen bsod nams nams mchog grub</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment="15th abbot of Snar thang P56 1399-1452"?><?oxy_comment_end?>| 
               <rs type="person" ana="">rje brtsun namkha' blo gros<anchor xml:id="a8"/></rs>| 
               kha che paN chen gyi rgyal tshab mkhan chen 'gro bzang snying po | de la bdag gis zhus so||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_20072023-06-281" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ref="db:4550" ana="corpusmd:named_reference"><rs type="work" ref="db:3774" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">
            tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i ṭi ka legs bshad bsdus pa</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839"><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> gtsang nag pa</rs>s mdzad pa <abbr>bzhugs s+ho</abbr> ||
            <lb n="1a2"/>
         i <unclear>dra sa</unclear> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4551">SHakya b+hikSHu ku ma ra SHrI</rs> pustaM <rs type="work" ref="db:4550" ana="corpusmd:named_reference"><rs type="work" ref="db:3774" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">pra ma Na bi ni <choice><reg>SH+ca</reg><orig>(SH+ca/s+tsa)</orig></choice> ya sya</rs> TI ka</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3839">A tsarya virya sing ha sya</rs> kA ra: ||<note type="editorial">Skt: idam? śākyabhikṣu-kumāra-śrī pustaṃ pramāṇaviniścayasya ṭīkā ācārya-vīryasiṃhasya kārāḥ. Kumāraśrī (=Tib. gzhon nu dpal) could possibly be 'Gos lo tsA ba bZhon nu dpal.</note></seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_10152023-06-283" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ref="db:4550" ana="corpusmd:named_reference"><rs type="work" ref="db:3774" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i ti ka legs par bshad pa bsdus <choice><reg>pa</reg><orig>pa'</orig></choice></rs> zhes bya ba |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_1282023-4" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bla ma rnams</rs> la phyag 'tshal lo ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex13012023-07-2008-36-52" status="reviewed"><rs type="deity">ston pa</rs>'i gsung don nges byed rigs pa'i tshul || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3773"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3774">rnam nges</rs> mdzad pa</rs> de 'dir rgyal gyur cig ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_10202023-06-285" status="reviewed"><lb n="1b4"/> zhugs dpyad la ltos myed par || rnam 'jig sdud dang gzhung don gsal byed pas || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3773">ston de</rs>'i dgongs pa bde blag nges 'gyur ba'i || <rs type="work" ref="db:4550" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">legs bshad bsdus pa'i ti ka</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3839">bdag </rs>gis bya ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_10252023-06-286" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ref="db:3774" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">rnam par nges <choice><reg>pa</reg><orig>pa'</orig></choice></rs> ni lus lta bu'i bstan bcos bar ma ste | gzhung cung zad bsdus pas tshad ma nyid kyi lus tshang par gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_10292023-06-287" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ref="db:3774" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">gzhung 'di </rs> ni rtsom pa la 'jug pa klad kyi don dang | brtsam par bya ba skabs kyi don dang | mthar phyin pa 'jug gi don gsum gyis nges par bya ba las |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_1282023-06-288" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:mtshan_nyid"><rs type="person" ref="db:4593" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">snga rabs pa dag </rs>mtshan nyid kyi skyon mtshon bya la ltos te mi srid pa dang ma khyab khyab ches gsum las myed par sems pa de dag ni khyab mnyam pa'i don ldog gzhan pa dang rang ldog rdzas su ma grub pa skyon du bsgrub pas <lb n="11a2"/> gnod par lta'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex87032023-06-2912-23-02" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:snang_la_ma_nges_pa"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4265">kha cig</rs><note type="editorial">An annotation in the manuscript of mTshur ston's Tshad ma shes rab sgron ma identifies the proponent as "rtag pa," which we understand to refer to sTag. See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 21, n. 30</note> snang yang nges pa 'dren mi nus pa zhes zer ba ni 'dir blo rnams yul cig la ltos nas <lb n="22b8"/> tha dad par 'jog pa yin no ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_1282023-06-06" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:5570" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">snga rab pa pa</rs>'i 'dod pa rjes su brjod pa dang | sgrub bya sgrub byed kyi don nyid ngos gzung pa dang | de rang gi gzhung lugs smra ba rnams la sbyar ba'o ||
         </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_1223023-06-289" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:4593" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">chen po dag </rs>ni sgrub pa 'brel pa gnyis la rten pas dbye ba'i tshul ci 'dra ba myed pas sam | mi dmigs pa'i sgrub bya med dgag la dbye' ba myed pa sam | dbye bsdu' byas kyang gsum gyi grangs <pb n="110a"/><lb n="110a1"/> nges la gnod pa myed te mngon sum bzhir phye bas tshad ma'i grangs nges la mi gnod pa bzhin no zhes zer ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_12292023-06-2810" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:3839" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">kho bo cag</rs> rtags mi 'khrul pa'i spyi khyab de nyid la 'brel par brjod pa'i yang phyir ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_1282023-06-2822" status="unreviewed"><milestone unit="section" n="1"/>re shig thal ba'i phyogs chos khas blangs dang bzlog pa'i bsgrub bya shes 'dod gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang par gnad gcig ste | <choice><corr>du ba</corr><sic>du ma</sic></choice> 'gog pa'i rgyu <lb n="160b3"/> mi dmyigs pa'i thal ba dang me bsgrub pa'i 'bras rtags kyi rang rgyud kyi dbang du byas te la la me myed du log pas smra na gnyis ka tshang la me tshad mas grub na gnyis ka ma tshang ba'i phyir ro || 
      <milestone unit="section" n="2"/> thal ba'i bsal pa dang bzlog pa'i rtags gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang par gnad gcig ste | la la du ba mthong na gnyis ka la tshang la ma mthong <lb n="160b4"/> na gnyis ka ma tshang ba'i phyir ro ||
      <milestone unit="section" n="3"/> 
      thal ba dang bzlog pa'i khyab pa gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang par gnad gcig ste | thal ba'i khyab pa me myed du <choice><corr>med</corr><sic>me</sic> </choice>kho na la yod par bsgrub na du yod la me myed <choice><corr>med</corr><sic>me myed</sic></choice> pas du yod la mye <choice><corr>yod</corr><sic>myed</sic></choice> pa rang rgyud kyi khyab pa grub cing<anchor xml:id="a36"/> | rang rgyud kyi khyab pa {<hi rendition="#i #u">du yod</hi> (Ms om.)} <mentioned>me yod kho na la yod pa</mentioned> grub na yang <mentioned>me myed la myed pa</mentioned>s 160b5 <mentioned>me myed la du ba myed pa</mentioned> thal ba'i khyab pa grub pas<anchor xml:id="a37"/> tshang par gcig pa'i phyir dang | <mentioned>la la tsan dan gyi me myed pas du med du thal ba</mentioned>r brjod na thal ba dang bzlog pa gnyis ka'i khyab pa sha pa'i mer zhig pas ma tshang par gcig pa'i phyir ro ||
     de la phyogs chos dang shes 'dod ma tshang pa ni me mthong pa'i tshang bang du bkod na 'byung zhing <lb n="160b6"/> bsal ba dang gtan tshigs ma tshang pa ni du ba ma mthong pa'i rgya mtshor bkod na 'byung la 
            khyab pa gnyis ma tshang pa ni me mthong yang tsan dan gyi me myed par rtogs pa'i la la bkod 'byung pas ma tshang pa'i skyon drug ni gzhi gsum la 'byung pa yin no ||
         la la du ba mthong yang me myed du rtog pas me myed la du med du thal ba<lb n="160b7"/> brjod na tshang pa'i yon tan drug gzhi cig la 'du bas thal ba yon tan drug ldan gyis rang rgyud chos drug ldan 'phel ba nyid do zhes bya ba <rs type="person" ref="db:4593" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">snga rabs pa</rs>'i rnam pa gzhag pa'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_1282023-06-2823" status="reviewed"><lb n="182b3"/> dang rang tshig gis bsal pa gnyis kyi khyad par ni <rs type="person" ref="db:4593" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">snga rabs pa dag</rs> yid ches pa'i gang zag gzhan gyi tshig dang rgol ba rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba la 'jog go ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_1282023-06-0633" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:4593" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference"><!--These are predecessors of dharmakirti-->snga rabs pa'i lugs</rs> 'chad pa na yid ches pa'i gang zag dang de'i tshig don gyi 'bras bu dang 'bras bu'i rtags kyis bzlog pa sel pa gsum <lb n="183b6"/> <quote xml:id="d2e14307">bdag gam</quote> zhes dang <quote xml:id="d2e14310">de'i</quote> zhes dang <quote xml:id="d2e14313">rang gi</quote> (P294b43) zhes pa ste | bdag dang gzhan ni rang tshig dang khas blangs kyi gang zag yin pas nus pa yang <quote xml:id="d2e14316">gegs sam gnod par byed do</quote> zhes sbyar ro ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_1282023-06-28245" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:4593" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">lung <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du tshad ma yid ma yin nam ces pa'i lan du lung tshad ma bsam par bshad zin to ces bya ste | bshad pa <abbr>slob dpon</abbr> <lb n="184b3"/> gyis yin kyang snga rabs pa pa</rs>s<!--These are predecessors of Dharmakirti--> de ltar 'dod par dgongs pa'o || </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_1282023-06-2825" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:4593" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">snga rabs pa'</rs>i lugs brjod pa dang khyad par myed pa rang gi lugs gnyis <quote xml:id="d2e14495">gzhung lugs</quote> ces dang <quote xml:id="d2e14498">'di la yang</quote> (<?oxy_comment_start comment="[bold face in source document]"?>P296b1<?oxy_comment_end?>) ces pa'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1301_1232023-06-282" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ref="db:4550" ana="corpusmd:named_reference"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3774">tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i ti ka legs par bshad pa bsdus <lb n="210a4"/>pa</rs> zhes bya ba || <rs type="person" ref="db:3839" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">rigs par smra ba'i dge slong brtson 'grus seng ge</rs>s sbyar pa'o || rdzogs s+ho || i thi ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex15022024-09-0915-48-35" status="reviewed"><pb n="1a"/><lb n="1a1"/>phyi <lb n="1a1"/>tsa <lb n="1a1"/>73<lb n="1a4"/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4582"><abbr>byang chub sems dpa'i</abbr> spyod pa la 'jug pa'i de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa rin po che'i snang ba</rs> zhes bya ba <abbr>bzhugs s+hO</abbr>|| 
         <lb n="1a5"/> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3896">gsang phu ba blo gros mtshungs med</rs> kyis mdzad<!--written in dbu med--></seg>
source: 1_015_02_Blo gros mtshungs med_spyod 'jug rnam bshad rin chen snang ba.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex15022023-09-15-114936" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4582">byang chub sems pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa <lb n="56a6"/> rin po che'i snang ba</rs> zhes bya ba|| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3896"><rs type="place">yul dbus</rs> kyi char byung ba rigs par smra ba blo gros mtshungs med</rs> kyis <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6173">dpal gsang phu ne'u thog gi chos gra</rs>r sbyar ba'o ||</seg>
source: 1_015_02_Blo gros mtshungs med_spyod 'jug rnam bshad rin chen snang ba.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" ana="corpusmd:colophon" xml:id="ex7012024-08-2814-21-46" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4486">dbu ma de kho na nyid kyi snying po</rs> zhes bya ba | blo gsal zhing rigs par smra bas rtog ge ngan pa'i tshogs 'jig par byed pa | brtul zhugs mchog la gnas pa'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s sbyar ba || rdzogs s+ho ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1082023-02-0311-27-53" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><pb edRef="inst:4434" n="1a"/><lb edRef="inst:4434" n="1a1"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4435"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3706">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3711">'grel pa</rs> <choice><orig>(dang bcas pa'i)</orig><reg>dang bcas pa'i </reg> </choice>dka' 'grel rin po che'i sgron ma</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="3786">lots+tsha ba blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis mdzad pa bzhugs so ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1082023-03-0714-04-20" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><pb edRef="inst:5591" n="1a"/><lb edRef="inst:5591" n="1a1"/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="3786">lo tsa ba chen po</rs>'i <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4435">bsdus don</rs> bzhugs so |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1082023-02-0311-26-01" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><lb edRef="inst:4434" n="1a2"/>
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="3786">blo ldan shes rab</rs> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4435"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="3706">phar phyin</rs> 'grel pa</rs>|</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1082023-02-0311-31-41" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><pb edRef="inst:4434" n="1b"/><lb edRef="inst:4434" n="1b1"/> bsam dang sbyor ba las 'khrungs <abbr>pa'i</abbr> || dpa' bo de dang de'i bka' || nyes 'joMs de sgrub tshogs bcas la ||sgo <abbr>gsum</abbr> dang bas <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="4953">bdag</rs> nyid 'dud ||<!--TODO check if this way of tagging works. This verse is found only in instance id:4434. It is lacking in the blockprint version id:5591 and in the gSung thor bu, id:5592. It may have been authored by the scribe.-->
         </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1082023-02-0311-33-11" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><!--TODO Q check the alternative readings from blockprint; why does it not recognize the end of segment?-->
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="3786">bdag</rs> gis 'bad pas dka' ba nyams blangs nas<app><rdg wit="inst:4434">nas</rdg> <rdg wit="inst:5591">te <!--blockprint--></rdg> </app> || 
            chos smra<app><rdg wit="inst:4434">rten</rdg> <rdg wit="inst:5591">bsten <!--blockprint--> </rdg></app> dang rigs pa'i rjes <lb edRef="inst:4434" n="1b3"/><app><rdg>'brangs</rdg><rdg wit="inst:5591">'bren <!--blockprint--> </rdg></app> pas || 
            cung zad <lb edRef="inst:5591" n="1b3"/><lb edRef="inst:5591" n="1b1"/>rtogs las rang nyid dang rigs pa'i rjes <lb edRef="inst:4434" n="1b3"/><app><rdg wit="inst:5591">dran<!--blockprint--></rdg> <rdg wit="inst:4434">drang </rdg> </app> phyir dang || 
            gzhan rtogs don du <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3711"> 'grel</rs> 'di'i don dbye bya ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1082023-03-0713-55-36" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3711">man ngag gi <abbr>bstan bcos</abbr> kyi bshad pa</rs> 'dir
         bshad pa la 'jug pa dang | 
         bshad pa nye bar dgod pa dang |
         <lb edRef="inst:5591" n="1b4"/><lb edRef="inst:5591" n="1b1"/>bshad pa mthar phyin pa'i bya ba 
            <app>
               <rdg wit="inst:4434"><abbr>gsum mo</abbr></rdg>
               <rdg wit="inst:5591">dang gsum mo<!--blockprint--></rdg>
            </app>|| </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1082023-02-0311-58-54" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3712">slob dpon seng ge bzang po</rs>s 'dir ji skad bshad pa ni <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">mdo</rs> dang shin tu<abbr>mi mthun</abbr> pas 'khrul pa yin par <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="3786">bdag</rs> gis<abbr>rtogs so</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1082023-02-0312-07-47" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3712"><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> seng ge bzang po</rs>'i bshad pa ste|_<rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3706">mdo</rs> dang<abbr>rjes su</abbr> <lb edRef="inst:4434" n="13a9"/> 'thun pas legs par bshad par <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3786">kho bo</rs>s <abbr>rtogs so</abbr> |
         </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1082023-02-0311-51-37" status="reviewed"><!--unclear whether the "kha cig" is Indian or Tibetan-->
         dmigs pa la log par rtogs pa spang ba ni | chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang <abbr>bzhin</abbr><abbr>gnyis</abbr> med pa'i shes pa'i chos nyid ni dmigs pa <abbr>yin te</abbr> ¦ yul du bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> gis <abbr>rtogs so</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1082023-02-0311-52-53" status="reviewed"><!--unclear whether "kha cig" is Indian or Tibetan-->
            yang na <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593"><abbr>kha cig</abbr></rs> na re| 'dir ni mthong laM <abbr>skad cig</abbr> ma <abbr>bcu drug</abbr> du nye bar mtshon par byed pa'i <abbr>phan yon</abbr> <abbr>bcu drug</abbr> bstan pa <abbr>yin te</abbr> laM gyi <abbr>ngo bo</abbr> bstan pa ma <abbr>yin no</abbr> zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1082023-02-0312-10-04" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3712"><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> <abbr>seng ge</abbr>  bzang po</rs>s bshad pa'i 'khrul ba'i <abbr>rjes su</abbr> 'brangs pa'i rtsod pa 'di ni ma 'khrul ba'i <abbr>lugs</abbr> brjod pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="3786"><abbr>kho bo</abbr> cag</rs> la bya bar mi <abbr>rigs so</abbr> ||
         </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1082023-02-0311-59-51" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3706">gzhung</rs> gi don ji lta bar <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3708">'phags pa rnaM grol</rs> gyis bshad pa dang 'thun par <lb edRef="inst:4434" n="33a9"/> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="3786">bdag</rs> gis brjod pa <abbr>yin no</abbr> |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1082023-02-0312-01-50" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><!--TODO Q check how alternative reading of blockprint appears-->
               <app> <rdg wit="inst:5591">shes rab pha <lb edRef="inst:5591" n="98b6"/>rol phyin pa'i don gyi tshul <!--blockprint--></rdg> 
               <rdg wit="inst:4434">shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i don gyi tshul</rdg></app> 
             ||
             <abbr>dbang med</abbr> blo ngan rnams kyi <abbr>yul min</abbr> <lb edRef="inst:4434" n="39a6"/> 'di || 
             de ltar <abbr><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="3786">bdag</rs> gis</abbr> phyogs tsam rnaM phye bas || 
             mkhas rnams legs pa'i laM 'di gus ston shog ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex1082023-02-0312-02-39" type="excerpt" status="reviewed"><!--TODO Q check how alternative reading of blockprint appears-->
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="3786">bdag</rs> kyang skye ba kun du rgyal ba'i yuM || zab mo 'di la rtag tu spyod byed cing || rgyal dang de sras rnams kyis rjes bzung ste || gzhan don byed <app> <rdg wit="inst:4434">las</rdg><rdg wit="inst:5591">pas<!--blockprint--></rdg></app> 
            las slar ldog ma gyur cig ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1082023-02-0311-39-38" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><!--TODO Q check how alternative reading appears-->
             <app> 
               <rdg wit="inst:4434">
                  <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4435">
                     <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3706">
                  shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa man ngag gi 
                  <choice>
                     <orig>stan</orig>
                     <reg>bstan</reg>
                  </choice> bcos </rs>
            don bsdus<lb edRef="inst:4434" n="39a7"/> pa</rs></rdg> 
               <rdg wit="inst:5591">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos kyi don bsdus pa<!--blockprint--></rdg> 
            </app>
             <!--blockprint adds: rdzogs so-->
             <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis rab tu sbyar ba'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1082023-02-2411-39-38" status="reviewed"><lb edRef="inst:4434" n="39a8"/> mkhas pa rnams kyis yid ches bya ba'i phyir || mtshan ni <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="4435">rin po che'i sgron me</rs> yin || yang na <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="4435"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3706">rgyan</rs> gyi rgyan</rs> ces bya bar gzung ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex46052024-09-1216-47-23" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba chen po</rs>  ni rtags kyi 'brel pa'i rtsa ba ** gshis la rten pa dang khas blangs la rten pa ** stobs don sgrub du myur pa dang tha snyad du bsgrub pa <lb n="22a1"/> 2 phyi ma * rtags yin la khas blangs la rten pa ni yid ches su bzhed do gzhung gi thig 'chad pa la gnyis thun mong gi mtshan nyid dang po'i lugs rnam par bzhag pa'i dnag po ni bdag gaM nas yin te bar ma rang tshig smra ba'i rgol ba bdag dang gzhan bstan bcos <lb n="22a2"/> mkhan chen na_s tshad mar khas len pas te yid ches su bzung bya yin te khyod bstan bya'i don gyi dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i sgo nas ngag 'jug par 'dod</seg>
