<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex46052023-09-12-091" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4789">dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshad ma rab bsal</rs> gyi phyag dpe' |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="ex46052023-09-12-092"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4788">dkon mchog nor bu</rs>s bris pa dge'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1132023-07-2114-50-15" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo chen</rs> gyi mdzad pa'i <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4445"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3774">rnaM nges</rs> kyi ṭi ka</rs> <abbr>bzhugs so</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex11320240828_1" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5557">slob dpon shes rab 'byung gnas</rs> dang | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5629">zhi ba bzang po</rs> la sogs pa na re | sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni | shes pa las gzhan ma yin te | rang rig rig par bya ba'i phyir ro || de la phyogs chos ni nyams su myong bas nges so || khyab pa yang rig par bya ba 'gal ba la ni rig par byed pa yang 'gal bas khyab ste | des na khyab par byed pa 'gal ba yin no || 'di ltar sngon po rang gi rang bzhin rig pa nyid kyis rig na de rang gi rang bzhin kho na'o || byed pa gzhan gyis rig na ni rig pa yang gzhan kho na'o || des na rig par bya pa tha dad pa la rig par byed pa tha dad pas khyab pas khyad par nges so zhe'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1132023-07-2114-52-30" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n=""/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4445">tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i dka' ba'i gnas rnam par bshad pa</rs> ||| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsa ba shag kya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis sbyar ba'o ||  ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1132023-10-181" status="unreviewed"><lb n=""/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6035">shag kya'i dge slong 'dar rin chen 'bar</rs> gyis sbyin par bya ba'i chos so ||| ||||||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex56152023-09-251" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work">phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi 'phags pa'i gang [7a2] zag thams cad mchod pa'i cho ga rgyan gyi me tog ces bya ba</rs> <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5949">stod mnga' ris</rs> kyi 'dul ba 'dzin pa <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5948">dge slongs mgon ldan 'od</rs> ces bya bas bskul nas mang du thos pa'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006"> dge <lb n="[7a3]"/> slons bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s dpal ldan <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">snar thang gi dgon pa</rs>r bkod pa rdzogs so|| 'dis sems can tshad med pa'i don byed cing 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad mnyes par byed par gyur <lb n="[7a4]"/> cig| dge'o|</seg>
source: 2_056_15_I_R_M_mchod pa'i cho ga rgyan gyi me tog 201210927.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex73022023-09-261" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag_gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs <!--em.: ms stong|stoGS--> pa rgyan gyi dka'_'grel lung gi dpag bsam rgyas 'gyur gyi tshal</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni|  </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex73022023-09-267" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4074">brtson 'grus dpal</rs> gyi zhabs rdul spyi bos len cing|  <rs type="person" ana="">de nyid <?oxy_comment_start comment="=brtson 'grus dpal"?><?oxy_comment_end?></rs> las chos 'di'i tshul la <abbr>blo'i</abbr> (em. blo'i; Ms. slo'I) snang ba cung zad skyes pa|  <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5193">shAkya' btsun pa <lb n="[49a7]"/> pa dkon mchog gra[GS]</rs> kyis  <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5705"><rs type="deity">ston pa</rs>'i rgyal tshab daM pa rnams kyi bzhuGS gnas dpal sa_skya'i chos gra dang nye ba'i sa</rs>r sbyar ba re shig <abbr>rdzogs so</abbr> |!| </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-51-15" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><pb n="1a"/><lb n="1a1"/><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5517"> tshad ma rnam nges kyi 'grel bshad</rs><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5518"> bo dong 'jam dbyangs</rs> kyis mdzad pa bzhugs||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2609-49-04" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5552">bram ze chen po</rs>'i rjes su 'brang ba [\[]gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig</rs> na re| don bden pa rtogs pa chos gsum tshang ba yin la| de yang don ni shes bya'i gnas lugs yin la| bden pa ni ji ltar yin pa'am yod ltar gnas pa'o||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-34-10" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re| blo 'dod rgyal ba yin pas gnas skabs don dang mthun yang log pa'i shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin te| don med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir te| dper na du ba dang dus mnyam du skyes pa'i rlangs pa ni me dang lhan cig yod kyang me'i 'bras bu ma yin te| me dang ldog pa ma grub pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs so zhes zer ro||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-21-55" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><lb n="5a5"/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="3892"> chos rje [\[]paṇ ḍi ta'i [;]paṇḍi ta'i [\]]</rs>zhal nas| yid dpyod tshad mar thal te| don bden pa gsar du nges pa'i phyir ro||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-35-00" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gi bzhed pas the tshom ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis kar 'dzin pa yin pas log pa'i shes pa yin la| rgyu mtshan med pa dang log pa'i rgyu mtshan can dang bden pa'i rgyu mtshan gtan la ma phebs pa can yang the tshom gyi rang bzhin yin pas log pa'i shes pa yin no zhes grag go |
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re| de mi rigs te| the tshom gyis gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yongs su ma bcad pa'i phyir dang | log pa'i shes pa ni don de ma yin du yongs su <lb n="5a7"/>gcod byed yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-23-13" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje [\[]paṇ ḍi ta'i [;]paṇḍi ta'i [\]]/</rs>zhal nas| the tshom de dang log pa'i shes pa gcig pa mi srid de| the tshom ni [\[]bsgrub [;]sgrub [\]]byed gnod byed gang gi yang mthar ma thug pa yin la| log pa'i shes pa la ni gnod byed nges pa min pa'i phyir ro||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-35-21" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re| rnam pa gnyis zhes brjod pa ni| gnyis su grangs nges par gzung ba'i don du ste| de lta ma yin na| re shig 'dir 'di tsam zhig brjod par zad kyi| dbye ba gzhan yang srid do zhes dogs pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ba ni mi bden te| 'o zhes yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshig gis mtha' gzhan du srid pa'i dgos pa bkag pa'i phyir ro||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2610-23-13"><lb n="7a4"/>na rtogs pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro||[]zhes <rs type="work">[\[]ti ka [;]ṭikka</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">[\]]mkhan po [\[]gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig</rs> [\[]gsung [;]gsungs [\]]pa'ang legs so||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-35-45" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re| tha snyad pa'i rtags kyi bsgrub bya 'di ni tshad ma'i gzhal bya yin pas dngos po'i chos gcig yin la| de'ang tshad mas grub zin pa de nyid ma yin gyi rang bzhin sems dpa'i blos dpyad na don de la sngar bkod pa'i brda'i rgyu mtshan gyis chos mi 'dra ba bkag pa mi slu ba'i yul gyi bsgrub bya'o|| rjes dpag gi zhen stangs dang sbyar na tha snyad du brda'i rgyu mtshan gyi chos su grub pa'i ma <lb n="9a9"/>yin dgag go zhes gsung ngo ||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-36-26" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re|<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3735"> ka ma la shi la</rs> dang <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780"> chos mchog</rs> ltar na| mngon sum dang rtog bral ma 'khrul ba gnyis grub bde gcig gam mi gcig grang | gcig na sgrub pa dang rjes su brjod pa'i don mi 'thad la| mi gcig na mtshan nyid dang mtshon byar mi <lb n="12b5"/>'thad do zhes thun mong du rtsod pa'i skyon med de| mtshan mtshon don chos dag pa ma yin la| blo ngor grub ma grub gnyis mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-24-19" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje pa</rs>'i zhal nas| de lta na 'drer rung 'dzin pa zhes brjod na'ang dngos su 'dres pa 'dzin pa la ma khyab pas des na sgra dang don gnyis shes pa gcig gis 'dzin pa ni 'dres rung 'dzin pa'o||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-24-48" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje paN Di ta</rs>'i zhal nas kyang | mngon sum tshad ma'i mtshan nyid rtog bral ma 'khrul ba nyid yin gyi gzhan mi dgos so zhes gsung ba'i don ni| mtshon bya mngon sum dang tshad ma gnyis yod pa bzhin du der 'jog pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rigs gnyis te| ma 'khrul ba dang tshogs pa'i rtog bral gyis mngon sum du 'jog la| rtog bral dang tshogs pa'i ma 'khrul bas tshad mar 'jog pa la dgongs so||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-38-34" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re| khyab pa med de| gal te yod na rjes dpag la gzhal bya'i rnam pa mi snang bar thal| gzhal bya las dngos su ma skyes pa'i phyir gsung ba'i skyon med de| gal te snang na rjes dpag snang bas 'jug pa'i tshad mar <lb n="14b3"/>thal ba dang | rjes dpag snang yul la ma 'khrul ba'i tshad mar yang 'gyur ro||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-39-18" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> gzugs 'dzin gyi yul de la sgra yod pa'ang ma yin| sgra de'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin yang des gzugs 'dzin ma bskyed du chug na'ang sgra tha dad ldan par yod pa gang gis 'gog |de ma bkag par gzugs 'dzin sgra las ma skyes par mi 'grub po zer na| skyon med de| spyir de la sgra yod pa <lb n="14b8"/>tsam 'gog pa ma yin gyi gzugs 'dzin gyi yul de la sgra tha dad ldan pa ltar rung ma rang ldog sgra yin pa 'gog pa yin la| de ltar na ma dmigs pa khegs so||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2609-51-11" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bdag nyid chen po</rs> na re| gzhan <lb n="15b5"/>yang don ni nyer sbyor la sogs thal 'gyur gyi dbang shes rtog bral du bsgrub par thal ste| rtsa ba'i sbyor ba thal sbyor yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa'i skyon med de dngos su thal ba brjod kyang | dbang shes sgra don 'dre rung 'dzin pa 'gog pa la brda' dran sngon du ma song ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i rgyu'am khyab byed mi dmigs pa'i don 'phen byed yin pa'i phyir ro||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2609-52-49"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig</rs> de ni ma nges te| a (rya?) gar bar <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5559">bod</rs> du 'ongs ma thag la chos bzhi so sor 'dzin pa med kyang don <lb n="16b2"/>sbyor gyi rtog pa yod pa yin te | bya ba gzhan btang nas gzhan len pa'i phyir zer na | <rs type="person" ana="" ref="db:">gnyal pa yab sras</rs><!--probably gNyal zhig db 3887-->  na re | chos bzhi so sor 'dzin nus kyi stong ba rtags su 'god pas skyon med zer yang | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">bdag nyid chen po</rs> na re| ar gsar <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5559">bod</rs> du 'ongs ma thag la ji srid chos bzhi so sor 'dzin par med pa de srid du de sdom nas 'dzin pa'i don sbyor gyi rtog pa'ang med par thal | ji srid chos bzhi sdom nas 'dzin pa'i don sbyor gyi rtog pa yod pa de srid du chos bzhi so sor 'dzin <lb n="16b3"/>pa yang yod ces gsung ba ni 'thad par mthong ngo ||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2609-55-16"><lb n="18b6"/>par byas pa des dran par 'gyur ba'i phyir zhe na| []de'i lan la| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">bdag nyid chen po</rs> na re| ba lang gi sgra chos can| ma mthong ba'i don nye ba las dran par 'gyur ba ma yin te ma mthong [\[]pa'i [;]ba'i [\]]don dang brda'i 'brel med par thal| rang bzhin 'brel pa'ang med pa'i phyir ro gsung ba ltar na| ba lang gtan nas ma mthong zhing ba men gyi steng du srog chags 'di 'dra ba'i ba lang zhes pa'i dud 'gro yod do ces brda' goms pa la brten nas phyis ba men mthong ba <lb n="18b7"/>na ba lang gi sgra dran pa mi srid par thal lo||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-25-19" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje paṇ ṭi ta</rs> ni mngon sum 'gros gsum pa yin te| don gang zhig [\[23a2\]]'dzin pa na kha phyir bltas la dbang shes dang yid shes dus mnyam pa gnyis dang | nang du de dag myong ba'i rang rig dang gsum mo||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-39-43" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tstsha ba</rs> ltar na| tshad ma snga ma dbang shes chos can| gzhan la nges kyi tshad ma kho nar thal| rang yul la tshad ma'i bya ba rdzogs pa tshad ma gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir|</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2609-56-24"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">yab sras rnams</rs> na re| dpyad bya mngon gyur ma yin par thal ba dang | dpyod byed shes pa'i khyad par tshad mas ma grub par thal ba gnyis las| []dang po la| thal ba chos gsum las| dang po ni| longs spyod byed kyi shes pa chos can| longs spyad bya thams cad mngon gyur ma yin par thal| longs spyod byed kyi shes pa mngon sum tshad mas <lb n="30a4"/>ma grub pa'i phyir ro||[]gnyis pa gtan tshigs ni khas blangs khyab pa ma grub ste| spyod byed shes pa mi gsal zhing rtag pa'i phyir mngon sum tshad mas ma grub kyang | spyad bya gsal zhing mi rtag pa'i phyir mngon gyur yin no zhe na| shes rig yul la longs spyod pa mi srid par thal ces pa yang gi sgras bstan no||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-26-03" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892"> chos rje [\[]paṇ ḍi ta'i [;]paṇḍi ta</rs>'i [\]]zhal nas| rnal 'byor mngon sum gang yin pa tshad ma yin te| mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro|| hes gsung ba ltar rtogs par bya'o||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-26-48" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><lb n="32b7"/>dag pa'i don la goms par byed pa'i rten brtan zhing | goms pa ngang gis khyad par du 'gyur ba bsgom pa'i phyir| dper na chags yul goms pa bzhin| de'i chos can ni rang rig gis grub la| bsgrub bya'i chos ni 'byung rung mi bsgom pa la yang yod cing 'byung nges bsgom pa la yang med pas [\[]gags [;]gegs [\]]med cing bsgom pa'i yan lag dang ma bral na 'byung nges yin te| rgyu tshogs pa grangs tshang gis [\[]gags [;]gegs [\]]med na 'bras bu 'byung nges dpag nus pa <lb n="32b8"/>bzhin no|| zhes <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje</rs>s gsung ngo ||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2610-15-09"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">yab sras </rs> rtog bral dang ma 'khrul ba <lb n="33b3"/>so sor 'chad mod| 'on kyang 'dir yang dag pa'i don mthong ste goms pa mthar thug pa la brten nas yang dag pa'i don gsal bar snang bar grub pa na rtog bral dang ma 'khrul ba grub sde gcig pas| 'dir dngos su rtog bral du bsgrub pa ni gzhung gi dgongs pa yin par mngon no||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2609-56-59"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">yab sras</rs> rnams na re| brtsod pa'i lan du| yang dag gnyis su bstan| yang dag gnyis yod pa'i phyir ltar snang gnyis su <lb n="35a7"/>bstan| ltar snang gnyis yod pa'i phyir 'khrul pa ltar snang gi rigs logs su dbye ba dang gsum zhes gsung ngo ||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2609-58-08"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">yab sras rnams</rs> na re| gzhal bya ni phyi rol gyi don bden pa yin la| tshad ma ni 'dra ba chos gsum ste| ngo bo myong rtogs kyi bdag nyid rnam pa'i khyad par myong bya'i rnam pa shar ba nus pa'i khyad par myong bya la <lb n="36b"/> nges pa'i shes pa 'dren nus so||[]'bras bu ni gzhal bya phyi rol gyi don rtogs pa'o||[]zhes gsung ba ni| mi 'thad de|</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2609-59-40"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">yab sras rnams</rs> na re| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">kho bo cag</rs>  theg pa chen po pa yang tha snyad tshad 'bras kyi tshul 'di khyod mdo sde pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'dod pa yin no zhes gsung ba ni| mi bden te| rigs pas de kho na'i don yongs su tshol ba'i skabs su rigs pa dor nas grub mtha'i rjes su 'brang ba ni| bya ba phal pa la chags pa zhes bya ba smad pa'i gnas su <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">slob dpon</rs> gyis kyang gsungs shing | gzhung na'ang | gzung dang 'dzin pa rig <lb n="40b2"/>pa rnams||[]ces theg pa chen po pas tha snyad tshad 'bras kyi rnam bzhag 'khrul pa'i shes pa la ji ltar snang bzhin du rnam par bzhag gi |grub mtha'i rjes su zhugs nas bzhag pa ni ma yin no||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2610-00-38"><lb n="42b6"/>tshad ma'i gzhal bya gang yin ce na| <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">yab sras rnams</rs> na re| shes pa de mdo sde pa ltar du phyi rol gyi don de dang 'dra'am| rnam rig pa ltar don snang gi bag chags dang 'dra yang rung zer ba ltar na| don snang gi bag chags gzhal bya mngon gyur du thal| don rig mngon sum gyi gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir|[]des na rnam bzhag de ni rigs pa'i ra ba las [\[]rgal [;]'gal [\]]ba yin no||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2610-01-36"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">yab sras rnams</rs> na re| shu lo ka gcig po 'dis dbu ma'i lta ba bsgrubs pa yin no zhes gsungs pa ni| dbu ma'i lta ba la sbyar du <lb n="43b3"/>mi rung [\[]pa [;]ba [\]]ma yin mod| sems tsam rnam med pa'i gzung 'dzin dang rnam pa bden pa 'gog pa'i skabs yin par shin tu gsal te| brtsod [\[-]pa [\]]spang na yang | sems tsam rnam med pa'i grub mtha' la rtsod pa spangs kyi| dbu ma pa la brtsod pa spang bar mi snang ba'i phyir ro||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2610-15-55"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">'phags pa yab sras</rs> [\[]kyis [;]kyi [\]]gzhung la nges par byed pas der lta bar bya'o||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2610-02-13"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:">yab sras rnams</rs> na re| rtags kyi mtshan gzhi lhan cig dmigs nges ni tshad mas grub| don dam par rang bzhin tha dad yod med dngos 'gal du nges| don dam par rang bzhin tha dad la| snga phyi ba dang dus mnyam pa gnyis las| snga phyi ba la| lhan cig tsam khegs pa na lhan cig dmigs nges khegs la|<lb n="44b3"/>dus mnyam pa la ni| lhan cig dmigs nges 'gog pa la 'brel pa med pa rtags su 'god la|[ \[]gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig ni dngos su 'brel pa med pa'i phyir zhes 'god to||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-31-25" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><lb n="5"/>6a8\]]pa thams cad ltar rung mi dmigs par sdud de| dpe la ltar rung du grub pa gcig 'gog pa'i phyir| dgag rtags thams cad dpe gcig gi steng du gtan la dbab tu rung ba'i phyir ro zhes <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">sa skya pa </rs>gsung ngo ||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-28-14" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje pa</rs>| log [\[]rtogs [;]rtog [\]]gnyis kyi gnyen por rtags rnam pa gnyis gsungs so||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-28-39" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje sa skya pa</rs>'i gsung las| chos can brjod pa'i sgra ni bye brag go bar byed pa'i brda yin la| chos brjod kyi sgra ni spyi go bar byed pa'i brda yin gsung ngo ||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" xml:id="exX0062023-05-2610-16-57"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs>  gzhan gyis khas blangs pa gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur na| <rs type="person">phyogs kyi glang po yab sras</rs> kyis gzhan [\[]gyi [;]gyis [\]]khas blangs pa'i rtags kyis chos gzhan mi 'dod pa thal bar 'phen pa mi 'thad par 'gyur ro zhe na| skyon med de| de ni khyab bya'i chos gzhan gyi rtog pas kun nas brtags nas khas blangs <lb n="93a4"/>pas khyab byed kyi chos mi 'dod pa thal bar sgrub pa ste 'phen pa yin te| khyab bya ni khyab byed med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes ston pa| dper na phyogs gcig la mtshon na| bye brag pas ba glang gi spyi rdzas gcig yul dus rang bzhin tha dad kyi gsal ba ba lang du ma la dus cig char du 'brel bar don la yod ces dam bcas so||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-215-29-09" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892"> chos rje paṇṭi ta</rs>| ba lang gi spyi du mar thal| zhes bkod nas ci'i phyir zhe <lb n="93b6"/>na| gang yul dus rang bzhin du ma la 'brel pa de du ma yin te| dper na sor mo du ma la 'brel pa'i sen mo bzhin no||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-29-45" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje ṇḍi ta</rs> ni| dngos su 'gal ba brjod pa mi <lb n="142a9"/>rtag pa rtag zhes brjod pa lta bu dang | shugs la 'gal [\[-]ba [\]]brjod pa rtag pa byed pa po yin zhes brjod pa lta bu yin zhes gsung ngo ||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="exX062023-02-2315-43-12" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4576">bdag nyid chen po dbu ma pa shes rab 'bum</rs>  gyis sbyar ba las | de nyid brjod bya'i don zab cing rgya che ba rnams ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas de las khyad par du byar med kyang rjod byed kyi tshig brling zhing 'ga' zhig ngag don du mdzad de | gzhung la ma sbyar ba dang phal cher rgya 'grel ltar sbyar ba mang bas las dang po ba rnams [\[]kyis [;]kyi [\]]blos <lb n="153a2b"/>lang dka' bar gyur pa dang | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4576">bdag nyid chen po</rs> de nyid kyang 'di la snon 'brid cung zad 'dra dang | zhu dag cig dgos par 'dug ste | zhes yang yang gsung ba rjes su dran pa dang | gzhan yang sde snod 'dzin pa mang zhig gis bskul ba'i ngor 'jug pa bde zhing brjod bya'i don rnams ma tshang ba med par ston la |[ \[]brjod [;]rjod [\]]byed kyi tshig zin pa tsam gyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i sde snod 'dzin <lb n="153a3"/>pa ltar 'gyur ba 'di ni | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4576">bdag nyid chen po dbu ma pa yab sras</rs> kyi bka' drin la brten nas lung rigs man ngag gi gnad rnams phyin ci ma log par khong du chud cing | 'chad pa dang | rtsod pa dang | rtsom pa'i tshul la blo gros kyi snang ba yongs su rgyas pa'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5518">bo dong ba 'jam pa'i dbyangs sho re pa</rs>s| <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4369"> dpal ldan brag ram gyi gtsug lag khang chen po</rs><!--assumed to be the same as brag ram  mgon khang-->r <lb n="153a4"/>nye bar sbyar ba 'di re shig rdzogs sho ||</seg>
source: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex76092024-09-1914-32-57" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work">dbus mtha'i 'grel pa dbu ma'i snang ba</rs> 'di la don 3 : mtshan **bstan bcos dang, 'jug yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya 'o ||</seg>
source: 3_076_09_I_R_M_Anonymous_dbu mtha grel dbu ma snang ba.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex76092023-10-251" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5225">dbus mtha'i 'grel pa dbu ma'i gnang ba zhes (bya ba bsdus) don</rs> rdzogs s+ho ||</seg>
source: 3_076_09_I_R_M_Anonymous_dbu mtha grel dbu ma snang ba.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex80220240828_1" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4501"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db3774">tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i 'grel bshad yi ge dang rigs pa'i gnad la 'jug pa'i shes rab kyi 'od zer</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="id:3831">rigs par smra ba'i dge' slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s sbyar ba || rdzogs s+hyo ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50042023-10-13-094027" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4841"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3742">bslab btus</rs> kyi khrid <abbr>gzhugs</abbr></rs> so || <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3727">spyod 'jug</rs> gi khrid bzhugs so ||</seg>
source: 2_050_04 blab btus dang spyod 'jug gi khrid.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50042023-09-09-1010" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="7b2"/>ldog gnyis su bsdus pa'o || <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4841">spyod 'jug 'khor lo lta bu'i lam mdor bsdus pa</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6836"><!--maybe referring to sKyo ston-->lha btsun pa</rs>s <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4399">mchad kha dgon pa</rs>r bkod pa'o || I thI || ||</seg>
source: 2_050_04 blab btus dang spyod 'jug gi khrid.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50042023-09-0814-59-42" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3742">bslab btus <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3727">spyod 'jug</rs> gi sgom don</rs> gyi brgyud pa ni | 
         <rs type="deity">'jaM dpal</rs> gyis 
         <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3743">zhi ba'i lha</rs> la gsungs | 
         des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6837">dge slong e la d+ha ri</rs><anchor xml:id="a1"/>la | 
         des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6838">dpa'o <abbr>rdo rje</abbr></rs> la | 
         des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6839">ma hA rad</rs> <note type="gloss">tshe grub pa</note><lb n="7b4"/>na la | 
         des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6840">bla ma gser gling pa</rs> <note type="gloss">chos kyi grags pa</note> la | 
         des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3745">ti pang ka shri snya na</rs> la | 
         des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6340">nag tsho tshul khriMs rgyal ba</rs> <anchor xml:id="a2"/> la| des 'dir <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">ston byang seng</rs> la| de <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">saNG yon tshul<anchor xml:id="a3"/> </rs>la| <lb n="7b5"/> des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">khu ston zla ba'i rgyal po<anchor xml:id="a4"/></rs> la| des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">bshes gnyen skor stag can pa<anchor xml:id="a5"/></rs> la| des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">slob dpon rgyal tsha</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">spu gu do ba</rs></note><anchor xml:id="a6"/> la | 
         des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3859">lha nyid</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:3859">spyil pu ba</rs></note><anchor xml:id="a7"/>| 
         des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6841">'dre lhas on po</rs><anchor xml:id="a8"/> la | 
         des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">bla ma rnar thang <lb n="7b6"/>pa brgyad par byon pa</rs><note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4052">smon laM tshul khriMs</rs></note> la gnang | 
         des <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458">btsun pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458">ze'u</rs></note> la gnang ste yi ger bris pa'o ||</seg>
source: 2_050_04 blab btus dang spyod 'jug gi khrid.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex50042003-8-9" status="reviewed"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">daM pas sngags pa snar thang gi dben gnas</rs><abbr>su</abbr> phyag dpe dngos la<!--read: las--> bris shing zhus <abbr>dag go</abbr> || <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:6458">ze'u</rs>'i dpe'o ||</seg>
source: 2_050_04 blab btus dang spyod 'jug gi khrid.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex35022023-08-0308-59-37" status="reviewed"><lb n="1a2"/> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3880">gro ston bdud rtsi grags</rs> <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3880"><rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">snar thang</rs> mkhan po</rs></note> mdzad pa'i <lb n="1a3"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4712"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3727">spyod <abbr>'jug</abbr></rs> <abbr>gi</abbr> 'grel pa</rs>'o || <note type="gloss">snyiMs <unclear>yas</unclear> pa</note> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5891">bdag suNya</rs>'i dpe'o ||</seg>
source: 2_035_02_ bDud rtsi grags_ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i 'grel pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex35022023-08-0308-50-15" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3727">byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa</rs> ni spyi don 3 gyis bstan gi bshad par bya ba legs par bshad pa yin_no || mkhas pa'i rjes su  <lb n="74a7"/> <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4712"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3727">byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jug pa</rs>'i tshig gi don zhib tu rnam par 'byed pa dga' ba rgya mtsho</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3880">shag kya'i dge slong <lb n="74a8"/>a rmi ta kir ti</rs>s bkrol zin to || dge par gyur cig <!--written without tsheg or space between the syllables-->|</seg>
source: 2_035_02_ bDud rtsi grags_ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i 'grel pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1032023-04-241203" status="reviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4427"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3697">dpal mngon par <abbr>rtogs</abbr> pa</rs>'i dka' ba'i gnas bshad pa</rs> <rs type="person" ref="db:3784" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">lo tsA ba <abbr>rin chen</abbr> bzang po</rs>s mdzad pa <abbr>bzhugs s+ho</abbr> ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1032023-04-24.12.10" status="reviewed"><rs type="deity">sgrol ma</rs>'i zhabs kyi rdul la reg pa yi ||         
         <rs type="person" ref="db:3745" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">mar me mdzad </rs>ces bya ba'i bla ma la || 
         gus pas <abbr>phyag 'tshal</abbr> <rs type="person" ref="db:3745" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">de </rs>yis bshad pa <lb n="1b3"/> yi ||
         <abbr>gdams ngag</abbr> 'di ni <rs type="person" ref="db:3784" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">bdag</rs> gis bri bar bya ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1032023-05-241450" status="reviewed"><rs type="person" ref="db:3784" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">bdag</rs> ni blo dman brjed par 'gyur ba yi ||
         dogs pa'i 'jigs pas <rs type="person" ref="db:3745" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">bla ma</rs>'i gdams <lb n="13b3"/> ngag bris || 'on kyang bris pa'i bsod <choice><reg>nams</reg><orig>naMs</orig></choice> 'ga' yod na || 'gro ba yang dag lam la gnas par shog ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex1032023-04-241245" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4427"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3697">dpal mngon par rtogs pa</rs>'i bshad pa </rs><rs type="person" ref="db:3745" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">bla ma dpal mar me mdzad <abbr>ye shes</abbr></rs> kyi zhal mnga' nas <abbr>gsungs</abbr> <lb n="13b4"/> pa <rs type="person" ref="db:3784" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">lo tsA ba chen po dge slong <abbr>rin chen</abbr> bzang po</rs>s ma bsnan ma chad par bris pa <abbr>rdzogs s+ho</abbr> ||
      </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex94032023-09-09-12.28" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5354">kyi ston dpal ldan rdor rje</rs>'i phyag dper ||</seg>
source: 4_094_03_lce sgom rdzong pa shes rab rdo rje_Po to baI rnam thar.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex88052023-10-042" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="5302">tshad ma ****</rs> ||</seg>
source: 3_088_05_F_C_NI_M_Chos kyi bzhad pa_tshad ma de kho na nyid nye bar bsdus pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex88052023-10-0425" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[1b1]"/> || <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5302">tshad ma'i de kho na nyid bsdus pa nye bar bsdus pa</rs> zhes bya ba |</seg>
source: 3_088_05_F_C_NI_M_Chos kyi bzhad pa_tshad ma de kho na nyid nye bar bsdus pa.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex88052023-10-043" status="unreviewed"><lb n="20b8-21a3"/><rs type="work">mdo</rs> dang <rs type="work">rnam 'grel</rs> las sogs rigs gzhung du ma dang || 
            myong pa'i stobs dang rtags stobs las 'ongs rigs pa rnams || <lb n="[21a1]"/> rtogs ngan dug chu'i dri mas ma sbags don gyi snying po blangs || gzu' bo'i blo yis don dang don min rnam bshad byas || bsod nams 'di yis 'gro ba ma lus pa ||  kun mkhyen rgyal po myur du thob par shog || </seg>
source: 3_088_05_F_C_NI_M_Chos kyi bzhad pa_tshad ma de kho na nyid nye bar bsdus pa.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex88052023-10-044" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5302">tshad ma sde bdun kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa</rs> | zhes bya ba | <rs type="deity">bde bar gshegs pa</rs>'i bstan pa <hi rendition="#Time">lnga brgya' bdun pa</hi> la [21a2] bab pa'i tshe | <hi rendition="#Time">me mo glang gi lo</hi> la | <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5718">gte' ra bkra shis dbu mang gi dgon pa</rs>r | brtul zhugs kyi khur 'dzin cing | rde (em: sde) snod rab 'byams la mang du thos pa'i shag kya'i dge slong | bla ma mkhas pa chen po<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4098"> rdo rje dbang grags ‹dus rab bco lnga pa'i mi›</rs>kyis sbyar pa las |
               <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4099">shag kya'i dge bsnyen chos kyi bzhad pa</rs>s <rs type="person" ana="">bla ma</rs> rngos las mang du thos te | lo shas tsam [21a3] lon pa'i tshe | <rs type="place">g.yag rde</rs>'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4293">dge bshes thod pa bsod nams seng ge</rs>s gsol ba btab nas | cung zad bsdus pa la dga' ba rnams kyi don du sbyar ba'i | <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5302">tshad ma'i de kho na nyid bsdus ba'i nye bar bsdus pa</rs>| zhes bya ba ||
               ‹2 zhus dag go› rdzogs s+ho |||| **Ti ! || ‹ shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa rtogs pas ›<rs type="work">ye shes</rs> ; ‹ gzhan rgol ba <abbr>thams cad</abbr> tshar gcod pas › <rs type="work">rdo rje</rs> ; ‹ sangs rgyas pa'i grub mtha' dgos pa kun 'byung pas › <rs type="work">rin po che</rs> ; <anchor xml:id="a10"/>
            </seg>
source: 3_088_05_F_C_NI_M_Chos kyi bzhad pa_tshad ma de kho na nyid nye bar bsdus pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml_id="ex88052023-10-045" status="unreviewed"><lb n="[21a4]"/> shag kya'i dge bsnyen <rs type="person" ana=""><!--TODO name ID von chos kyi blo gros in APIS-->chos kyi blo gros</rs> kyis <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4593">bla ma mkhas pa</rs>'i bka' las yang dag pa blangs pa'i chos so|_| I ||rang re'i* slob bu ma gtogs pa rnams la bka' rgya mdzad do||  (sama ya)||'das par (b)ya(s pa) ma yin no ||</seg>
source: 3_088_05_F_C_NI_M_Chos kyi bzhad pa_tshad ma de kho na nyid nye bar bsdus pa.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex4012023-11-24-110036" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3806">shag kya'i dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> kyis | yid 'thun pa'i bshes pa la spring pa <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4466">rin po <lb n="2b4"/> che'i phreng ba lnga bcu pa</rs> zhes bya ba rdzogs s+hyo || || dge'o | bkra shis par gyur cig || dge'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex55022024-09-2010-35-12" status="unreviewed"><milestone unit="section" n="[Cover page (1a)]"/>
        <lb n="[1a] =xxxxx27"/> phyi ma 599<rs type="work">rtsod pa'i riGS pa'i bsdus don</rs> bzhuGS || </seg>
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex55022024-09-2010-35-122" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work">rtsod pa'i rigs pa</rs> la don gsum te ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex55022024-09-2010-35-123" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="">rkang mig</rs> gis tshar bcad kyi gnas nyi shu rtsa gsum smras pa ni 'di lta ste|_‹'di yang › dam bca' la gnod ‹[_]dam bcas pa'i› dam bca' gzhan|_‹[_]'di yang› dam bca' [4b4] dang 'gal dam bcas bsal|_|‹[_]'di la yang › gtan tshigs gzhan dang don gzhan dang |_|‹[_]'brel ba med› don med ‹[_]yi ge'i› don ‹tshogs dang›‹'di la› mi shes don ‹snga phyir› bral ‹[_]de lta na ni›|_|‹[_]yan lag› dus la ma bab ‹dam bca' ba› ‹yang lag›ma tshang ‹gtan tshigs› lhag | ‹*› |
            </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex55022023-10-251" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (6b1–6b2)]"/>
            <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4949">rtsod pa'i rigs pa dam pa'i bsdus don</rs> ni|| smra ba rnams kyi dam pa bla ma la || thos nas dam pa <lb n="[6b2]"/> <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> thob bya'i phyir || dam pa'i rtsod pa la mkhas <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">ral gri</rs>s bkod |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex11162024-09-0411-33-27" status="reviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4546">bla ma mnyes par byed pa'i bsgrub pa</rs> | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3854">dge slong <abbr>blo gros seng ge</abbr>s sbyar</rs> ba'o ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex3042023-11-241" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><milestone unit="section" n="[Colophon (118b2–118b3)]"/>
         <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4462">'phags pa yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa <lb n="[118b3]"/> rnam par bshad pa</rs> <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3806">shAkya'i dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> kyi brjed byang tsam du brjod pa rdzogs so ||||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex61042023-09-26-093717" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5085">bshad mnyan<anchor xml:id="a1"/> la 'jug pa'i sgron ma</rs> 'di | bstan gzhi <rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411">snar thang dgon pa</rs>r sbyang | de yi dge bas 'gro kun gyi || mun sel kun mkhyen thob par shog | <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5085">chos bshad la 'jug pa'i yan lag tshig gi sgron mas don gyi mun pa sel ba</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="3977">shAkya'i dge slong nam mkha' grags</rs> kyis sbyar ba'o || || || dge_so|  |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex6012024-09-1112-55-38" status="unreviewed"><note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ref="" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">shes rab blo gros</rs></note>na re | spangs pa chos<lb n="2b5"/>gsum dang ldan pa de gang zag brgyad las khyad par du byas pa ste | so so'i skye bo dang | bsam brtan dang po nas srid rtse'i bar kyi   phyi rol pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba dang | 'phags pa rgyun du zhugs pa dang | lan cig phyir 'ong pa dang | bya chub sems pa dang | phyir mi 'ong pa dang | dgra' bcom pa dang | rang rgyal ba rnams las so |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex602024-09-1112-54-04" status="unreviewed"><note type="gloss">gzhung 'og ma ma sbyar kyang logs su thob byed pas skyon .... tha dad de bsaM pa phun suM tshogs pa ni thar pa'i  .... gyi dge rtsa bsod naMs bya pa 'dod pa'i  blo yin la ... dang 'bras bu dkon mchog dang bden pa la ...  pa yin no zhes slob dpon .....</note> gzhung 'og ma nas ni phan yon ston par | 'grel par 'chad pa ltar nyid legs par sems ste | mod sde <note type="gloss">du ma</note> nas kyang dal 'byor snyid dka' ba ni chos mang po la 'chad pa'i phyir ro | </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex6012024-09-1112-56-03" status="unreviewed"><lb n="16b3"/>bar 'dod pa'i mi la ga gi brda' ma phrad na zhu' bar 'dod pa'i bsam pa' tsam gyis zhus pa'i go mi chod pa bzhin du | brjod pas khyab po zhes <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ref="" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">'bre'</rs></note>zer ro |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex6012024-09-1112-56-20" status="unreviewed"><note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ref="" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">rngag lo zhes nas rdud gcig...</rs></note> sun 'byin pa dang | sten dang <lb n="16b4"/>gnyen pa dang | sor chud pa'i stobs so |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex6012024-09-1112-56-41" status="unreviewed"><note type="gloss">zangs kar</note> kha cig na re rang bzhin dang bcas pa'i ltung pa tshan tshan du bsdebs te | dpe chung du byas nas rtogs par sla'o |<pb n="19a"/><lb n="19a1"/> | zhes zer ba ni mi 'thad de |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex6012024-09-1112-57-05" status="unreviewed"><lb n="20a3"/>sbyor ba dang dngos bzhi sa 'tshams
          <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ref="" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">lo tsa</rs>s</note>mdzad pa ltar legs par sems so |</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex6012024-09-1112-54-36" status="unreviewed"><note type="gloss">bzhi pa gzhan lugs dgag pa ni</note> | <note type="gloss"><rs type="person" ref="" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">zhang tshes</rs> </note> so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i ngo bo bzhan la gnod ba bzha'i dang bcas pa las ldog pa <lb n="23b6"/>tsam snyen gnas yan chang rten du yang dgos shing | theg pa gang dang yang mi 'gal ba de ni thun mong pa spyi yin la | so so 'i khyad par ni rgyun chags pa dang | gzhan rjes su bsrung pa dang | slar gso' bar rung pa dang | de dag las ldog pa'i sgo nas tha dad pa'i phyir ro |     
         </seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44032023-07-2514-44-07" status="unreviewed"><pb n="1a"/><lb n="1a1"/>phyi<lb n="1a2"/>zha<lb n="1a3"/>45(1)<anchor xml:id="a1"/><lb n="1a4"/>|| <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4765">tshad ma'i spyi skad cung zad bsdus pa</rs> gzhugs pa lags_so dbang hre/hE? ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44032023-07-2514-44-08" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3745">ati sha</rs>'i zhal nas | <quote>mngon suM rjes dpag dgos pa <abbr>med</abbr> || mu stegs rgol ba bzlog pa'i phyir || <lb n="8b4"/> mkhas pa rnams kyis byas pa yin ¦</quote> [Satyadvayāvatāra 13b–d]zhes gsungs so ||||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44032023-07-2514-44-09" status="unreviewed"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4765">tshad ma'i spyi'i skad cung zad bsdus pa</rs> 'di || rigs pa'i tshul la mos pa'i blo yod kyang || <lb n="8b5"/> gzhung la mi 'jug rtsol ba zhan rnaMs la || yig chung bde blag bris pa 'di la gzigs ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex44032023-07-2514-44-10" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5833">gnyag</rs> gis bkod pa ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1415-45-20" status="unreviewed"><pb n="1a"/><lb n="1a1"/>
        <choice><sic/><corr> phyi¶</corr><!--"phyi" is not visible on the image, but the item is classified as phyi zha 15 in the catalogue--></choice> zha¶ 15¶<rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4783">tshad ma'i legs bshad dri med bcud kyi bdud rtsi</rs> zhes bya ba bzhugs so |<!--Title written in dbu can--></seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-115-51-35" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">bdag</rs> gi <abbr>blo gros</abbr> <abbr>dkyil 'khor rab</abbr> rgyas <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5553"><choice><sic>bde</sic><corr>sde</corr></choice> bdun</rs> ri<abbr>gs</abbr> pa'i rlung <abbr>gi gzhon</abbr> sa can || 
               don <abbr>gnyis</abbr> 'gros <abbr>gnyis</abbr> la rten don bzang tshig le<abbr>gs</abbr> dgongs don 'dab stong kha <abbr>dbye ba'i</abbr>||<lb n="1b4"/> blo ldan gzur gnas <abbr>don gnyer</abbr> gnod rung|rgyung <abbr>'dul bya</abbr> rkang drug ldan pa'i tsho<abbr>gs</abbr> rnaMs kun|| 
                       <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3771"><abbr>rigs</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <choice><orig>dbang phyug)</orig><reg>dbang phyug</reg></choice> <choice><orig>°°°</orig><reg>phyogs glang (?)</reg></choice></rs> 
               <!--TODO Q unclear whether grags pa=Dharmakirti db:3773--> gra<abbr>gs</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> le<abbr>gs</abbr> bshad dri med <abbr>bcud kyis</abbr> tshiM par bgyi ||||</seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-01-30" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:yul"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> na re | yul gyi mtshan nyid ni | 'dzin stangs ma 'khrul ba'i blos rig bya zhes zer ro ||</seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-03-47" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">'ga' zhig</rs> na re|_dbang shes la zla gnyis su snang ba de yul ma yin te|_rang spyi gang yang [\[p.124-8\]] <lb n="1b8"/>ma yin pa'i phyir te|_don byed mi nus pa'i phyir dang |_sgra rtog gi snang yul ma [xx]lo|_|de la khyab pa med de|_'go du bstan la 'bebs so|_|rtsa bar yang khyab pa med de|_zla ba gnyis snang gi dbang shes chos can|_blo ma yin par thal|_mngon rjes gang yang ma yin pa'i phyir|_khyab pa khas blangs so|_|</seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-04-13" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kho</rs> na re|_mi mtshungs te|_mngon rjes gang yang min pa'i blo ni yod la|_rang spyi gang yang min pa'i yul ni med pa'i phyir te|_yul yin [\[p.124-9\]] <lb n="1b9"/> na gzhal bya yin dgos pa'i phyir zhes zer ro||</seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-05-20" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> na re|_gtso bo'i [xx]gzhal bya yin par thal|_yul yin pa'i phyir te|[ xx]pa'i snang yul yin pa'i phyir|_'dod par mi nus te|_mngon sum gyi gzhal bya yang ma yin la|_rjes dpag gi gzhal bya yang ma yin pa'i phyir|_|rtags dang po grub ste|_dngos por med pa'i phyir|_khyab ste|_med la dbang skyes blo min te|_zhes 'byung ba'i phyir|_rtags phyi ma [\[p.125-1\]] <pb n="2a"/><lb n="2a1"/> ma grub na|_der thal|_rtags kyi bsgrub bya ma yin pa'i phyir|_de chos can du bzung na phyogs chos grub dus [\[]sgrub [;]bsgrub [\]]bya grub zin la|_bsgrub bya'i chos su bzung na khyab 'brel grub dus bsgrub bya grub zin dgos pa'i phyir|_'on kyang [xx]nyams su myong ba'i rang rig mngon sum gyis shugs la grub pa'i phyir|_gtso bo'i sgra don de tshad mas [\[]bzhal [;]gzhal [\]]ba'am rtogs pa ni ma yin kyang tshad mas grub [\[p.125-2\]]pa'i phyir|
         <lg>
            <l xml:space="preserve">med pa ma yin sgro 'dogs phyir|</l>
         </lg>
         zhes sogs kyi <rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference">gzhung</rs> dang yang mi 'gal lo zhes bya'o ||
         </seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-36-51" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> na re|_sgra rtag 'dzin gyi rtog pa ni|_sgra rtag pa'i rnam par skyes pa yin la|_de la snang yul lam [\[]bzung [;]gzung [\]]yul med de|_zla ba gnyis snang gi dbang shes zla gnyis kyi rnam par skyes pa yin gyi [\[p.126-5\]]<lb n="2b5"/>de la snang yul du gyur pa'i zla gnyis ni med pa bzhin no|_| des na bum 'dzin rtog pa yang bum pa'i rnam par skyes nas log pa du ma'i nang nas bum min tsam las log pa'i bum tsam gyi ldog pa de nyid yul du byed cing |_de yang rang mtshan du ma grub pas don la spyad na bzhed pa ni blo'i 'dzin stangs tsam zhig du zad pas|[ xxx]blo'i 'dzin stangs yin|[ xxxxx\[p.126-6\]]bshad do|_|des na rtog pa la phyi rol du snang ba ni rtog pa'i gzung rnam yin la|_don spyi ni blo sgro btags pa tsam du zad pas med do zhes zer ro|_|</seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-08-10" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kho bo</rs>'i bla ma</rs>'i gsung sgros ste |_'di ltar bum 'dzin rtog pa la bum par snang ba ni bum 'dzin rtog pa'i gzung rnam yin te|_bum pa de khyod yin pa'i phyir|_bum 'dzin rtog pa'i gzung rnam ni|_bum 'dzin rtog pa la bum par snang ba min te|_yin na sngon 'dzin [\[p.126-7\]]<lb n="2b7"/>mngon sum gyi bzung rnam yang sngon 'dzin mngon sum la sngon por snang ba'i phyir ro|_|des na rtog pa la phyi rol du snang ba ni don spyi yin gyi|_rtog pa'i gzung rnam ma yin no|_|de bzhin du zla ba gnyis snang gi dbang shes la zla gnyis su snang ba'i rnam pa 'di ni dngos por med kyang dbang shes 'di'i snang yul yin gyi [\[]bzung [;]gzung [\]]rnam yin la|_sngon 'dzin mngon sum la sngon por snang ba 'di ni sngon po rang mtshan yin gyi|_sngon 'dzin mngon sum gyi [\[]bzung [;]gzung [\]]rnam ni ma yin te|_de bzung rnam yin zhing |_de las [\[p.126-8\]]gzhan du phyi rol gyi don [xxx ]'dod na mi 'thad de|_de 'dra'i phyi rol gyi don yod na mngon sum gyis dmigs rung la [xx]dmigs pa'i phyir dang |_<rs type="school">grangs can pa</rs> 'dod pa ltar gyi yul bar du blo'am chen po zhes pa'i dngos po khas len rigs par yin pa'i phyir dang |_sngon 'dzin mngon sum de rang gi gzung rnam sngon po ma yin bzhin du sngon por snang na 'khrul shes su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro|_|des na sngon por snang ba de ni yul yin la|_gzung rnam ni rang la sngon po'i rnam pa shar nas sngon po [\[p.126-9\]]<lb n="2b9"/>la kha phyir phyogs ste 'jal byed du zhugs pa'i blo nyid la bzhed do|_|'dir ni blo rang la sngon po'i rnam pa shar zer kyang blo rang gis sngon po mthong ba la byed dgos pa 'dra'o|_|'dis rtog pa dang zla ba gnyis snang sogs kyi bzung rnam yang shes par bya'o||
         </seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-10-02" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kho bo</rs>'i bla ma</rs>'i gsung sgros ni|_rigs par ldan yang <rs type="work">gzhung</rs> de dag gi dgongs pa ltar na|_<rs type="school">mdo sde pa</rs>'i grub [\[]'tha' [;]mtha' [\]]ni de ltar yin nam snyam du sems so|_|</seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-38-24" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig na re</rs>|_rtog pa'i snang yul mi 'thad de|_rtog pa ni yul la sel pas 'jug gi snang bas mi 'jug pa'i phyir zhes zer ro|_|</seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-39-15" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> na re|_don spyi rtog pa'i gzung yul du mi 'thad de|[ \[]mthad [;]'thad [\]]na bum pa'i don spyi chos can|_bum 'dzin rtog pa yul gyi rnam pa can du skyed byed yin par thal|_bum 'dzin rtog pa'i [\[]bzung [;]gzung [\]]yul yin pa'i phyir|_khyab ste|
         <lg>
            <l xml:space="preserve">rgyu'i dngos po ma [\[]rtogs [;]gtogs [\]]pa|_gzung ba zhes bya gzhan ci'ang med|_<?oxy_comment_start comment="=PV 3.224ab"?><?oxy_comment_end?></l>
         </lg>
         ces dang |_
         <lg>
            <l xml:space="preserve">[]shes pa'i rnam pa 'jog [\[p.128-7\]]nus pa'i rgyu nyid la ni gzung bar shes </l>
         </lg>
         zhes 'byung bas so zhe na </seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-40-54" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> ni|_bum 'dzin rtog pa'i snang yul dang zhen tshul gnyis las|
         dang po la|_dang po la bum pa ni bum pa'i mi rtag pa las tha dad par snang ste|_de gnyis rtog pa la so sor snang ba'i phyir ro|_|bum pa rnams la rjes su 'gro ba'i gcig pur yang snang bas don la tha dad rjes 'gro stong ba dang mi mthun zhing |_bum par snang ba ni don dang [\[p.129-9\]] <lb n="4a9"/>mthun no|_|zhen tshul yang de kho na ltar yin pas tha dad rjes 'gros stong ba dang mi mthun zhing |_bum par zhen pa tsam don dang mthun no zhes zer ro|_|</seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-41-46" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:tshad_maI_yul"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> na re|_rang [\[p.130-6\]]<lb n="4b6"/>mtshan gyi mtshan nyid ni|_rtog pas [\[]rtags [;]btags [\]]pa tsam ma yin par yul rang ngos nas grub pa dang |_spyi mtshan gyi mtshan nyid ni|_yul rang ngos nas ma grub par rtog pas [\[]rtags [;]btags [\]]pa'i chos zer ba'ang </seg>

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-45-47" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:tshad_maI_yul"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs>_|rang mtshan gyi mtshan nyid ni|_khyod rang snang yul du byed pa'i blo la chos so so ba gnyis la rjes su mi 'gro bar snang ba dang |_spyi mtshan gyi mtshan nyid ni|_khyod rang snang yul du byed pa'i blo la [\[p.130-8\]]<lb n="4b8"/> chos so so ba gnyis la rjes su 'gro bar snang ba'o zhe na</seg>

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-45-49" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:tshad_maI_yul"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs>_|rang mtshan gyi mtshan nyid ni|_don dam par don byed nus pa zhes pa yang </seg>

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-46-36" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> na re|_bum pa lta bu ni rang mtshan yin te|_don byed nus pa'i phyir|_spyi mtshan yin te|_gsal ba rnams la rjes 'gro byed pa'i phyir zhes 'dod do|_|</seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-47-14" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs>_|de gnyis 'gal bas bum pa ni spyi mtshan yin gyi rang mtshan ma yin te|_yin na rdzas su grub dgos la|_de lta na bum pa chos can|_khyod da nang gi bum pa dang rdzas gcig yin par thal|_khyod dang de gnyis rdzas su grub|_rdzas tha dad ma yin pa'i phyir|_khyab ste|
         <lg>
            <l xml:space="preserve">'di las gzhan pa'i rnam pa'ang med|_</l>
         </lg>
        zhes 'byung ba'i phyir|_rtags ma grub na|_gsal ba las spyi rdzas gzhan 'dod pa bye brag pa'i lugs khas blangs par [\[p.131-7\]]<lb n="5a7"/>'gyur la|_de yang blo ma 'khrul ba la snang rung ma dmigs pas khegs te|
         <lg>
            <l xml:space="preserve">[]de las spyi gzhan tha dad pa|_</l>
            <l xml:space="preserve">[]yod min tha dad blo med phyir|_</l>
         </lg>
         zhes sogs so|_|</seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-18-11" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo tsha ba chen po</rs> dang | <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">chos rje sa paN</rs> sogs kyis kyang dngos po yod med rtsam [\[]ba'i [;]pa'i [\]]gzhi ni dngos po de nyid yin pas|_dngos po med pa la med par rtogs pas dngos po de nyid nam mkha' dngos med du 'jal ba'i rjes dpag gi 'jug yul yin zhes bzhed do||</seg>

            <l xml:space="preserve">[]'khrul rgyu can rnams gzhan las nges|_<!--RT VIII.64 – rang gyi lan--></l>
         </lg>

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex46032024-08-2715-58-01" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3892">sa paN</rs> gyis du ba la sbyar te|_

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-20-25" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gi lugs kyi rtags 'dzin sems ngos 'dzin pa la|_<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780">chos mchog</rs> gi <rs type="work">'grel pa</rs>r rtsod lan ji ltar byung ba'i tshul|_de la <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo ts+tsha ba chen po</rs>s skyon brjod mdzad pa'i tshul|[ \[p.163-1\]]<lb n="21a1"/>khyad par rtogs pa'i blo des gzhan la ltos med du byas pa rtag pa la med par rtogs la|_de'i shugs la byas pa mi rtag pa kho na la yod par rtogs nus pa'i phyir ro|_|
        </seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-21-35" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><lb n="22a1"/><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo ts+tsha ba</rs>s <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780">chos mchog</rs> la skyon brjod mdzad pa rnams mi 'thad par bstan nas <rs type="person" ref="db:4593">rang</rs> lugs bzhag pa'o|_|</seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex46032024-08-2716-12-36" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo [\[]tsha [;]ts+tsha [\]]ba</rs>s skyon [\[]rjod 'dzad [;]brjod mdzad [\]]tshul ni|_mi 'thad pa'i skyon yang so na gnas te|_rtags 'dzin sems mi slu ba yin na mi slu ba spyir [\[p.165-5\]]<lb n="22a5"/>tshad ma'i mtshan nyid yin pas mngon sum yin nam rjes dpag yin|_dang po mi 'thad de|_mngon sum ltar snang du bshad pa'i phyir|_gnyis pa mi 'thad de|_mngon sum ltar snang [\[]mchad [;]'chad [\]]pa'i skabs su rtags rjes dpag las logs su bshad pa'i phyir ro|_|</seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-13-27" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:unnamed_reference" ref="db:4593">kha cig</rs> na re|_
            <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3786">lo ts+tsha ba</rs>s <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3780">chos mchog</rs> la rtags 'dzin sems tshad ma yin na [\[p.165-7\]]<lb n="22a7"/>mngon sum dang rjes dpag gang yin
         zhes 'dri ba dang |_mngon sum yin na mngon sum ltar snang du bshad pa mi 'thad par thal zhes pa 
            mi rigs te|_rtags 'dzin sems de la mngon sum rjes dpag gnyis kha yod pas mtha' gcig tu ma nges [\[]zhing [;]shing [\]]|_mngon sum ltar snang du bshad du mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhes pa'i lan ni de bas kyang mi 'thad de|_rtags 'dzin sems chos can|_khyod mngon sum ltar snang du bshad pa mi 'thad par thal|_khyod yin [\[]du [;]par [\]]gyur pa'i [\[p.165-8\]]<lb n="22a8"/>mngon sum dang rjes dpag gnyis kha yod pa'i phyir|_mngon sum dang rjes dpag gnyis kha 'du ba'i rtags 'dzin sems ril po yang mngon sum ltar snang du 'chad rigs na|_blo tsam po'ang mngon sum ltar snang du 'chad dgos par ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro|_|</seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" xml:id="ex46032023-02-1416-23-54" type="excerpt" status="unreviewed"><rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3831">slob dpon cha pa</rs> na re|[ \[]rims kyis [;]rim gyis [\]]don byed pas stong ste| <lb n="25b2"/>skad cig du mas stong ba'i phyir|_cig char don byed pas stong ste|_skad cig gis stong ba'i phyir|_de dag gi phyogs chos ni rtag 'dzin nyams su myong ba'i rang rig mngon sum gyis grub ste|_'di ltar rtag pa ni|
         <lg>
            <l xml:space="preserve">[]<rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference">chos kyi grags [\[]pa [;]pa</rs>s [\]]mi rtag pa|_</l>
            <l xml:space="preserve">[]log la rtag pa'i tha snyad mdzad|_</l>
         </lg>
        zhes gsungs pa dang yang mthun par skad cig mas stong ba tsam la bzhed cing |_rang rig gis yul can skad cig mas stong bar 'dzin pa'i 'dzin stangs dngos su [\[p.172-3\]<lb n="25b3"/>\[]bzhal [;]gzhal [\]]ba'i shugs la yul skad cig mas stong bar grub pa na|_de'i dngos kyi log phyogs skad cig mas khyad par du byas pa'i skad cig dang skad cig du mas stong bar yang grub pa yin no|_|
        ldog khyab ni skad cig ma mngon sum gyis mi grub pa'i gzhan gyis [\[]rims kyis [;]rim gyis [\]]don byed pa la skad cig [\[]pa [;]ma [\]]du mas khyab pa sogs yang mngon sum gyis mi 'grub mod|_rjes dpag gis grub ste|_'di ltar [\[]rims kyis [;]rim gyis [\]]don byed pa ni dus [\[p.172-4\]]<lb n="25b4"/>gnyis pa dang |_de las gzhan du'ang 'bras bu skyed pa yin zhing |_cig char don byed pa ni|_dus gnyis pa kho nar 'bras bu skyed pa yin no|_|
         []de lta na dus 'di dang dus gzhan tsam chos can|_dngos po tha dad yin pas khyab ste|_'gal ba'i chos ldan gyi dngos po yin pas khyab pa'i phyir|_dper na sngon po dang sngo min gyi dngos po bzhin no|_|
         khyab pa ni dpe'i steng du mngon sum gyis grub bo|_|phyogs chos kyang dus snga phyi tsam la 'bras bu dang nye [\[p.172-5\]]ring sogs 'du ba 'gal bas khyab pa mngon sum gyis nges so|_|
         []de lta na dus snga phyi tsam la dngos po tha dad kyi khyab pa grub pas dus skad cig gis phye ba na yang |_skad cig dang po dang gnyis pa sogs dngos po tha dad du grub cing |[ \[]rims kyis [;]rim gyis [\]]don byed pa yang dus du ma dang 'brel bas [\[]rims kyis [;]rim gyis [\]]don byed pa la skad cig ma du mas khyab par grub bo|_|
         []cig char gyis don byed pa de la yang |_don byed [\[p.172-6\]]pa'i phyi dus gzhan tsam chos can|_rgyu 'gags pas khyab ste|_'bras bu skyes pas khyab pa'i phyir|_dper na bum pa skyes pa na 'jim pa 'gags pas khyab pa bzhin no|_|
         khyab pa dpe'i steng du mngon sum gyis nges so|_|
         phyogs chos kyang mngon sum gyis grub bo|_|de lta na phyi dus gzhan tsam la rgyu 'gags pas khyab pa grub pa na|_dus la skad cig gis phye ba na yang skad cig cig char rgyu 'gags pas [\[p.172-7\]]<lb n="25b7"/>khyab pa grub pas cig char don byed pa la skad cig gis khyab pa grub bo zhes gsungs so|_|</seg>
source: 2_046_03_3_088_02 legs bshad dri med bcud bdud rtsi.xml

xml_content:
<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex62052024-09-2416-39-21" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5113"><abbr>gtan tshigs</abbr> rig pa tshad ma'i bstan <pb n="[3b9]"/> bcos kyi byung tshul</rs> |
          <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006"><abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa bcom ldan rigs pa'i ral gri</rs>s legs par bkod pa; rdzogs s+hyo || ||
          <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5798">lo bo byang ston gsar ma</rs>s shin du dag par bris pa lags s+hyo || ||</seg>

<seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex27012023-09-181" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><lb n="[91a6]"/> <rs type="work">mdo sde kun las btus pa'i Ti ka mdo'i nyi ma'i snying po</rs> zhes bya ba| thugs kyi me long yongs <lb n="[91a7]"/>su dag pa la byang chub kyi sems rgya chen po × snang zhing<rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:5908"> dben pa'i gnas</rs> la thugs gzhol ba mtshan nas brjod par dka' ba'i <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3930">slob dpon dbang phyug rin chen</rs> zhes bya ba'i zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos blangs nas| mkhas pa'i skye bo chen po lung dang rigs pa la rtogs pa'i snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa <rs type="person" ana="">chos kyi ye shes</rs> zhes bya <lb n="[91a8]"/> ba dang <rs type="person" ana="">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> zhes bya ba'i legs par bshad pa la sgro skur gnyis dang bral bar smra ba| × <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:3911">shag kya'i dge slong gzhon nu rin chen</rs> gyis legs par sbyar ba|| × rdzogs s+O|| × ||bkra shis par gyur gcig|| </seg>
source: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml

xml_content: <seg xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="excerpt" xml:id="ex53072023-09-25-095714" status="unreviewed" ana="corpusmd:colophon"><rs type="work" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4934"><choice><reg>rdo rje</reg><orig>rd[o] rj[e]</orig></choice> gdan rnam par bshad pa rgyan gyi me tog</rs> ces bya ba <rs type="person" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4006">mang du thos pa'i dge slong bcom ldan <lb n="13b2"/> bcoM ldan ral gri</rs>'i zhab *ru (d)u›<rs type="place" ana="corpusmd:named_reference" ref="db:4411"> dpal ldan snar thang gi dgon pa</rs>r sbyar ba rdzogs s+hyo ||||</seg>
source: 2_053_07 rdo rje gdan pa rgyan gyi me tog.xml
